GE09ram_07_u:4: 7.001.002a kauśiko 'tha yavakrīto raibhyaś cyavana eva ca
GE09ram_07_u:5: 7.001.002c kaṇvo medhātitheḥ putraḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi ye śritāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:6: 7.001.003a svastyātreyaś ca bhagavān namuciḥ pramucus tathā
GE09ram_07_u:7: 7.001.003c ājagmus te sahāgastyā ye śritā dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
GE09ram_07_u:8: 7.001.004a pṛṣadguḥ kavaṣo dhaumyo raudreyaś ca mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:9: 7.001.004c te 'py ājagmuḥ saśiṣyā vai ye śritāḥ paścimāṃ diśam
GE09ram_07_u:17: 7.001.008c agastyaṃ kathayām āsa saṃprātam ṛṣibhiḥ saha
GE09ram_07_u:18: 7.001.009a śrutvā prāptān munīṃs tāṃs tu bālasūryasamaprabhān
GE09ram_07_u:20: 7.001.010a dṛṣṭvā prāptān munīṃs tāṃs tu pratyutthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_07_u:27: 7.001.013c tvāṃ tu diṣṭyā kuśalinaṃ paśyāmo hataśātravam
GE09ram_07_u:28: 7.001.014a na hi bhāraḥ sa te rāma rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:29: 7.001.014c sadhanus tvaṃ hi lokāṃs trīn vijayethā na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:30: 7.001.015a diṣṭyā tvayā hato rāma rāvaṇaḥ putrapautravān
GE09ram_07_u:31: 7.001.015c diṣṭyā vijayinaṃ tvādya paśyāmaḥ saha bhāryayā
GE09ram_07_u:33: 7.001.016c akampanaś ca durdharṣo nihatās te niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:34: 7.001.017a yasya pramāṇād vipulaṃ pramāṇaṃ neha vidyate
GE09ram_07_u:35: 7.001.017c diṣṭyā te samare rāma kumbhakarṇo nipātitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:38: 7.001.019a saṃkhye tasya na kiṃ cit tu rāvaṇasya parābhavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:39: 7.001.019c dvandvayuddham anuprāpto diṣṭyā te rāvaṇir hataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:41: 7.001.020c muktaḥ suraripor vīra prāptaś ca vijayas tvayā
GE09ram_07_u:42: 7.001.021a vismayas tv eṣa naḥ saumya saṃśrutyendrajitaṃ hatam
GE09ram_07_u:44: 7.001.022a dattvā puṇyām imāṃ vīra saumyām abhayadakṣiṇām
GE09ram_07_u:46: 7.001.023a śrutvā tu vacanaṃ teṣām ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām
GE09ram_07_u:47: 7.001.023c vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatvā rāmaḥ prāñjalir abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:48: 7.001.024a bhavantaḥ kumbhakarṇaṃ ca rāvaṇaṃ ca niśācaram
GE09ram_07_u:50: 7.001.025a mahodaraṃ prahastaṃ ca virūpākṣaṃ ca rākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_07_u:52: 7.001.026a kīdṛśo vai prabhāvo 'sya kiṃ balaṃ kaḥ parākramaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:54: 7.001.027a śakyaṃ yadi mayā śrotuṃ na khalv ājñāpayāmi vaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:55: 7.001.027c yadi guhyaṃ na ced vaktuṃ śrotum icchāmi kathyatām
GE09ram_07_u:56: 7.001.027e kathaṃ śakro jitas tena kathaṃ labdhavaraś ca saḥ
GE09ram_07_u:58: 7.002.001c kumbhayonir mahātejā vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:59: 7.002.002a śṛṇu rājan yathāvṛttaṃ yasya tejobalaṃ mahat
GE09ram_07_u:60: 7.002.002c jaghāna ca ripūn yuddhe yathāvadhyaś ca śatrubhiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:61: 7.002.003a ahaṃ te rāvaṇasyedaṃ kulaṃ janma ca rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:62: 7.002.003c varapradānaṃ ca tathā tasmai dattaṃ bravīmi te
GE09ram_07_u:64: 7.002.004c pulastyo nāma brahmarṣiḥ sākṣād iva pitāmahaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:65: 7.002.005a nānukīrtyā guṇās tasya dharmataḥ śīlatas tathā
GE09ram_07_u:66: 7.002.005c prajāpateḥ putra iti vaktuṃ śakyaṃ hi nāmataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:67: 7.002.006a sa tu dharmaprasaṅgena meroḥ pārśve mahāgireḥ
GE09ram_07_u:74: 7.002.009c nityaśas tās tu taṃ deśaṃ gatvā krīḍanti kanyakāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:76: 7.002.010c yā me darśanam āgacchet sā garbhaṃ dhārayiṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:77: 7.002.011a tās tu sarvāḥ pratigatāḥ śrutvā vākyaṃ mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:79: 7.002.012a tṛṇabindos tu rājarṣes tanayā na śṛṇoti tat
GE09ram_07_u:81: 7.002.013a tasminn eva tu kāle sa prājāpatyo mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:83: 7.002.014a sā tu vedadhvaniṃ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā caiva tapodhanam
GE09ram_07_u:85: 7.002.015a dṛṣṭvā paramasaṃvignā sā tu tadrūpam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:86: 7.002.015c idaṃ me kiṃ nv iti jñātvā pitur gatvāgrataḥ sthitā
GE09ram_07_u:87: 7.002.016a tāṃ tu dṛṣṭvā tathā bhūtāṃ tṛṇabindur athābravīt
GE09ram_07_u:88: 7.002.016c kiṃ tvam etat tv asadṛśaṃ dhārayasy ātmano vapuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:89: 7.002.017a sā tu kṛtvāñjaliṃ dīnā kanyovāca tapodhanam
GE09ram_07_u:90: 7.002.017c na jāne kāraṇaṃ tāta yena me rūpam īdṛśam
GE09ram_07_u:91: 7.002.018a kiṃ tu pūrvaṃ gatāsmy ekā maharṣer bhāvitātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:93: 7.002.019a na ca paśyāmy ahaṃ tatra kāṃ cid apy āgatāṃ sakhīm
GE09ram_07_u:94: 7.002.019c rūpasya tu viparyāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā cāham ihāgatā
GE09ram_07_u:96: 7.002.020c dhyānaṃ viveśa tac cāpi apaśyad ṛṣikarmajam
GE09ram_07_u:97: 7.002.021a sa tu vijñāya taṃ śāpaṃ maharṣer bhāvitātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:98: 7.002.021c gṛhītvā tanayāṃ gatvā pulastyam idam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:99: 7.002.022a bhagavaṃs tanayāṃ me tvaṃ guṇaiḥ svair eva bhūṣitām
GE09ram_07_u:103: 7.002.024a taṃ bruvāṇaṃ tu tadvākyaṃ rājarṣiṃ dhārmikaṃ tadā
GE09ram_07_u:104: 7.002.024c jighṛkṣur abravīt kanyāṃ bāḍham ity eva sa dvijaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:105: 7.002.025a dattvā tu sa gato rājā svam āśramapadaṃ tadā
GE09ram_07_u:106: 7.002.025c sāpi tatrāvasat kanyā toṣayantī patiṃ guṇaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:107: 7.002.025e prītaḥ sa tu mahātejā vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:108: 7.002.026a parituṣṭo 'smi bhadraṃ te guṇānāṃ saṃpadā bhṛśam
GE09ram_07_u:109: 7.002.026c tasmāt te viramāmy adya putram ātmasamaṃ guṇaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:111: 7.002.027a yasmāt tu viśruto vedas tvayehābhyasyato mama
GE09ram_07_u:112: 7.002.027c tasmāt sa viśravā nāma bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:113: 7.002.028a evam uktā tu sā kanyā prahṛṣṭenāntarātmanā
GE09ram_07_u:121: 7.003.003a jñātvā tasya tu tadvṛttaṃ bharadvājo mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:122: 7.003.003c dadau viśravase bhāryāṃ svāṃ sutāṃ devavarṇinīm
GE09ram_07_u:126: 7.003.005c janayām āsa dharmātmā sarvair brahmaguṇair yutam
GE09ram_07_u:127: 7.003.006a tasmiñ jāte tu saṃhṛṣṭaḥ sa babhūva pitāmahaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:128: 7.003.006c nāma cāsyākarot prītaḥ sārdhaṃ devarṣibhis tadā
GE09ram_07_u:130: 7.003.007c tasmād vaiśravaṇo nāma bhaviṣyaty eṣa viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:131: 7.003.008a sa tu vaiśravaṇas tatra tapovanagatas tadā
GE09ram_07_u:134: 7.003.009c cariṣye niyato dharmaṃ dharmo hi paramā gatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:135: 7.003.010a sa tu varṣasahasrāṇi tapas taptvā mahāvane
GE09ram_07_u:136: 7.003.010c pūrṇe varṣasahasre tu taṃ taṃ vidhim avartata
GE09ram_07_u:138: 7.003.011c evaṃ varṣasahasrāṇi jagmus tāny eva varṣavat
GE09ram_07_u:139: 7.003.012a atha prīto mahātejāḥ sendraiḥ suragaṇaiḥ saha
GE09ram_07_u:142: 7.003.013c varaṃ vṛṇīṣva bhadraṃ te varārhas tvaṃ hi me mataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:146: 7.003.015c brahmā suragaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ bāḍham ity eva hṛṣṭavat
GE09ram_07_u:147: 7.003.016a ahaṃ hi lokapālānāṃ caturthaṃ sraṣṭum udyataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:148: 7.003.016c yamendravaruṇānāṃ hi padaṃ yat tava cepsitam
GE09ram_07_u:151: 7.003.018a etac ca puṣpakaṃ nāma vimānaṃ sūryasaṃnibham
GE09ram_07_u:153: 7.003.019a svasti te 'stu gamiṣyāmaḥ sarva eva yathāgatam
GE09ram_07_u:154: 7.003.019c kṛtakṛtyā vayaṃ tāta dattvā tava mahāvaram
GE09ram_07_u:156: 7.003.020c dhaneśaḥ pitaraṃ prāha vinayāt praṇato vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:158: 7.003.021c nivāsaṃ na tu me devo vidadhe sa prajāpatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:159: 7.003.022a tat paśya bhagavan kaṃ cid deśaṃ vāsāya naḥ prabho
GE09ram_07_u:160: 7.003.022c na ca pīḍā bhaved yatra prāṇino yasya kasya cit
GE09ram_07_u:161: 7.003.023a evam uktas tu putreṇa viśravā munipuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:162: 7.003.023c vacanaṃ prāha dharmajña śrūyatām iti dharmavit
GE09ram_07_u:163: 7.003.024a laṅkā nāma purī ramyā nirmitā viśvakarmaṇā
GE09ram_07_u:168: 7.003.026a sa tvaṃ tatra nivāsāya rocayasva matiṃ svakām
GE09ram_07_u:169: 7.003.026c nirdoṣas tatra te vāso na ca bādhāsti kasya cit
GE09ram_07_u:170: 7.003.027a etac chrutvā tu dharmātmā dharmiṣṭhaṃ vacanaṃ pituḥ
GE09ram_07_u:172: 7.003.028a nairṛtānāṃ sahasrais tu hṛṣṭaiḥ pramuditaiḥ sadā
GE09ram_07_u:177: 7.003.030c abhyagacchat susaṃhṛṣṭaḥ pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca saḥ
GE09ram_07_u:183: 7.004.001c pūrvam āsīt tu laṅkāyāṃ rakṣasām iti saṃbhavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:186: 7.004.003a bhagavan pūrvam apy eṣā laṅkāsīt piśitāśinām
GE09ram_07_u:187: 7.004.003c itīdaṃ bhavataḥ śrutvā vismayo janito mama
GE09ram_07_u:188: 7.004.004a pulastyavaṃśād udbhūtā rākṣasā iti naḥ śrutam
GE09ram_07_u:189: 7.004.004c idānīm anyataś cāpi saṃbhavaḥ kīrtitas tvayā
GE09ram_07_u:190: 7.004.005a rāvaṇāt kumbhakarṇāc ca prahastād vikaṭād api
GE09ram_07_u:191: 7.004.005c rāvaṇasya ca putrebhyaḥ kiṃ nu te balavattarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:192: 7.004.006a ka eṣāṃ pūrvako brahman kiṃnāmā kiṃtapobalaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:193: 7.004.006c aparādhaṃ ca kaṃ prāpya viṣṇunā drāvitāḥ purā
GE09ram_07_u:195: 7.004.007c kautūhalaṃ kṛtaṃ mahyaṃ nuda bhānur yathā tamaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:196: 7.004.008a rāghavasya tu tac chrutvā saṃskārālaṃkṛtaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:202: 7.004.011a prajāpatis tu tāny āha sattvāni prahasann iva
GE09ram_07_u:203: 7.004.011c ābhāṣya vācā yatnena rakṣadhvam iti mānadaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:205: 7.004.012c bhuṅkṣitābhuṅkṣitair uktas tatas tān āha bhūtakṛt
GE09ram_07_u:206: 7.004.013a rakṣāma iti yair uktaṃ rākṣasās te bhavantu vaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:207: 7.004.013c yakṣāma iti yair uktaṃ te vai yakṣā bhavantu vaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:208: 7.004.014a tatra hetiḥ prahetiś ca bhrātarau rākṣasarṣabhau
GE09ram_07_u:210: 7.004.015a prahetir dhārmikas tatra na dārān so 'bhikāṅkṣati
GE09ram_07_u:211: 7.004.015c hetir dārakriyārthaṃ tu yatnaṃ param athākarot
GE09ram_07_u:212: 7.004.016a sa kālabhaginīṃ kanyāṃ bhayāṃ nāma bhayāvahām
GE09ram_07_u:214: 7.004.017a sa tasyāṃ janayām āasa hetī rākṣasapuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:215: 7.004.017c putraṃ putravatāṃ śreṣṭho vidyutkeśa iti śrutam
GE09ram_07_u:218: 7.004.019a sa yadā yauvanaṃ bhadram anuprāpto niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:219: 7.004.019c tato dārakriyāṃ tasya kartuṃ vyavasitaḥ pitā
GE09ram_07_u:222: 7.004.021a avaśyam eva dātavyā parasmai seti saṃdhyayā
GE09ram_07_u:225: 7.004.022c ramate sa tayā sārdhaṃ paulomyā maghavān iva
GE09ram_07_u:226: 7.004.023a kena cit tv atha kālena rāma sālakaṭaṃkaṭā
GE09ram_07_u:229: 7.004.024c prasūtā mandaraṃ gatvā gaṅgā garbham ivāgnijam
GE09ram_07_u:230: 7.004.025a tam utsṛjya tu sā garbhaṃ vidyutkeśād ratārthinī
GE09ram_07_u:231: 7.004.025c reme sā patinā sārdhaṃ vismṛtya sutam ātmajam
GE09ram_07_u:233: 7.004.026c pāṇim āsye samādhāya ruroda ghanarāḍ iva
GE09ram_07_u:234: 7.004.027a athopariṣṭād gacchan vai vṛṣabhastho haraḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:237: 7.004.028c taṃ rākṣasātmajaṃ cakre mātur eva vayaḥ samam
GE09ram_07_u:241: 7.004.030c sadyopalabdhir garbhasya prasūtiḥ sadya eva ca
GE09ram_07_u:242: 7.004.030e sadya eva vayaḥprāptir mātur eva vayaḥ samam
GE09ram_07_u:247: 7.005.001a sukeśaṃ dhārmikaṃ dṛṣṭvā varalabdhaṃ ca rākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_07_u:249: 7.005.002a tasya devavatī nāma dvitīyā śrīr ivātmajā
GE09ram_07_u:250: 7.005.002c tāṃ sukeśāya dharmeṇa dadau dakṣaḥ śriyaṃ yathā
GE09ram_07_u:251: 7.005.003a varadānakṛtaiśvaryaṃ sā taṃ prāpya patiṃ priyam
GE09ram_07_u:252: 7.005.003c āsīd devavatī tuṣṭā dhanaṃ prāpyeva nirdhanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:253: 7.005.004a sa tayā saha saṃyukto rarāja rajanīcaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:255: 7.005.005a devavatyāṃ sukeśas tu janayām āsa rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:257: 7.005.005e mālyavantaṃ sumāliṃ ca māliṃ ca balināṃ varam
GE09ram_07_u:258: 7.005.006a trayo lokā ivāvyagrāḥ sthitās traya ivāgnayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:259: 7.005.006c trayo mantrā ivātyugrās trayo ghorā ivāmayāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:262: 7.005.008a varaprāptiṃ pitus te tu jñātvaiśvaryaṃ tato mahat
GE09ram_07_u:263: 7.005.008c tapas taptuṃ gatā meruṃ bhrātaraḥ kṛtaniścayāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:270: 7.005.012a brahmāṇaṃ varadaṃ jñātvā sendrair devagaṇair vṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:271: 7.005.012c ūcuḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve vepamānā iva drumāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:272: 7.005.013a tapasārādhito deva yadi no diśase varam
GE09ram_07_u:277: 7.005.015a varaṃ labdhvā tataḥ sarve rāma rātriṃcarās tadā
GE09ram_07_u:281: 7.005.017a atha te viśvakarmāṇaṃ śilpināṃ varam avyayam
GE09ram_07_u:284: 7.005.018c asmākam api tāvat tvaṃ gṛhaṃ kuru mahāmate
GE09ram_07_u:285: 7.005.019a himavantaṃ samāśritya meruṃ mandaram eva vā
GE09ram_07_u:298: 7.005.025a viśvakarmavacaḥ śrutvā tatas te rāma rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:299: 7.005.025c sahasrānucarā gatvā laṅkāṃ tām avasan purīm
GE09ram_07_u:301: 7.005.026c laṅkām avāpya te hṛṣṭā viharanti niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:308: 7.005.030a kṛtadārās tu te rāma sukeśatanayāḥ prabho
GE09ram_07_u:310: 7.005.031a tatra mālyavato bhāryā sundarī nāma sundarī
GE09ram_07_u:311: 7.005.031c sa tasyāṃ janayām āsa yad apatyaṃ nibodha tat
GE09ram_07_u:313: 7.005.032c suptaghno yajñakopaś ca mattonmattau tathaiva ca
GE09ram_07_u:314: 7.005.032e analā cābhavat kanyā sundaryāṃ rāma sundarī
GE09ram_07_u:317: 7.005.034a sumālī janayām āsa yad apatyaṃ niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:320: 7.005.035c dhūmrākśaś cātha daṇḍaś ca supārśvaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:321: 7.005.036a saṃhrādiḥ praghasaś caiva bhāsakarṇaś ca rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:322: 7.005.036c rākā puṣpotkaṭā caiva kaikasī ca śucismitā
GE09ram_07_u:323: 7.005.036e kumbhīnasī ca ity ete sumāleḥ prasavāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:324: 7.005.037a māles tu vasudā nāma gandharvī rūpaśālinī
GE09ram_07_u:326: 7.005.038a sumāler anujas tasyāṃ janayām āsa yat prabho
GE09ram_07_u:327: 7.005.038c apatyaṃ kathyamānaṃ tan mayā tvaṃ śṛṇu rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:328: 7.005.039a analaś cānilaś caiva haraḥ saṃpātir eva ca
GE09ram_07_u:338: 7.006.001a tair vadhyamānā devāś ca ṛṣayaś ca tapodhanāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:340: 7.006.002a te sametya tu kāmāriṃ tripurāriṃ trilocanam
GE09ram_07_u:345: 7.006.004c svargāc ca cyāvitaḥ śakraḥ svarge krīḍanti śakravat
GE09ram_07_u:346: 7.006.005a ahaṃ viṣṇur ahaṃ rudro brahmāhaṃ devarāḍ aham
GE09ram_07_u:347: 7.006.005c ahaṃ yamo 'haṃ varuṇaś candro 'haṃ ravir apy aham
GE09ram_07_u:348: 7.006.006a iti te rākṣasā deva varadānena darpitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:349: 7.006.006c bādhante samaroddharṣā ye ca teṣāṃ puraḥsarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:350: 7.006.007a tan no devabhayārtānām abhayaṃ dātum arhasi
GE09ram_07_u:352: 7.006.008a ity uktas tu suraiḥ sarvaiḥ kapardī nīlalohitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:353: 7.006.008c sukeśaṃ prati sāpekṣa āha devagaṇān prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:354: 7.006.009a nāhaṃ tān nihaniṣyāmi avadhyā mama te 'surāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:355: 7.006.009c kiṃ tu mantraṃ pradāsyāmi yo vai tān nihaniṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:357: 7.006.010c gacchantu śaraṇaṃ viṣṇuṃ haniṣyati sa tān prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:364: 7.006.014a laṅkā nāma purī durgā trikūṭaśikhare sthitā
GE09ram_07_u:365: 7.006.014c tatra sthitāḥ prabādhante sarvān naḥ kṣaṇadācarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:366: 7.006.015a sa tvam asmatpriyārthaṃ tu jahi tān madhusūdana
GE09ram_07_u:369: 7.006.016c nuda tvaṃ no bhayaṃ deva nīhāram iva bhāskaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:370: 7.006.017a ity evaṃ daivatair ukto devadevo janārdanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:371: 7.006.017c abhayaṃ bhayado 'rīṇāṃ dattvā devān uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:373: 7.006.018c tāṃś cāsya tanayāñ jāne yeṣāṃ jyeṣṭhaḥ sa mālyavān
GE09ram_07_u:376: 7.006.020a ity uktās te surāḥ sarve viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā
GE09ram_07_u:377: 7.006.020c yathā vāsaṃ yayur hṛṣṭāḥ praśamanto janārdanam
GE09ram_07_u:379: 7.006.021c śrutvā tau bhrātarau vīrāv idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:380: 7.006.022a amarā ṛṣayaś caiva saṃhatya kila śaṃkaram
GE09ram_07_u:384: 7.006.024a rākṣasair abhibhūtāḥ sma na śaktāḥ sma umāpate
GE09ram_07_u:385: 7.006.024c sveṣu veśmasu saṃsthātuṃ bhayāt teṣāṃ durātmanām
GE09ram_07_u:386: 7.006.025a tad asmākaṃ hitārthe tvaṃ jahi tāṃs tāṃs trilocana
GE09ram_07_u:389: 7.006.026c śiraḥ karaṃ ca dhunvāna idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:390: 7.006.027a avadhyā mama te devāḥ sukeśatanayā raṇe
GE09ram_07_u:391: 7.006.027c mantraṃ tu vaḥ pradāsyāmi yo vai tān nihaniṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:393: 7.006.028c haniṣyati sa tān yuddhe śaraṇaṃ taṃ prapadyatha
GE09ram_07_u:394: 7.006.029a harān nāvāpya te kāmaṃ kāmārim abhivādya ca
GE09ram_07_u:399: 7.006.031c pratijñāto vadho 'smākaṃ tac cintayatha yat kṣamam
GE09ram_07_u:401: 7.006.032c duḥkhaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ jetuṃ yo no hantum abhīpsati
GE09ram_07_u:402: 7.006.033a tataḥ sumālī mālī ca śrutvā mālyavato vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:403: 7.006.033c ūcatur bhrātaraṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ bhagāṃśāv iva vāsavam
GE09ram_07_u:404: 7.006.034a svadhītaṃ dattam iṣṭaṃ ca aiśvaryaṃ paripālitam
GE09ram_07_u:405: 7.006.034c āyur nirāmayaṃ prāptaṃ svadharmaḥ sthāpitaś ca naḥ
GE09ram_07_u:407: 7.006.035c jitā devā raṇe nityaṃ na no mṛtyukṛtaṃ bhayam
GE09ram_07_u:408: 7.006.036a nārāyaṇaś ca rudraś ca śakraś cāpi yamas tathā
GE09ram_07_u:409: 7.006.036c asmākaṃ pramukhe sthātuṃ sarva eva hi bibhyati
GE09ram_07_u:410: 7.006.037a viṣṇor doṣaś ca nāsty atra kāraṇaṃ rākṣaseśvara
GE09ram_07_u:411: 7.006.037c devānām eva doṣeṇa viṣṇoḥ pracalitaṃ manaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:413: 7.006.038c devān eva jighāṃsāmo yebhyo doṣaḥ samutthitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:414: 7.006.039a iti mālī sumālī ca mālyavān agrajaḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:415: 7.006.039c udyogaṃ ghoṣayitvātha rākṣasāḥ sarva eva te
GE09ram_07_u:417: 7.006.040a syandanair vāraṇendraiś ca hayaiś ca girisaṃnibhaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:418: 7.006.040c kharair gobhir athoṣṭraiś ca śiṃśumārair bhujaṃ gamaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:420: 7.006.041c siṃhair vyāghrair varāhaiś ca sṛmaraiś camarair api
GE09ram_07_u:421: 7.006.042a tyaktvā laṅkāṃ tataḥ sarve rākṣasā balagarvitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:427: 7.006.045a asthīni meghā varṣanti uṣṇaṃ śoṇitam eva ca
GE09ram_07_u:435: 7.006.049a mālyavāṃś ca sumālī ca mālī ca rajanīcarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:436: 7.006.049c āsan puraḥsarās teṣāṃ kratūnām iva pāvakāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:437: 7.006.050a mālyavantaṃ tu te sarve mālyavantam ivācalam
GE09ram_07_u:440: 7.006.051c jayepsayā devalokaṃ yayau mālī vaśe sthitam
GE09ram_07_u:441: 7.006.052a rākṣasānāṃ samudyogaṃ taṃ tu nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:442: 7.006.052c devadūtād upaśrutya dadhre yuddhe tato manaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:459: 7.007.003a śalabhā iva kedāraṃ maśakā iva parvatam
GE09ram_07_u:462: 7.007.004c hariṃ viśanti sma śarā lokāstam iva paryaye
GE09ram_07_u:463: 7.007.005a syandanaiḥ syandanagatā gajaiś ca gajadhūr gatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:464: 7.007.005c aśvārohāḥ sadaśvaiś ca pādātāś cāmbare carāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:466: 7.007.006c nirucchvāsaṃ hariṃ cakruḥ prāṇāyāma iva dvijam
GE09ram_07_u:471: 7.007.009a vidrāvya śaravarṣaṃ taṃ varṣaṃ vāyur ivotthitam
GE09ram_07_u:477: 7.007.012a na śekur aśvāḥ saṃsthātuṃ vimadāḥ kuñjarābhavan
GE09ram_07_u:480: 7.007.013c vidārya tāni rakṣāṃsi supuṅkhā viviśuḥ kṣitim
GE09ram_07_u:482: 7.007.014c nipetū rākṣasā bhīmāḥ śailā vajrahatā iva
GE09ram_07_u:486: 7.007.016c rākṣasānāṃ ravāṃś cāpi grasate vaiṣṇavo ravaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:487: 7.007.017a sūryād iva karā ghorā ūrmayaḥ sāgarād iva
GE09ram_07_u:488: 7.007.017c parvatād iva nāgendrā vāryoghā iva cāmbudāt
GE09ram_07_u:491: 7.007.019a śarabheṇa yathā siṃhāḥ siṃhena dviradā yathā
GE09ram_07_u:492: 7.007.019c dviradena yathā vyāghrā vyāghreṇa dvīpino yathā
GE09ram_07_u:493: 7.007.020a dvīpinā ca yathā śvānaḥ śunā mārjārakā yathā
GE09ram_07_u:494: 7.007.020c mārjāreṇa yathā sarpāḥ sarpeṇa ca yathākhavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:495: 7.007.021a tathā te rākṣasā yuddhe viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā
GE09ram_07_u:496: 7.007.021c dravanti drāvitāś caiva śāyitāś ca mahītale
GE09ram_07_u:498: 7.007.022c vārijaṃ nādayām āsa toyadaṃ surarāḍ iva
GE09ram_07_u:500: 7.007.023c yayau laṅkām abhimukhaṃ prabhagnaṃ rākṣasaṃ balam
GE09ram_07_u:503: 7.007.025a utkṣipya hemābharaṇaṃ karaṃ karam iva dvipaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:504: 7.007.025c rarāsa rākṣaso harṣāt sataḍit toyado yathā
GE09ram_07_u:506: 7.007.026c ciccheda yantur aśvāś ca bhrāntās tasya tu rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:507: 7.007.027a tair aśvair bhrāmyate bhrāntaiḥ sumālī rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:508: 7.007.027c indriyāśvair yathā bhrāntair dhṛtihīno yathā naraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:509: 7.007.028a mālī cābhyadravad yuddhe pragṛhya saśaraṃ dhanuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:511: 7.007.028e viviśur harim āsādya krauñcaṃ patrarathā iva
GE09ram_07_u:513: 7.007.029c cukṣubhe na raṇe viṣṇur jitendriya ivādhibhiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:514: 7.007.030a atha maurvī svanaṃ kṛtvā bhagavān bhūtabhāvanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:517: 7.007.031c pibanti rudhiraṃ tasya nāgā iva purāmṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:518: 7.007.032a mālinaṃ vimukhaṃ kṛtvā mālimauliṃ harir balāt
GE09ram_07_u:519: 7.007.032c rathaṃ ca sadhvajaṃ cāpaṃ vājinaś ca nyapātayat
GE09ram_07_u:520: 7.007.033a virathas tu gadāṃ gṛhya mālī naktaṃcarottamaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:522: 7.007.034a sa tayā garuḍaṃ saṃkhye īśānam iva cāntakaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:526: 7.007.036a parāṅmukhe kṛte deve mālinā garuḍena vai
GE09ram_07_u:536: 7.007.041a mālinaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā sumālī malyavān api
GE09ram_07_u:550: 7.007.045c ravāś ca vegāś ca samaṃ babhūvuḥ;
GE09ram_07_u:562: 7.007.049a ke cic caivāsinā chinnās tathānye śaratāḍitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:571: 7.008.002c padmanābham idaṃ prāha vacanaṃ paruṣaṃ tadā
GE09ram_07_u:575: 7.008.004c sa hantā na gataḥ svargaṃ labhate puṇyakarmaṇām
GE09ram_07_u:577: 7.008.005c ahaṃ sthito 'smi paśyāmi balaṃ darśaya yat tava
GE09ram_07_u:581: 7.008.007a prāṇair api priyaṃ kāryaṃ devānāṃ hi sadā mayā
GE09ram_07_u:584: 7.008.008c śaktyā bibheda saṃkruddho rākṣasendro rarāsa ca
GE09ram_07_u:587: 7.008.010a tatas tām eva cotkṛṣya śaktiṃ śaktidharapriyaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:594: 7.008.013c mālyavān punar āśvastas tasthau girir ivācalaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:595: 7.008.014a tataḥ kārṣṇāyasaṃ śūlaṃ kaṇṭakair bahubhiś citam
GE09ram_07_u:599: 7.008.016a tato 'mbare mahāñ śabdaḥ sādhu sādhv iti cotthitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:600: 7.008.016c āhatya rākṣaso viṣṇuṃ garuḍaṃ cāpy atāḍayat
GE09ram_07_u:604: 7.008.018c sumālī svabalaiḥ sārdhaṃ laṅkām abhimukho yayau
GE09ram_07_u:606: 7.008.019c svabalena samāgamya yayau laṅkāṃ hriyā vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:607: 7.008.020a evaṃ te rākṣasā rāma hariṇā kamalekṣaṇa
GE09ram_07_u:610: 7.008.021c tyaktvā laṅkāṃ gatā vastuṃ pātālaṃ sahapatnayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:613: 7.008.023a ye tvayā nihatās te vai paulastyā nāma rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:614: 7.008.023c sumālī mālyavān mālī ye ca teṣāṃ puraḥsarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:616: 7.008.024a na cānyo rakṣasāṃ hantā sureṣv api puraṃjaya
GE09ram_07_u:619: 7.008.025c rākṣasān hantum utpanno ajeyaḥ prabhur avyayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:620: 7.009.001a kasya cit tv atha kālasya sumālī nāma rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:621: 7.009.001c rasātalān martyalokaṃ sarvaṃ vai vicacāara ha
GE09ram_07_u:623: 7.009.002c kanyāṃ duhitaraṃ gṛhya vinā padmam iva śriyam
GE09ram_07_u:626: 7.009.003c athābbravīt sutāṃ rakṣaḥ kaikasīṃ nāma nāmataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:628: 7.009.004c tvatkṛte ca vayaṃ sarve yantritā dharmabuddhayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:629: 7.009.005a tvaṃ hi sarvaguṇopetā śrīḥ sapadmeva putrike
GE09ram_07_u:630: 7.009.005c pratyākhyānāc ca bhītais tvaṃ na varaiḥ pratigṛhyase
GE09ram_07_u:632: 7.009.006c na jñāyate ca kaḥ kanyāṃ varayed iti putrike
GE09ram_07_u:633: 7.009.007a mātuḥ kulaṃ pitṛkulaṃ yatra caiva pradīyate
GE09ram_07_u:634: 7.009.007c kulatrayaṃ sadā kanyā saṃśaye sthāpya tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_07_u:636: 7.009.008c gaccha viśravasaṃ putri paulastyaṃ varaya svayam
GE09ram_07_u:637: 7.009.009a īdṛśās te bhaviṣyanti putrāḥ putri na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:641: 7.009.011a sā tu tāṃ dāruṇāṃ velām acintya pitṛgauravāt
GE09ram_07_u:643: 7.009.012a sa tu tāṃ vīkṣya suśroṇīṃ pūrṇacandranibhānanām
GE09ram_07_u:645: 7.009.013a bhadre kasyāsi duhitā kuto vā tvam ihāgatā
GE09ram_07_u:646: 7.009.013c kiṃ kāryaṃ kasya vā hetos tattvato brūhi śobhane
GE09ram_07_u:647: 7.009.014a evam uktā tu sā kanyā kṛtāñjalir athābravīt
GE09ram_07_u:648: 7.009.014c ātmaprabhāvena mune jñātum arhasi me matam
GE09ram_07_u:649: 7.009.015a kiṃ tu viddhi hi māṃ brahmañ śāsanāt pitur āgatām
GE09ram_07_u:650: 7.009.015c kaikasī nāma nāmnāhaṃ śeṣaṃ tvaṃ jñātum arhasi
GE09ram_07_u:651: 7.009.016a sa tu gatvā munir dhyānaṃ vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:652: 7.009.016c vijñātaṃ te mayā bhadre kāraṇaṃ yan manogatam
GE09ram_07_u:653: 7.009.017a dāruṇāyāṃ tu velāyāṃ yasmāt tvaṃ mām upasthitā
GE09ram_07_u:654: 7.009.017c śṛṇu tasmāt sutān bhadre yādṛśāñ janayiṣyasi
GE09ram_07_u:657: 7.009.019a sā tu tadvacanaṃ śrutvā praṇipatyābravīd vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:659: 7.009.020a athābravīn munis tatra paścimo yas tavātmajaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:660: 7.009.020c mama vaṃśānurūpaś ca dharmātmā ca bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:661: 7.009.021a evam uktā tu sā kanyā rāma kālena kena cit
GE09ram_07_u:667: 7.009.024a vavarṣa rudhiraṃ devo meghāś ca kharanisvanāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:668: 7.009.024c prababhau na ca khe sūryo maholkāś cāpatan bhuvi
GE09ram_07_u:671: 7.009.026a tasya tv anantaraṃ jātaḥ kumbhakarṇo mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:672: 7.009.026c pramāṇād yasya vipulaṃ pramāṇaṃ neha vidyate
GE09ram_07_u:674: 7.009.027c vibhīṣaṇaś ca dharmātmā kaikasyāḥ paścimaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:675: 7.009.028a te tu tatra mahāraṇye vavṛdhuḥ sumahaujasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:678: 7.009.029c trailokyaṃ trāsayan duṣṭo bhakṣayan vicacāra ha
GE09ram_07_u:679: 7.009.030a vibhīṣaṇas tu dharmātmā nityaṃ dharmapathe sthitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:681: 7.009.031a atha vitteśvaro devas tatra kālena kena cit
GE09ram_07_u:683: 7.009.032a taṃ dṛṣṭvā kaikasī tatra jvalantam iva tejasā
GE09ram_07_u:684: 7.009.032c āsthāya rākṣasīṃ buddhiṃ daśagrīvam uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:686: 7.009.033c bhrātṛbhāve same cāpi paśyātmānaṃ tvam īdṛśam
GE09ram_07_u:688: 7.009.034c yathā bhavasi me putra śīghraṃ vaiśvaraṇopamaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:689: 7.009.035a mātus tad vacanaṃ śrutvā daśagrīvaḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_07_u:690: 7.009.035c amarṣam atulaṃ lebhe pratijñāṃ cākarot tadā
GE09ram_07_u:691: 7.009.036a satyaṃ te pratijānāmi tulyo bhrātrādhiko 'pi vā
GE09ram_07_u:692: 7.009.036c bhaviṣyāmy acirān mātaḥ saṃtāpaṃ tyaja hṛdgatam
GE09ram_07_u:694: 7.009.037c prāpsyāmi tapasā kāmam iti kṛtvādhyavasya ca
GE09ram_07_u:696: 7.010.001a athābravīd dvijaṃ rāmaḥ kathaṃ te bhrātaro vane
GE09ram_07_u:697: 7.010.001c kīdṛśaṃ tu tadā brahmaṃs tapaś cerur mahāvratāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:698: 7.010.002a agastyas tv abravīt tatra rāmaṃ prayata mānasaṃ
GE09ram_07_u:699: 7.010.002c tāṃs tān dharmavidhīṃs tatra bhrātaras te samāviśan
GE09ram_07_u:701: 7.010.003c tatāpa graiṣmike kāle pañcasv agniṣv avasthitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:706: 7.010.006a vibhīṣaṇas tu dharmātmā nityaṃ dharmaparaḥ śuciḥ
GE09ram_07_u:709: 7.010.007c papāta puṣpavarṣaṃ ca kṣubhitāś cāpi devatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:715: 7.010.010c pūrṇe varṣasahasre tu śiraś cāgnau juhāva saḥ
GE09ram_07_u:717: 7.010.011c śirāṃsi nava cāpy asya praviṣṭāni hutāśanam
GE09ram_07_u:718: 7.010.012a atha varṣasahasre tu daśame daśamaṃ śiraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:719: 7.010.012c chettukāmaḥ sa dharmātmā prāptaś cātra pitāmahaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:720: 7.010.013a pitāmahas tu suprītaḥ sārdhaṃ devair upasthitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:722: 7.010.014a śīghraṃ varaya dharmajña varo yas te 'bhikāṅkṣitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:723: 7.010.014c kiṃ te kāmaṃ karomy adya na vṛthā te pariśramaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:726: 7.010.016a bhagavan prāṇināṃ nityaṃ nānyatra maraṇād bhayam
GE09ram_07_u:727: 7.010.016c nāsti mṛtyusamaḥ śatrur amaratvam ato vṛṇe
GE09ram_07_u:729: 7.010.017c avadhyaḥ syāṃ prajādhyakṣa devatānāṃ ca śāśvatam
GE09ram_07_u:730: 7.010.018a na hi cintā mamānyeṣu prāṇiṣv amarapūjita
GE09ram_07_u:731: 7.010.018c tṛṇabhūtā hi me sarve prāṇino mānuṣādayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:732: 7.010.019a evam uktas tu dharmātmā daśagrīveṇa rakṣasā
GE09ram_07_u:733: 7.010.019c uvāca vacanaṃ rāma saha devaiḥ pitāmahaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:735: 7.010.020c śṛṇu cāpi vaco bhūyaḥ prītasyeha śubhaṃ mama
GE09ram_07_u:736: 7.010.021a hutāni yāni śīrṣāṇi pūrvam agnau tvayānagha
GE09ram_07_u:737: 7.010.021c punas tāni bhaviṣyanti tathaiva tava rākṣasa
GE09ram_07_u:739: 7.010.022c agnau hutāni śīrṣāṇi yāni tāny utthitāni vai
GE09ram_07_u:740: 7.010.023a evam uktvvā tu taṃ rāma daśagrīvaṃ prajāpatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:744: 7.010.025a vibhīṣaṇas tu dharmātmā vacanaṃ prāha sāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_07_u:745: 7.010.025c vṛtaḥ sarvaguṇair nityaṃ candramā iva raśmibhiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:746: 7.010.026a bhagavan kṛtakṛtyo 'haṃ yan me lokaguruḥ svayam
GE09ram_07_u:747: 7.010.026c prīto yadi tvaṃ dātavyaṃ varaṃ me śṛṇu suvrata
GE09ram_07_u:748: 7.010.027a yā yā me jāyate buddhir yeṣu yeṣv āśrameṣv iha
GE09ram_07_u:749: 7.010.027c sā sā bhavatu dharmiṣṭhā taṃ taṃ dharmaṃ ca pālaye
GE09ram_07_u:750: 7.010.028a eṣa me paramodāra varaḥ paramako mataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:751: 7.010.028c na hi dharmābhiraktānāṃ loke kiṃ cana durlabham
GE09ram_07_u:752: 7.010.029a atha prajāpatiḥ prīto vibhīṣaṇam uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:753: 7.010.029c dharmiṣṭhas tvaṃ yathā vatsa tathā caitad bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:755: 7.010.030c nādharme jāyate buddhir amaratvaṃ dadāmi te
GE09ram_07_u:758: 7.010.032a na tāvat kumbhakarṇāya pradātavyo varas tvayā
GE09ram_07_u:759: 7.010.032c jānīṣe hi yathā lokāṃs trāsayaty eṣa durmatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:761: 7.010.033c anena bhakṣitā brahman ṛṣayo mānuṣās tathā
GE09ram_07_u:763: 7.010.034c lokānāṃ svasti caiva syād bhaved asya ca saṃnatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:766: 7.010.036a prāñjaliḥ sā tu parśvasthā prāha vākyaṃ sarasvatī
GE09ram_07_u:767: 7.010.036c iyam asmy āgatā devakiṃ kāryaṃ karavāṇy aham
GE09ram_07_u:768: 7.010.037a prajāpatis tu tāṃ prāptāṃ prāha vākyaṃ sarasvatīm
GE09ram_07_u:769: 7.010.037c vāṇi tvaṃ rākṣasendrasya bhava yā devatepsitā
GE09ram_07_u:770: 7.010.038a tathety uktvā praviṣṭā sā prajāpatir athābravīt
GE09ram_07_u:771: 7.010.038c kumbhakarṇa mahābāho varaṃ varaya yo mataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:772: 7.010.039a kumbhakarṇas tu tad vākyaṃ śrutvā vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:774: 7.010.040a evam astv iti taṃ coktvā saha devaiḥ pitāmahaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:775: 7.010.040c devī sarasvatī caiva muktvā taṃ prayayau divam
GE09ram_07_u:776: 7.010.041a kumbhakarṇas tu duṣṭātmā cintayām āsa duḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:777: 7.010.041c kīrdṛśaṃ kiṃ nv idaṃ vākyaṃ mamādya vadanāc cyutam
GE09ram_07_u:779: 7.010.042c śleṣmātakavanaṃ gatvā tatra te nyavasan sukham
GE09ram_07_u:780: 7.011.001a sumālī varalabdhāṃs tu jñātvā tān vai niśācarān
GE09ram_07_u:781: 7.011.001c udatiṣṭhad bhayaṃ tyaktvā sānugaḥ sa rasātalāt
GE09ram_07_u:782: 7.011.002a mārīcaś ca prahastaś ca virūpākṣo mahodaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:784: 7.011.003a sumālī caiva taiḥ sarvair vṛto rākṣasapuṃgavaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:787: 7.011.004c yas tvaṃ tribhuvaṇaśreṣṭhāl labdhavān varam īdṛśam
GE09ram_07_u:788: 7.011.005a yatkṛte ca vayaṃ laṅkāṃ tyaktvā yātā rasātalam
GE09ram_07_u:789: 7.011.005c tad gataṃ no mahābāho mahad viṣṇukṛtaṃ bhayam
GE09ram_07_u:790: 7.011.006a asakṛt tena bhagnā hi parityajya svam ālayam
GE09ram_07_u:791: 7.011.006c vidrutāḥ sahitāḥ sarve praviṣṭāḥ sma rasātalam
GE09ram_07_u:794: 7.011.008a yadi nāmātra śakyaṃ syāt sāmnā dānena vānagha
GE09ram_07_u:795: 7.011.008c tarasā vā mahābāho pratyānetuṃ kṛtaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_07_u:796: 7.011.009a tvaṃ ca laṅkeśvaras tāta bhaviṣyasi na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:797: 7.011.009c sarveṣāṃ naḥ prabhuś caiva bhaviṣyasi mahābala
GE09ram_07_u:799: 7.011.010c vitteśo gurur asmākaṃ nārhasy evaṃ prabhāṣitum
GE09ram_07_u:801: 7.011.011c prahastaḥ praśritaṃ vākyam idam āha sakāraṇam
GE09ram_07_u:802: 7.011.012a daśagrīva mahābāho nārhas tvaṃ vaktum īdṛśam
GE09ram_07_u:803: 7.011.012c saubhrātraṃ nāsti śūrāṇāṃ śṛṇu cedaṃ vaco mama
GE09ram_07_u:804: 7.011.013a aditiś ca ditiś caiva bhaginyau sahite kila
GE09ram_07_u:810: 7.011.016a nihatya tāṃs tu samare viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā
GE09ram_07_u:811: 7.011.016c devānāṃ vaśam ānītaṃ trailokyam idam avyayam
GE09ram_07_u:812: 7.011.017a naitad eko bhavān eva kariṣyati viparyayam
GE09ram_07_u:813: 7.011.017c surair ācaritaṃ pūrvaṃ kuruṣvaitad vaco mama
GE09ram_07_u:815: 7.011.018c cintayitvā muhūrtaṃ vai bāḍham ity eva so 'bravīt
GE09ram_07_u:816: 7.011.019a sa tu tenaiva harṣeṇa tasminn ahani vīryavān
GE09ram_07_u:817: 7.011.019c vanaṃ gato daśagrīvaḥ saha taiḥ kṣaṇadācaraiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:818: 7.011.020a trikūṭasthaḥ sa tu tadā daśagrīvo niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:820: 7.011.021a prahasta śīghraṃ gatvā tvaṃ brūhi nairṛtapuṃgavam
GE09ram_07_u:821: 7.011.021c vacanān mama vitteśaṃ sāmapūrvam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:822: 7.011.022a iyaṃ laṅkā purī rājan rākṣasānāṃ mahātmanām
GE09ram_07_u:823: 7.011.022c tvayā niveśitā saumya naitad yuktaṃ tavānagha
GE09ram_07_u:824: 7.011.023a tad bhavān yadi sāmnaitāṃ dadyād atulavikrama
GE09ram_07_u:825: 7.011.023c kṛtā bhaven mama prītir dharmaś caivānupālitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:826: 7.011.024a ity uktaḥ sa tadā gatvā prahasto vākyakovidaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:828: 7.011.025a prahastād api saṃśrutya devo vaiśravaṇo vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:830: 7.011.026a brūhi gaccha daśagrīvaṃ purī rājyaṃ ca yan mama
GE09ram_07_u:832: 7.011.027a sarvaṃ kartāsmi bhadraṃ te rākṣaseśa vaco 'cirāt
GE09ram_07_u:833: 7.011.027c kiṃ tu tāvat pratīkṣasva pitur yāvan nivedaye
GE09ram_07_u:834: 7.011.028a evam uktvā dhanādhyakṣo jagāma pitur antikam
GE09ram_07_u:836: 7.011.029a eṣa tāta daśagrīvo dūtaṃ preṣitavān mama
GE09ram_07_u:838: 7.011.029e mayātra yad anuṣṭheyaṃ tan mamācakṣva suvrata
GE09ram_07_u:839: 7.011.030a brahmarṣis tv evam ukto 'sau viśravā munipuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:840: 7.011.030c uvāca dhanadaṃ vākyaṃ śṛṇu putra vaco mama
GE09ram_07_u:843: 7.011.032a sa krodhena mayā cokto dhvaṃsasveti punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:844: 7.011.032c śreyo'bhiyuktaṃ dharmyaṃ ca śṛṇu putra vaco mama
GE09ram_07_u:846: 7.011.033c na vetti mama śāpāc ca prakṛtiṃ dāruṇāṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:849: 7.011.035a tatra mandākinī ramyā nadīnāṃ pravarā nadī
GE09ram_07_u:851: 7.011.036a na hi kṣamaṃ tvayā tena vairaṃ dhanadarakṣasā
GE09ram_07_u:852: 7.011.036c jānīṣe hi yathānena labdhaḥ paramako varaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:853: 7.011.037a evam ukto gṛhītvā tu tad vacaḥ pitṛgauravāt
GE09ram_07_u:855: 7.011.038a prahastas tu daśagrīvaṃ gatvā sarvaṃ nyavedayat
GE09ram_07_u:856: 7.011.038c śūnyā sā nagarī laṅkā triṃśadyojanam āyatā
GE09ram_07_u:857: 7.011.038e praviśya tāṃ sahāsmābhiḥ svadharmaṃ tatra pālaya
GE09ram_07_u:858: 7.011.039a evam uktaḥ prahastena rāvaṇo rākṣasas tadā
GE09ram_07_u:872: 7.012.003a atha dattvā svasāraṃ sa mṛgayāṃ paryaṭan nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:873: 7.012.003c tatrāpaśyat tato rāma mayaṃ nāma diteḥ sutam
GE09ram_07_u:875: 7.012.004c apṛcchat ko bhavan eko nirmanuṣya mṛge vane
GE09ram_07_u:876: 7.012.005a mayas tv athābravīd rāma pṛcchantaṃ taṃ niśācaram
GE09ram_07_u:877: 7.012.005c śrūyatāṃ sarvam ākhyāsye yathāvṛttam idaṃ mama
GE09ram_07_u:878: 7.012.006a hemā nāmāpsarās tāta śrutapūrvā yadi tvayā
GE09ram_07_u:879: 7.012.006c daivatair mama sā dattā paulomīva śatakratoḥ
GE09ram_07_u:881: 7.012.007c sā ca daivata kāryeṇa gatā varṣaṃ caturdaśam
GE09ram_07_u:882: 7.012.008a tasyāḥ kṛte ca hemāyāḥ sarvaṃ hemapuraṃ mayā
GE09ram_07_u:884: 7.012.009a tatrāham aratiṃ vindaṃs tayā hīnaḥ suduḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:885: 7.012.009c tasmāt purād duhitaraṃ gṛhītvā vanam āgataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:886: 7.012.010a iyaṃ mamātmajā rājaṃs tasyāḥ kukṣau vivardhitā
GE09ram_07_u:887: 7.012.010c bhartāram anayā sārdham asyāḥ prāpto 'smi mārgitum
GE09ram_07_u:889: 7.012.011c kanyā hi dve kule nityaṃ saṃśaye sthāpya tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_07_u:890: 7.012.012a dvau sutau tu mama tv asyāṃ bhāryāyāṃ saṃbabhūvatuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:892: 7.012.013a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yāthātathyena pṛcchataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:893: 7.012.013c tvām idānīṃ kathaṃ tāta jānīyāṃ ko bhavān iti
GE09ram_07_u:894: 7.012.014a evam ukto rākṣasendro vinītam idam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:895: 7.012.014c ahaṃ paulastya tanayo daśagrīvaś ca nāmataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:896: 7.012.015a brahmarṣes taṃ sutaṃ jñātvā mayo harṣam upāgataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:897: 7.012.015c dātuṃ duhitaraṃ tasya rocayām āsa tatra vai
GE09ram_07_u:898: 7.012.016a prahasan prāha daityendro rākṣasendram idaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:901: 7.012.017a bāḍham ity eva taṃ rāma daśagrīvo 'bhyabhāṣata
GE09ram_07_u:903: 7.012.018a na hi tasya mayo rāma śāpābhijñas tapodhanāt
GE09ram_07_u:904: 7.012.018c viditvā tena sā dattā tasya paitāmahaṃ kulam
GE09ram_07_u:905: 7.012.019a amoghāṃ tasya śaktiṃ ca pradadau paramādbhutām
GE09ram_07_u:906: 7.012.019c pareṇa tapasā labdhāṃ jaghnivāṃl lakṣmaṇaṃ yayā
GE09ram_07_u:907: 7.012.020a evaṃ sa kṛtadāro vai laṅkāyām īśvaraḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:908: 7.012.020c gatvā tu nagaraṃ bhārye bhrātṛbhyāṃ samudāvahat
GE09ram_07_u:912: 7.012.022c saramā nāma dharmajño lebhe bhāryāṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:913: 7.012.023a tīre tu sarasaḥ sā vai saṃjajñe mānasasya ca
GE09ram_07_u:914: 7.012.023c mānasaṃ ca saras tāta vavṛdhe jaladāgame
GE09ram_07_u:915: 7.012.024a mātrā tu tasyāḥ kanyāyāḥ snehanākranditaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:916: 7.012.024c saro mā vardhatety uktaṃ tataḥ sā saramābhavat
GE09ram_07_u:917: 7.012.025a evaṃ te kṛtadārā vai remire tatra rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:918: 7.012.025c svāṃ svāṃ bhāryām upādāya gandharvā iva nandane
GE09ram_07_u:920: 7.012.026c sa eṣa indrajin nāma yuṣmābhir abhidhīyate
GE09ram_07_u:923: 7.012.028a jaḍīkṛtāyāṃ laṅkāyāṃ tena nādena tasya vai
GE09ram_07_u:924: 7.012.028c pitā tasyākaron nāma meghanāda iti svayam
GE09ram_07_u:927: 7.013.001a atha lokeśvarotsṛṣṭā tatra kālena kena cit
GE09ram_07_u:930: 7.013.002c nidrā māṃ bādhate rājan kārayasva mamālayam
GE09ram_07_u:933: 7.013.004a vistīrṇaṃ yojanaṃ śubhraṃ tato dviguṇam āyatam
GE09ram_07_u:935: 7.013.005a sphāṭikaiḥ kāñcanaiś citraiḥ stambhaiḥ sarvatra śobhitam
GE09ram_07_u:938: 7.013.006c sarvartusukhadaṃ nityaṃ meroḥ puṇyāṃ guhām iva
GE09ram_07_u:944: 7.013.009c tāni gatvā susaṃkruddho bhinatti sma daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:945: 7.013.010a nadīṃ gaja iva krīḍan vṛkṣān vāyur iva kṣipan
GE09ram_07_u:946: 7.013.010c nagān vajra iva sṛṣṭo vidhvaṃsayati nityaśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:947: 7.013.011a tathā vṛttaṃ tu vijñāya daśagrīvaṃ dhaneśvaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:950: 7.013.012c laṅkāṃ saṃpreṣayām āsa daśagrīvasya vai hitam
GE09ram_07_u:951: 7.013.013a sa gatvā nagarīṃ laṅkām āsasāda vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_07_u:952: 7.013.013c mānitas tena dharmeṇa pṛṣṭhaś cāgamanaṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:953: 7.013.014a pṛṣṭvā ca kuśalaṃ rājño jñātīn api ca bāndhavān
GE09ram_07_u:954: 7.013.014c sabhāyāṃ darśayām āsa tam āsīnaṃ daśānanam
GE09ram_07_u:955: 7.013.015a sa dṛṣṭvā tatra rājānaṃ dīpyamānaṃ svatejasā
GE09ram_07_u:959: 7.013.017a rājan vadāmi te sarvaṃ bhrātā tava yad abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:960: 7.013.017c ubhayoḥ sadṛśaṃ saumya vṛttasya ca kulasya ca
GE09ram_07_u:962: 7.013.018c sādhu dharme vyavasthānaṃ kriyatāṃ yadi śakyate
GE09ram_07_u:963: 7.013.019a dṛṣṭaṃ me nandanaṃ bhagnam ṛṣayo nihatāḥ śrutāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:964: 7.013.019c devānāṃ tu samudyogas tvatto rājañ śrutaś ca me
GE09ram_07_u:966: 7.013.020c aparāddhā hi bālyāc ca rakṣaṇīyāḥ svabāndhavāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:967: 7.013.021a ahaṃ tu himavatpṛṣṭhaṃ gato dharmam upāsitum
GE09ram_07_u:969: 7.013.022a tatra devo mayā dṛṣṭaḥ saha devyomayā prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:970: 7.013.022c savyaṃ cakṣur mayā caiva tatra devyāṃ nipātitam
GE09ram_07_u:971: 7.013.023a kā nv iyaṃ syād iti śubhā na khalv anyena hetunā
GE09ram_07_u:972: 7.013.023c rūpaṃ hy anupamaṃ kṛtvā tatra krīḍati pārvatī
GE09ram_07_u:973: 7.013.024a tato devyāḥ prabhāvena dagdhaṃ savyaṃ mamekṣaṇam
GE09ram_07_u:975: 7.013.025a tato 'ham anyad vistīrṇaṃ gatvā tasya gires taṭam
GE09ram_07_u:977: 7.013.026a samāpte niyame tasmiṃs tatra devo maheśvaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:978: 7.013.026c prītaḥ prītena manasā prāha vākyam idaṃ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:980: 7.013.027c mayā caitad vrataṃ cīrṇaṃ tvayā caiva dhanādhipa
GE09ram_07_u:981: 7.013.028a tṛtīyaḥ puruṣo nāsti yaś cared vratam īdṛśam
GE09ram_07_u:982: 7.013.028c vrataṃ suduścaraṃ hy etan mayaivotpāditaṃ purā
GE09ram_07_u:983: 7.013.029a tat sakhitvaṃ mayā sārdhaṃ rocayasva dhaneśvara
GE09ram_07_u:984: 7.013.029c tapasā nirjitatvād dhi sakhā bhava mamānagha
GE09ram_07_u:985: 7.013.030a devyā dagdhaṃ prabhāvena yac ca sāvyaṃ tavekṣaṇam
GE09ram_07_u:986: 7.013.030c ekākṣi piṅgalety eva nāma sthāsyati śāśvatam
GE09ram_07_u:987: 7.013.031a evaṃ tena sakhitvaṃ ca prāpyānujñāṃ ca śaṃkarāt
GE09ram_07_u:988: 7.013.031c āgamya ca śruto 'yaṃ me tava pāpaviniścayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:990: 7.013.032c cintyate hi vadhopāyaḥ sarṣisaṃghaiḥ surais tava
GE09ram_07_u:992: 7.013.033c hastān dantāṃś a saṃpīḍya vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:993: 7.013.034a vijñātaṃ te mayā dūta vākyaṃ yat tvaṃ prabhāṣase
GE09ram_07_u:994: 7.013.034c naiva tvam asi naivāsau bhrātrā yenāsi preṣitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:995: 7.013.035a hitaṃ na sa mamaitad dhi bravīti dhanarakṣakaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:997: 7.013.036a na hantavyo gurur jyeṣṭho mamāyam iti manyate
GE09ram_07_u:998: 7.013.036c tasya tv idānīṃ śrutvā me vākyam eṣā kṛtā matiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:999: 7.013.037a trīṃl lokān api jeṣyāmi bāhuvīryam upāśritaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1000: 7.013.037c etan muhūrtam eṣo 'haṃ tasyaikasya kṛte ca vai
GE09ram_07_u:1002: 7.013.038a evam uktvā tu laṅkeśo dūtaṃ khaḍgena jaghnivān
GE09ram_07_u:1003: 7.013.038c dadau bhakṣayituṃ hy enaṃ rākṣasānāṃ durātmanām
GE09ram_07_u:1006: 7.014.001a tataḥ sa sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ ṣaḍbhir nityaṃ balotkaṭaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1009: 7.014.002c vṛtaḥ saṃprayayau śrīmān krodhāl lokān dahann iva
GE09ram_07_u:1010: 7.014.003a purāṇi sa nadīḥ śailān vanāny upavanāni ca
GE09ram_07_u:1012: 7.014.004a taṃ niviṣṭaṃ girau tasmin rākṣasendraṃ niśamya tu
GE09ram_07_u:1013: 7.014.004c rājño bhrātāyam ity uktvā gatā yatra dhaneśvaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1014: 7.014.005a gatvā tu sarvam ācakhyur bhrātus tasya viniścayam
GE09ram_07_u:1015: 7.014.005c anujñātā yayuś caiva yuddhāya dhanadena te
GE09ram_07_u:1019: 7.014.007c vyathitāś cābhavaṃs tatra sacivās tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1020: 7.014.008a taṃ dṛṣṭvā tādṛśaṃ sainyaṃ daśagrīvo niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1021: 7.014.008c harṣān nādaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā roṣāt samabhivartata
GE09ram_07_u:1022: 7.014.009a ye tu te rākṣasendrasya sacivā ghoravikramaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1029: 7.014.012c praviveśa tataḥ sainyaṃ nayan yakṣān yamakṣayam
GE09ram_07_u:1033: 7.014.014c alpāvaśiṣṭās te yakṣāḥ kṛtā vātair ivāmbudāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1034: 7.014.015a ke cit tv āyudhabhagnāṅgāḥ patitāḥ samarakṣitau
GE09ram_07_u:1035: 7.014.015c oṣṭhān svadaśanais tīkṣṇair daṃśanto bhuvi pātitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1037: 7.014.016c niṣedus te tadā yakṣāḥ kūlā jalahatā iva
GE09ram_07_u:1045: 7.014.020c taṃ yakṣaṃ yodhayām āsa sa ca bhagnaḥ pradudruve
GE09ram_07_u:1050: 7.014.023a tatas toraṇam utpāṭya tena yakṣeṇa tāḍitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1052: 7.014.023e na kṣitiṃ prayayau rāma varāt salilayoninaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1053: 7.014.024a sa tu tenaiva taṃ yakṣaṃ toraṇena samāhanat
GE09ram_07_u:1054: 7.014.024c nādṛśyata tadā yakṣo bhasma tena kṛtas tu saḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1055: 7.014.025a tataḥ pradudruvuḥ sarve yakṣā dṛṣṭvā parākramam
GE09ram_07_u:1056: 7.014.025c tato nadīr guhāś caiva viviśur bhayapīḍitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1057: 7.015.001a tatas tān vidrutān dṛṣṭvā yakṣāñ śatasahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1058: 7.015.001c svayam eva dhanādhyakṣo nirjagāma raṇaṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:1063: 7.015.004a tataḥ prahastena tadā sahasraṃ nihataṃ raṇe
GE09ram_07_u:1065: 7.015.005a kruddhena ca tadā rāma mārīcena durātmanā
GE09ram_07_u:1068: 7.015.006c musalenorasi krodhāt tāḍito na ca kampitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1070: 7.015.007c dhūmrākṣas tāḍito mūrdhni vihvalo nipapāta ha
GE09ram_07_u:1076: 7.015.010c tasya tena prahāreṇa mukuṭaḥ pārśvam āgataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1077: 7.015.010e tadā prabhṛti yakṣo 'sau pārśvamaulir iti smṛtaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1078: 7.015.011a tasmiṃs tu vimukhe yakṣe māṇibhadre mahātmani
GE09ram_07_u:1079: 7.015.011c saṃnādaḥ sumahān rāma tasmiñ śaile vyavardhata
GE09ram_07_u:1082: 7.015.013a sa dṛṣṭvā bhrātaraṃ saṃkhye śāpād vibhraṣṭagauravam
GE09ram_07_u:1083: 7.015.013c uvāca vacanaṃ dhīmān yuktaṃ paitāmahe kule
GE09ram_07_u:1085: 7.015.014c paścād asya phalaṃ prāpya jñāsyase nirayaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1086: 7.015.015a yo hi mohād viṣaṃ pītvā nāvagacchati mānavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1087: 7.015.015c pariṇāme sa vi mūḍho jānīte karmaṇaḥ phalam
GE09ram_07_u:1088: 7.015.016a daivatāni hi nandanti dharmayuktena kena cit
GE09ram_07_u:1089: 7.015.016c yena tvam īdṛśaṃ bhāvaṃ nītas tac ca na budhyase
GE09ram_07_u:1090: 7.015.017a yo hi mātṝh pitṝn bhrātṝn ācaryāṃś cāvamanyate
GE09ram_07_u:1091: 7.015.017c sa paśyati phalaṃ tasya pretarājavaśaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1092: 7.015.018a adhruve hi śarīre yo na karoti tapo 'rjanam
GE09ram_07_u:1093: 7.015.018c sa paścāt tapyate mūḍho mṛto dṛṣṭvātmano gatim
GE09ram_07_u:1094: 7.015.019a kasya cin na hi durbudheś chandato jāyate matiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1095: 7.015.019c yādṛśaṃ kurute karma tādṛśaṃ phalam aśnute
GE09ram_07_u:1096: 7.015.020a buddhiṃ rūpaṃ balaṃ vittaṃ putrān māhātmyam eva ca
GE09ram_07_u:1098: 7.015.021a evaṃ nirayagāmī tvaṃ yasya te matir īdṛśī
GE09ram_07_u:1100: 7.015.022a evam uktvā tatas tena tasyāmātyāḥ samāhatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1103: 7.015.023c gadayābhihato mūrdhni na ca sthānād vyakampata
GE09ram_07_u:1104: 7.015.024a tatas tau rāma nighnantāv anyonyaṃ paramāhave
GE09ram_07_u:1105: 7.015.024c na vihvalau na ca śrāntau babhūvatur amarṣaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1106: 7.015.025a āgneyam astraṃ sa tato mumoca dhanado raṇe
GE09ram_07_u:1108: 7.015.026a tato māyāṃ praviṣṭaḥ sa rākṣasīṃ rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1109: 7.015.026c jaghāna mūrdhni dhanadaṃ vyāvidhya mahatīṃ gadām
GE09ram_07_u:1112: 7.015.028a tataḥ padmādibhis tatra nidhibhiḥ sa dhanādhipaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1113: 7.015.028c nandanaṃ vanam ānīya dhanado śvāsitas tadā
GE09ram_07_u:1114: 7.015.029a tato nirjitya taṃ rāma dhanadaṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1118: 7.015.031a tat tu rājā samāruhya kāmagaṃ vīryanirjitam
GE09ram_07_u:1120: 7.016.001a sa jitvā bhrātaraṃ rāma dhanadaṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1124: 7.016.003a parvataṃ sa samāsādya kiṃ cid ramyavanāntaram
GE09ram_07_u:1125: 7.016.003c apaśyat puṣpakaṃ tatra rāma viṣṭambhitaṃ divi
GE09ram_07_u:1126: 7.016.004a viṣṭabdhaṃ puṣpakaṃ dṛṣṭvā kāmagaṃ hy agamaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:1127: 7.016.004c rākṣasaś cintayām āsa sacivais taiḥ samāvṛtaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1128: 7.016.005a kim idaṃ yannimittaṃ me na ca gacchati puṣpakam
GE09ram_07_u:1129: 7.016.005c parvatasyoparisthasya kasya karma tv idaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_07_u:1131: 7.016.006c naitan niṣkāraṇaṃ rājan puṣpako 'yaṃ na gacchati
GE09ram_07_u:1136: 7.016.009c prāṇinām eva sarveṣām agamyaḥ parvataḥ kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1137: 7.016.010a sa roṣāt tāmranayanaḥ puṣpakād avaruhya ca
GE09ram_07_u:1138: 7.016.010c ko 'yaṃ śaṃkara ity uktvā śailamūlam upāgamat
GE09ram_07_u:1140: 7.016.011c dīptaṃ śūlam avaṣṭabhya dvitīyam iva śaṃkaram
GE09ram_07_u:1141: 7.016.012a sa vānaramukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā tam avajñāya rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1142: 7.016.012c prahāsaṃ mumuce maurkhyāt satoya iva toyadaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1146: 7.016.014c maurkhyāt tvam avajānīṣe parihāsaṃ ca muñcasi
GE09ram_07_u:1148: 7.016.015c utpatsyante vadhārthaṃ hi kulasya tava vānarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1149: 7.016.016a kiṃ tv idānīṃ mayā śakyaṃ kartuṃ yat tvāṃ niśācara
GE09ram_07_u:1150: 7.016.016c na hantavyo hatas tvaṃ hi pūrvam eva svakarmabhiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1152: 7.016.017c parvataṃ taṃ samāsādya vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:1153: 7.016.018a puṣpakasya gatiś chinnā yatkṛte mama gacchataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1154: 7.016.018c tad etac chailam unmūlaṃ karomi tava gopate
GE09ram_07_u:1155: 7.016.019a kena prabhāvena bhavas tatra krīḍati rājavat
GE09ram_07_u:1157: 7.016.020a evam uktvā tato rājan bhujān prakṣipya parvate
GE09ram_07_u:1159: 7.016.021a tato rāma mahādevaḥ prahasan vīkṣya tatkṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:1160: 7.016.021c pādāṅguṣṭhena taṃ śailaṃ pīḍayām āsa līlayā
GE09ram_07_u:1161: 7.016.022a tatas te pīḍitās tasya śailasyādho gatā bhujāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1162: 7.016.022c vismitāś cābhavaṃs tatra sacivās tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1163: 7.016.023a rakṣasā tena roṣāc ca bhujānāṃ pīḍanāt tathā
GE09ram_07_u:1164: 7.016.023c mukto virāvaḥ sumahāṃs trailokyaṃ yena pūritam
GE09ram_07_u:1166: 7.016.024c devatāś cāpi saṃkṣubdhāś calitāḥ sveṣu karmasu
GE09ram_07_u:1167: 7.016.025a tataḥ prīto mahādevaḥ śailāgre viṣṭhitas tadā
GE09ram_07_u:1168: 7.016.025c muktvā tasya bhujān rājan prāha vākyaṃ daśānanam
GE09ram_07_u:1169: 7.016.026a prīto 'smi tava vīryāc ca śauṇḍīryāc ca niśācara
GE09ram_07_u:1171: 7.016.027a yasmāl lokatrayaṃ tv etad rāvitaṃ bhayam āgatam
GE09ram_07_u:1172: 7.016.027c tasmāt tvaṃ rāvaṇo nāma nāmnā tena bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_07_u:1173: 7.016.028a devatā mānuṣā yakṣā ye cānye jagatītale
GE09ram_07_u:1175: 7.016.029a gaccha paulastya visrabdhaḥ pathā yena tvam icchasi
GE09ram_07_u:1181: 7.017.001a atha rājan mahābāhur vicaran sa mahītalam
GE09ram_07_u:1184: 7.017.002c ārṣeṇa vidhinā yuktāṃ tapantīṃ devatām iva
GE09ram_07_u:1185: 7.017.003a sa dṛṣṭvā rūpasaṃpannāṃ kanyāṃ tāṃ sumahāvratām
GE09ram_07_u:1187: 7.017.004a kim idaṃ vartase bhadre viruddhaṃ yauvanasya te
GE09ram_07_u:1188: 7.017.004c na hi yuktā tavaitasya rūpasyeyaṃ pratikriyā
GE09ram_07_u:1189: 7.017.005a kasyāsi duhitā bhadre ko vā bhartā tavānaghe
GE09ram_07_u:1190: 7.017.005c pṛcchataḥ śaṃsa me śīghraṃ ko vā hetus tapo'rjane
GE09ram_07_u:1191: 7.017.006a evam uktā tu sā kanyā tenānāryeṇa rakṣasā
GE09ram_07_u:1193: 7.017.007a kuśadhvajo nāma pitā brahmarṣir mama dhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1196: 7.017.008c saṃbhūtā vānmayī kanyā nāmnā vedavatī smṛtā
GE09ram_07_u:1198: 7.017.009c te cāpi gatvā pitaraṃ varaṇaṃ rocayanti me
GE09ram_07_u:1199: 7.017.010a na ca māṃ sa pitā tebhyo dattavān rākṣaseśvara
GE09ram_07_u:1201: 7.017.011a pitus tu mama jāmātā viṣṇuḥ kila surottamaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1202: 7.017.011c abhipretas trilokeśas tasmān nānyasya me pitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1203: 7.017.012a dātum icchati dharmātmā tac chrutvā baladarpitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1204: 7.017.012c śambhur nāma tato rājā daityānāṃ kupito 'bhavat
GE09ram_07_u:1205: 7.017.012e tena rātrau prasupto me pitā pāpena hiṃsitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1206: 7.017.013a tato me jananī dīnā tac charīraṃ pitur mama
GE09ram_07_u:1208: 7.017.014a tato manorathaṃ satyaṃ pitur nārāyaṇaṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:1209: 7.017.014c karomīti mamecchā ca hṛdaye sādhu viṣṭhitā
GE09ram_07_u:1211: 7.017.015c iti pratijñām āruhya carāmi vipulaṃ tapaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1212: 7.017.016a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ mayā rākṣasapuṃgava
GE09ram_07_u:1214: 7.017.017a vijñātas tvaṃ hi me rājan gaccha paulastyanandana
GE09ram_07_u:1215: 7.017.017c jānāmi tapasā sarvaṃ trailokye yad dhi vartate
GE09ram_07_u:1216: 7.017.018a so 'bravīd rāvaṇas tatra tāṃ kanyāṃ sumahāvratām
GE09ram_07_u:1218: 7.017.019a avaliptāsi suśroṇi yasyās te matir īdṛśī
GE09ram_07_u:1222: 7.017.021a kaś ca tāvad asau yaṃ tvaṃ viṣṇur ity abhibhāṣase
GE09ram_07_u:1223: 7.017.021c vīryeṇa tapasā caiva bhogena ca balena ca
GE09ram_07_u:1224: 7.017.021e na mayāsau samo bhadre yaṃ tvaṃ kāmayase 'ṅgane
GE09ram_07_u:1225: 7.017.022a ma maivam iti sā kanyā tam uvāca niśācaram
GE09ram_07_u:1226: 7.017.022c mūrdhajeṣu ca tāṃ rakṣaḥ karāgreṇa parāmṛśat
GE09ram_07_u:1227: 7.017.023a tato vedavatī kruddhā keśān hastena sācchinat
GE09ram_07_u:1230: 7.017.024c rakṣas tasmāt pravekṣyāmi paśyatas te hutāśanam
GE09ram_07_u:1231: 7.017.025a yasmāt tu dharṣitā cāham apāpā cāpy anāthavat
GE09ram_07_u:1232: 7.017.025c tasmāt tava vadhārthaṃ vai samutpatsyāmy ahaṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1233: 7.017.026a na hi śakyaḥ striyā pāpa hantuṃ tvaṃ tu viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1234: 7.017.026c śāpe tvayi mayotsṛṣṭe tapasaś ca vyayo bhavet
GE09ram_07_u:1235: 7.017.027a yadi tv asti mayā kiṃ cit kṛtaṃ dattaṃ hutaṃ tathā
GE09ram_07_u:1236: 7.017.027c tena hy ayonijā sādhvī bhaveyaṃ dharmiṇaḥ sutā
GE09ram_07_u:1237: 7.017.028a evam uktvā praviṣṭā sā jvalantaṃ vai hutāśanam
GE09ram_07_u:1238: 7.017.028c papāta ca divo divyā puṣpavṛṣṭiḥ samantataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1239: 7.017.029a pūrvaṃ krodhahataḥ śatrur yayāsau nihatas tvayā
GE09ram_07_u:1243: 7.017.031a eṣā vedavatī nāma pūrvam āsīt kṛte yuge
GE09ram_07_u:1246: 7.018.001a praviṣṭāyāaṃ hutāśaṃ tu vedavatyāṃ sa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1248: 7.018.002a tato maruttaṃ nṛpatiṃ yajantaṃ saha daivataiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1249: 7.018.002c uśīrabījam āsādya dadarśa sa tu rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1250: 7.018.003a saṃvarto nāma brahmarṣir bhrātā sākṣād bṛhaspateḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1251: 7.018.003c yājayām āsa dharmajñaḥ sarvair brahmagaṇair vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1252: 7.018.004a dṛṣṭvā devās tu tad rakṣo varadānena durjayam
GE09ram_07_u:1253: 7.018.004c tāṃ tāṃ yoniṃ samāpannās tasya dharṣaṇabhīravaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1254: 7.018.005a indro mayūraḥ saṃvṛtto dharmarājas tu vāyasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1256: 7.018.006a taṃ ca rājānam āsādya rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1257: 7.018.006c prāha yuddhaṃ prayacceti nirjito 'smīti vā vada
GE09ram_07_u:1258: 7.018.007a tato marutto nṛpatiḥ ko bhavān ity uvāca tam
GE09ram_07_u:1259: 7.018.007c avahāsaṃ tato muktvā rākṣaso vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:1262: 7.018.009a triṣu lokeṣu kaḥ so 'sti yo na jānāti me balam
GE09ram_07_u:1263: 7.018.009c bhrātaraṃ yena nirjitya vimānam idam āhṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:1264: 7.018.010a tato marutto nṛpatis taṃ rākṣasam athābravīt
GE09ram_07_u:1265: 7.018.010c dhanyaḥ khalu bhavān yena jyeṣṭho bhrātā raṇe jitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1268: 7.018.012a kiṃ tvaṃ prāk kevalaṃ dharmaṃ caritvā labdhavān varam
GE09ram_07_u:1269: 7.018.012c śrutapūrvaṃ hi na mayā yādṛśaṃ bhāṣase svayam
GE09ram_07_u:1270: 7.018.013a tataḥ śarāsanaṃ gṛhya sāyakāṃś ca sa pārthivaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1271: 7.018.013c raṇāya niryayau kruddhaḥ saṃvarto mārgam āvṛṇot
GE09ram_07_u:1272: 7.018.014a so 'bravīt snehasaṃyuktaṃ maruttaṃ taṃ mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1273: 7.018.014c śrotavyaṃ yadi madvākyaṃ saṃprahāro na te kṣamaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1274: 7.018.015a māheśvaram idaṃ satram asamāptaṃ kulaṃ dahet
GE09ram_07_u:1275: 7.018.015c dīkṣitasya kuto yuddhaṃ krūratvaṃ dīkṣite kutaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1276: 7.018.016a saṃśayaś ca raṇe nityaṃ rākṣasaś caiṣa durjayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1277: 7.018.016c sa nivṛtto guror vākyān maruttaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1279: 7.018.017a tatas taṃ nirjitaṃ matvā ghoṣayām āsa vai śukaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1280: 7.018.017c rāvaṇo jitavāṃś ceti harṣān nādaṃ ca muktavān
GE09ram_07_u:1281: 7.018.018a tān bhakṣayitvā tatrasthān maharṣīn yajñam āgatān
GE09ram_07_u:1282: 7.018.018c vitṛpto rudhirais teṣāṃ punaḥ saṃprayayau mahīm
GE09ram_07_u:1283: 7.018.019a rāvaṇe tu gate devāḥ sendrāś caiva divaukasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1284: 7.018.019c tataḥ svāṃ yonim āsādya tāni sattvāny athābruvan
GE09ram_07_u:1287: 7.018.021a mama netrasahasraṃ yat tat te barhe bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:1289: 7.018.022a nīlāḥ kila purā barhā mayūrāṇāṃ narādhipa
GE09ram_07_u:1290: 7.018.022c surādhipād varaṃ prāpya gatāḥ sarve vicitratām
GE09ram_07_u:1292: 7.018.023c pakṣiṃs tavāsmi suprītaḥ prītasya ca vacaḥ śṛṇu
GE09ram_07_u:1293: 7.018.024a yathānye vividhai rogaiḥ pīḍyante prāṇino mayā
GE09ram_07_u:1294: 7.018.024c te na te prabhaviṣyanti mayi prīte na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1295: 7.018.025a mṛtyutas te bhayaṃ nāsti varān mama vihaṃgama
GE09ram_07_u:1296: 7.018.025c yāvat tvāṃ na vadhiṣyanti narās tāvad bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_07_u:1297: 7.018.026a ye ca madviṣayasthās tu mānavāḥ kṣudhayārditāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1298: 7.018.026c tvayi bhukte tu tṛptās te bhaviṣyanti sabāndhavāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1304: 7.018.029c prāpsyase cātulāṃ prītim etan me prītilakṣaṇam
GE09ram_07_u:1305: 7.018.030a haṃsānāṃ hi purā rāma na varṇaḥ sarvapāṇḍuraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1308: 7.018.031c hairaṇyaṃ saṃprayacchāmi varṇaṃ prītis tavāpy aham
GE09ram_07_u:1309: 7.018.032a sadravyaṃ ca śiro nityaṃ bhaviṣyati tavākṣayam
GE09ram_07_u:1310: 7.018.032c eṣa kāñcanako varṇo matprītyā te bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:1311: 7.018.033a evaṃ dattvā varāṃs tebhyas tasmin yajñotsave surāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1312: 7.018.033c nivṛtte saha rājñā vai punaḥ svabhavanaṃ gatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1313: 7.019.001a atha jitvā maruttaṃ sa prayayau rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1316: 7.019.002c abravīd rākṣasendras tu yuddhaṃ me dīyatām iti
GE09ram_07_u:1317: 7.019.003a nirjitāḥ smeti vā brūta eṣo hi mama niścayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1318: 7.019.003c anyathā kurvatām evaṃ mokṣo vo nopapadyate
GE09ram_07_u:1319: 7.019.004a tatas tu bahavaḥ prājñāḥ pārthivā dharmaṇiścayāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1320: 7.019.004c nirjitāḥ smety abhāṣanta jñātvā varabalaṃ ripoḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1321: 7.019.005a duṣyantaḥ suratho gādhir gayo rājā purūravāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1322: 7.019.005c ete sarve 'bruvaṃs tāta nirjitāḥ smeti pārthivāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1325: 7.019.007a prāha rājānam āsādya yuddhaṃ me saṃpradīyatām
GE09ram_07_u:1326: 7.019.007c nirjito 'smīti vā brūhi mamaitad iha śāsanam
GE09ram_07_u:1329: 7.019.009a atha pūrvaṃ śrutārthena sajjitaṃ sumahad dhi yat
GE09ram_07_u:1333: 7.019.011a tad rāvaṇabalaṃ prāpya balaṃ tasya mahīpateḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1334: 7.019.011c prāṇaśyata tadā rājan havyaṃ hutam ivānale
GE09ram_07_u:1335: 7.019.012a so 'paśyata narendras tu naśyamānaṃ mahad balam
GE09ram_07_u:1339: 7.019.014a tato bāṇaśatāny aṣṭau pātayām āsa mūrdhani
GE09ram_07_u:1341: 7.019.015a tasya bāṇāḥ patantas te cakrire na kṣataṃ kva cit
GE09ram_07_u:1344: 7.019.016c talena bhihato mūrdhni sa rathān nipapāta ha
GE09ram_07_u:1345: 7.019.017a sa rājā patito bhūmau vihvalāṅgaḥ pravepitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1348: 7.019.018c kim idānīṃ tvayā prāptaṃ phalaṃ māṃ prati yudhyatā
GE09ram_07_u:1349: 7.019.019a trailokye nāsti yo dvandvaṃ mama dadyān narādhipa
GE09ram_07_u:1350: 7.019.019c śaṅke pramatto bhogeṣu na śṛṇoṣi balaṃ mama
GE09ram_07_u:1351: 7.019.020a tasyaivaṃ bruvato rājā mandāsur vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:1352: 7.019.020c kiṃ śakyam iha kartuṃ vai yat kālo duratikramaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1353: 7.019.021a na hy ahaṃ nirjito rakṣas tvayā cātmapraśaṃsinā
GE09ram_07_u:1354: 7.019.021c kāleneha vipanno 'haṃ hetubhūtas tu me bhavān
GE09ram_07_u:1355: 7.019.022a kiṃ tv idānīṃ mayā śakyaṃ kartuṃ prāṇaparikṣaye
GE09ram_07_u:1357: 7.019.023a yadi dattaṃ yadi hutaṃ yadi me sukṛtaṃ tapaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1358: 7.019.023c yadi guptāḥ prajāḥ samyak tathā satyaṃ vaco 'stu me
GE09ram_07_u:1359: 7.019.024a utpatsyate kule hy asminn ikṣvākūṇāṃ mahātmanām
GE09ram_07_u:1360: 7.019.024c rājā paramatejasvī yas te prāṇān hariṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:1362: 7.019.025c tasminn udāhṛte śāpe puṣpavṛṣṭiś ca khāc cyutā
GE09ram_07_u:1363: 7.019.026a tataḥ sa rājā rājendra gataḥ sthānaṃ triviṣṭapam
GE09ram_07_u:1364: 7.019.026c svargate ca nṛpe rāma rākṣasaḥ sa nyavartata
GE09ram_07_u:1372: 7.020.004c tvayā samaramardaiś ca bhṛśaṃ hi paritoṣitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1373: 7.020.005a kiṃ cid vakṣyāmi tāvat te śrotavyaṃ śroṣyase yadi
GE09ram_07_u:1375: 7.020.006a kim ayaṃ vadhyate lokas tvayāvadhyena daivataiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1376: 7.020.006c hata eva hy ayaṃ loko yadā mṛtyuvaśaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1378: 7.020.007c lokam enaṃ vicitrārthaṃ yasya na jñāyate gatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1379: 7.020.008a kva cid vāditranṛttāni sevyante muditair janaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1382: 7.020.009c mohenāyaṃ jano dhvastaḥ kleśaṃ svaṃ nāvabudhyate
GE09ram_07_u:1383: 7.020.010a tat kim evaṃ parikliśya lokaṃ mohanirākṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:1384: 7.020.010c jita eva tvayā saumya martyaloko na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1385: 7.020.011a evam uktas tu laṅkeśo dīpyamāna ivaujasā
GE09ram_07_u:1389: 7.020.013a tato lokatrayaṃ jitvā sthāpya nāgān surān vaśe
GE09ram_07_u:1392: 7.020.014c kva khalv idānīṃ mārgeṇa tvayānena gamiṣyate
GE09ram_07_u:1393: 7.020.015a ayaṃ khalu sudurgamyaḥ pitṛrājñaḥ puraṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:1395: 7.020.016a sa tu śāradameghābhaṃ muktvā hāsaṃ daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1396: 7.020.016c uvāca kṛtam ity eva vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:1398: 7.020.017c gacchāmi dakṣiṇām āśāṃ yatra sūryātmajo nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1399: 7.020.018a mayā hi bhagavan krodhāt pratijñātaṃ raṇārthinā
GE09ram_07_u:1403: 7.020.020a evam uktvā daśagrīvo muniṃ tam abhivādya ca
GE09ram_07_u:1404: 7.020.020c prayayau dakṣiṇām āśāṃ prahṛṣṭaiḥ saha mantribhiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1405: 7.020.021a nāradas tu mahātejā muhūrtaṃ dhyānam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1406: 7.020.021c cintayām āsa viprendro vidhūma iva pāvakaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1407: 7.020.022a yena lokās trayaḥ sendrāḥ kliśyante sacarācarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1408: 7.020.022c kṣīṇe cāyuṣi dharme ca sa kālo hiṃsyate katham
GE09ram_07_u:1409: 7.020.023a yasya nityaṃ trayo lokā vidravanti bhayārditāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1411: 7.020.024a yo vidhātā ca dhātā ca sukṛte duṣkṛte yathā
GE09ram_07_u:1412: 7.020.024c trailokyaṃ vijitaṃ yena taṃ kathaṃ nu vijeṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:1413: 7.020.025a aparaṃ kiṃ nu kṛtvaivaṃ vidhānaṃ saṃvidhāsyati
GE09ram_07_u:1416: 7.021.001c ākhyātuṃ tad yathāvṛttaṃ yamasya sadanaṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:1417: 7.021.002a apaśyat sa yamaṃ tatra devam agnipuraskṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:1419: 7.021.003a sa tu dṛṣṭvā yamaḥ prāptaṃ maharṣiṃ tatra nāradam
GE09ram_07_u:1420: 7.021.003c abravīt sukham āsīnam arghyam āvedya dharmataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1421: 7.021.004a kaccit kṣemaṃ nu devarṣe kaccid dharmo na naśyati
GE09ram_07_u:1423: 7.021.005a abravīt tu tadā vākyaṃ nārado bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1426: 7.021.006c upayāti vaśaṃ netuṃ vikramais tvāṃ sudurjayam
GE09ram_07_u:1430: 7.021.008c dadṛśe divyam āyāntaṃ vimānaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1431: 7.021.009a taṃ deśaṃ prabhayā tasya puṣpakasya mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1433: 7.021.010a sa tv apaśyan mahābāhur daśagrīvas tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1434: 7.021.010c prāṇinaḥ sukṛtaṃ karma bhuñjānāṃś caiva duṣkṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:1435: 7.021.011a tatas tān vadhyamānāṃs tu karmabhir duṣkṛtaiḥ svakaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1436: 7.021.011c rāvaṇo mocayām āsa vikrameṇa balād balī
GE09ram_07_u:1439: 7.021.013a te prāsaiḥ parighaiḥ śūlair mudgaraiḥ śaktitomaraiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1442: 7.021.014c puṣpakasya babhañjus te śīghraṃ madhukarā iva
GE09ram_07_u:1446: 7.021.016c ayudhyanta mahāvīryāḥ sa ca rājā daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1449: 7.021.018a anyonyaṃ ca mahābhāgā jaghnuḥ praharaṇair yudhi
GE09ram_07_u:1450: 7.021.018c yamasya ca mahat sainyaṃ rākṣasasya ca mantriṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1451: 7.021.019a amātyāṃs tāṃs tu saṃtyajya rākṣasasya mahaujasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1457: 7.021.022a tāṃs tu sarvān samākṣipya tad astram apahatya ca
GE09ram_07_u:1458: 7.021.022c jaghnus te rākṣasaṃ ghoram ekaṃ śatasahasrakaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1459: 7.021.023a parivārya ca taṃ sarve śailaṃ meghotkarā iva
GE09ram_07_u:1460: 7.021.023c bhindipālaiś ca śūlaiś ca nirucchvāsam akārayan
GE09ram_07_u:1463: 7.021.025a tataḥ sa kārmukī bāṇī pṛthivyāṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1465: 7.021.026a tataḥ pāśupataṃ divyam astraṃ saṃdhāya kārmuke
GE09ram_07_u:1466: 7.021.026c tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti tān uktvā tac cāpaṃ vyapakarṣata
GE09ram_07_u:1467: 7.021.027a jvālāmālī sa tu śaraḥ kravyādānugato raṇe
GE09ram_07_u:1468: 7.021.027c mukto gulmān drumāṃś caiva bhasmakṛtvā pradhāvati
GE09ram_07_u:1469: 7.021.028a te tasya tejasā dagdhāḥ sainyā vaivasvatasya tu
GE09ram_07_u:1470: 7.021.028c raṇe tasmin nipatitā dāvadagdhā nagā iva
GE09ram_07_u:1471: 7.021.029a tataḥ sa sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ rākṣaso bhīmavikramaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1473: 7.022.001a sa tu tasya mahānādaṃ śrutvā vaivasvato yamaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1474: 7.022.001c śatruṃ vijayinaṃ mene svabalasya ca saṃkṣayam
GE09ram_07_u:1475: 7.022.002a sa tu yodhān hatān matvā krodhaparyākulekṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1477: 7.022.003a tasya sūto rathaṃ divyam upasthāpya mahāsvanam
GE09ram_07_u:1478: 7.022.003c sthitaḥ sa ca mahātejā āruroha mahāratham
GE09ram_07_u:1481: 7.022.005a kāladaṇḍaś ca pārśvastho mūrtimān syandane sthitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1483: 7.022.006a tato lokās trayas trastāḥ kampante ca divaukasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1485: 7.022.007a dṛṣṭvā tu te taṃ vikṛtaṃ rathaṃ mṛtyusamanvitam
GE09ram_07_u:1488: 7.022.008c nātra yoddhuṃ samarthāḥ sma ity uktvā vipradudruvuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1489: 7.022.009a sa tu taṃ tādṛśaṃ dṛṣṭvā rathaṃ lokabhayāvaham
GE09ram_07_u:1490: 7.022.009c nākṣubhyata tadā rakṣo vyathā caivāsya nābhavat
GE09ram_07_u:1491: 7.022.010a sa tu rāvaṇam āsādya visṛjañ śaktitomarān
GE09ram_07_u:1493: 7.022.011a rāvaṇas tu sthitaḥ svasthaḥ śaravarṣaṃ mumoca ha
GE09ram_07_u:1498: 7.022.013c saptarātraṃ kṛte saṃkhye na bhagno vijito 'pi vā
GE09ram_07_u:1501: 7.022.015a tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1503: 7.022.016a saṃvarta iva lokānām abhavad yudhyatos tayoḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1504: 7.022.016c rākṣasānāṃ ca mukhyasya pretānām īśvarasya ca
GE09ram_07_u:1505: 7.022.017a rākṣasendras tataḥ kruddhaś cāpam āyamya saṃyuge
GE09ram_07_u:1506: 7.022.017c nirantaram ivākāśaṃ kurvan bāṇān mumoca ha
GE09ram_07_u:1507: 7.022.018a mṛtyuṃ caturbhir viśikhaiḥ sūtaṃ saptabhir ardayat
GE09ram_07_u:1512: 7.022.020c krodhajaṃ pāvakaṃ dīptaṃ didhakṣantaṃ ripor balam
GE09ram_07_u:1514: 7.022.021c muñca māṃ deva śīghraṃ tvaṃ nihanmi samare ripum
GE09ram_07_u:1515: 7.022.022a narakaḥ śambaro vṛtraḥ śambhuḥ kārtasvaro balī
GE09ram_07_u:1516: 7.022.022c namucir virocanaś caiva tāv ubhau madhukaiṭabhau
GE09ram_07_u:1517: 7.022.023a ete cānye ca bahavo balavanto durāsadāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1518: 7.022.023c vinipannā mayā dṛṣṭāḥ kā cintāsmin niśācare
GE09ram_07_u:1519: 7.022.024a muñca māṃ sādhu dharmajña yāvad enaṃ nihanmy aham
GE09ram_07_u:1520: 7.022.024c na hi kaś cin mayā dṛṣṭo muhūrtam api jīvati
GE09ram_07_u:1521: 7.022.025a balaṃ mama na khalv etan maryādaiṣā nisargataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1522: 7.022.025c saṃspṛṣṭo hi mayā kaś cin na jīved iti niścayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1523: 7.022.026a etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā dharmarājaḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_07_u:1524: 7.022.026c abravīt tatra taṃ mṛtyumayam enaṃ nihanmy aham
GE09ram_07_u:1526: 7.022.027c kāladaṇḍam amoghaṃ taṃ tolayām āsa pāṇinā
GE09ram_07_u:1529: 7.022.029a darśanād eva yaḥ prāṇān prāṇinām uparudhyati
GE09ram_07_u:1530: 7.022.029c kiṃ punas tāḍanād vāpi pīḍanād vāpi dehinaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1531: 7.022.030a sa jvālāparivāras tu pibann iva niśācaram
GE09ram_07_u:1533: 7.022.031a tato vidudruvuḥ sarve sattvās tasmād raṇājirāt
GE09ram_07_u:1534: 7.022.031c surāś ca kṣubhitā dṛṣṭvā kāladaṇḍodyataṃ yamam
GE09ram_07_u:1535: 7.022.032a tasmin prahartukāme tu daṇḍam udyamya rāvaṇam
GE09ram_07_u:1539: 7.022.034a varaḥ khalu mayā dattas tasya tridaśapuṃgava
GE09ram_07_u:1540: 7.022.034c tat tvayā nānṛtaṃ kāryaṃ yan mayā vyāhṛtaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1541: 7.022.035a amogho hy eṣa sarvāsāṃ prajānāṃ vinipātane
GE09ram_07_u:1543: 7.022.036a tan na khalv eṣa te saumya pātyo rākṣasamūrdhani
GE09ram_07_u:1544: 7.022.036c na hy asmin patite kaś cin muhūrtam api jīvati
GE09ram_07_u:1545: 7.022.037a yadi hy asmin nipatite na mriyetaiṣa rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1548: 7.022.038c satyaṃ mama kuruṣvedaṃ lokāṃs tvaṃ samavekṣya ca
GE09ram_07_u:1549: 7.022.039a evam uktas tu dharmātmā pratyuvāca yamas tadā
GE09ram_07_u:1550: 7.022.039c eṣa vyāvartito daṇḍaḥ prabhaviṣṇur bhavān hi naḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1551: 7.022.040a kiṃ tv idānīṃ mayā śakyaṃ kartuṃ raṇagatena hi
GE09ram_07_u:1552: 7.022.040c yan mayā yan na hantavyo rākṣaso varadarpitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1553: 7.022.041a eṣa tasmāt praṇaśyāmi darśanād asya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1555: 7.022.042a daśagrīvas tu taṃ jitvā nāma viśrāvya cātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1558: 7.022.043c jagāma tridivaṃ hṛṣṭo nāradaś ca mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1559: 7.023.001a sa tu jitvā daśagrīvo yamaṃ tridaśapuṃgavam
GE09ram_07_u:1560: 7.023.001c rāvaṇas tu jayaślāghī svasahāyān dadarśa ha
GE09ram_07_u:1562: 7.023.002c puṣpakaṃ bhejire sarve sāntvitā ravaṇena ha
GE09ram_07_u:1563: 7.023.003a tato rasātalaṃ hṛṣṭaḥ praviṣṭaḥ payaso nidhim
GE09ram_07_u:1565: 7.023.004a sa tu bhogavatīṃ gatvā purīṃ vāsukipālitām
GE09ram_07_u:1566: 7.023.004c sthāpya nāgān vaśe kṛtvā yayau maṇimatīṃ purīm
GE09ram_07_u:1569: 7.023.006a te tu sarve suvikrāntā daiteyā balaśālinaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1571: 7.023.007a teṣāṃ tu yudhyamānānāṃ sāgraḥ saṃvatsaro gataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1572: 7.023.007c na cānyatarayos tatra vijayo vā kṣayo 'pi vā
GE09ram_07_u:1577: 7.023.010a na hy ayaṃ rāvaṇo yuddhe śakyo jetuṃ surāsuraiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1578: 7.023.010c na bhavantaḥ kṣayaṃ netuṃ śakyāḥ sendraiḥ surāsuraiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1579: 7.023.011a rākṣasasya sakhitvaṃ vai bhavadbhiḥ saha rocate
GE09ram_07_u:1580: 7.023.011c avibhaktā hi sarvārthāḥ suhṛdāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1584: 7.023.013c svapurān nirviśeṣaṃ ca pūjāṃ prāpto daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1585: 7.023.014a sa tūpadhārya māyānāṃ śatam ekonam ātmavān
GE09ram_07_u:1588: 7.023.015c taṃ vijitya muhūrtena jaghne daityāṃś catuḥśatam
GE09ram_07_u:1591: 7.023.017a kṣarantīṃ ca payo nityaṃ surabhiṃ gām avasthitām
GE09ram_07_u:1595: 7.023.018e amṛtaṃ yatra cotpannaṃ surā cāpi surāśinām
GE09ram_07_u:1596: 7.023.019a yāṃ bruvanti narā loke surabhiṃ nāma nāmataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1597: 7.023.019c pradakṣiṇaṃ tu tāṃ kṛtvā rāvaṇaḥ paramādbhutām
GE09ram_07_u:1601: 7.023.021a tato hatvā balādhyakṣān samare taiś ca tāḍitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1602: 7.023.021c abravīt kva gato yo vo rājā śīghraṃ nivedyatām
GE09ram_07_u:1603: 7.023.022a yuddhārthī rāvaṇaḥ prāptas tasya yuddhaṃ pradīyatām
GE09ram_07_u:1604: 7.023.022c vada vā na bhayaṃ te 'sti nirjito 'smīti sāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1606: 7.023.023c putrāḥ pautrāś ca niṣkrāman gauś ca puṣkara eva ca
GE09ram_07_u:1607: 7.023.024a te tu vīryaguṇopetā balaiḥ parivṛtāḥ svakaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1612: 7.023.026c vāruṇaṃ tad balaṃ kṛtsnaṃ kṣaṇena vinipātitam
GE09ram_07_u:1613: 7.023.027a samīkṣya svabalaṃ saṃkhye varuṇasyā sutās tadā
GE09ram_07_u:1615: 7.023.028a mahītalagatās te tu rāvaṇaṃ dṛśya puṣpake
GE09ram_07_u:1617: 7.023.029a mahad āsīt tatas teṣāṃ tulyaṃ sthānam avāpya tat
GE09ram_07_u:1619: 7.023.030a tatas te rāvaṇaṃ yuddhe śaraiḥ pāvakasaṃnibhaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1621: 7.023.031a tato mahodaraḥ kruddho rājānaṃ dṛśya dharṣitam
GE09ram_07_u:1623: 7.023.032a tena teṣāṃ hayā ye ca kāmagāḥ pavanopamāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1624: 7.023.032c mahodareṇa gadayā hatās te prayayuḥ kṣitim
GE09ram_07_u:1625: 7.023.033a teṣāṃ varuṇasūnūnāṃ hatvā yodhān hayāṃś ca tān
GE09ram_07_u:1626: 7.023.033c mumocāśu mahānādaṃ virathān prekṣya tān sthitān
GE09ram_07_u:1627: 7.023.034a te tu teṣāṃ rathāḥ sāśvāḥ saha sārathibhir varaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1629: 7.023.035a te tu tyaktvā rathān putrā varuṇasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1630: 7.023.035c ākāśe viṣṭhitāḥ śūrāḥ svaprabhāvān na vivyathuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1633: 7.023.037a tataḥ kruddho daśagrīvaḥ kālāgnir iva viṣṭhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1636: 7.023.038c paṭṭasāṃś caiva śaktīś ca śataghnīs tomarāṃs tathā
GE09ram_07_u:1637: 7.023.038e pātayām āsa durdharṣas teṣām upari viṣṭhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1638: 7.023.039a atha viddhās tu te vīrā viniṣpetuḥ padātayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1639: 7.023.040a tato rakṣo mahānādaṃ muktvā hanti sma vāruṇān
GE09ram_07_u:1641: 7.023.041a tatas te vimukhāḥ sarve patitā dharaṇītale
GE09ram_07_u:1642: 7.023.041c raṇāt svapuruṣaiḥ śīghraṃ gṛhāṇy eva praveśitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1643: 7.023.042a tān abravīt tato rakṣo varuṇāya nivedyatām
GE09ram_07_u:1644: 7.023.042c rāvaṇaṃ cābravīn mantrī prabhāso nāma vāruṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1646: 7.023.043c gāndharvaṃ varuṇaḥ śrotuṃ yaṃ tvam āhvayase yudhi
GE09ram_07_u:1647: 7.023.044a tat kiṃ tava vṛthā vīra pariśrāmya gate nṛpe
GE09ram_07_u:1648: 7.023.044c ye tu saṃnihitā vīrāḥ kumārās te parājitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1649: 7.023.045a rākṣasendras tu tac chrutvā nāma viśrāvya cātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1650: 7.023.045c harṣān nādaṃ vimuñcan vai niṣkrānto varuṇālayāt
GE09ram_07_u:1651: 7.023.046a āgatas tu pathā yena tenaiva vinivṛtya saḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1655: 7.024.002a darśanīyāṃ hi yāṃ rakṣaḥ kanyāṃ strīṃ vātha paśyati
GE09ram_07_u:1658: 7.024.003c daityānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca kanyā jagrāha rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1665: 7.024.007a kā cid dadhyau suduḥkhārtā hanyād api hi mām ayam
GE09ram_07_u:1666: 7.024.007c smṛtvā mātṝh pitṝn bhrātṝn putrān vai śvaśurān api
GE09ram_07_u:1668: 7.024.008a kathaṃ nu khalu me putraḥ kariṣyati mayā vinā
GE09ram_07_u:1669: 7.024.008c kathaṃ mātā kathaṃ bhrātā nimagnāḥ śokasāgare
GE09ram_07_u:1670: 7.024.009a hā kathaṃ nu kariṣyāmi bhartāraṃ daivataṃ vinā
GE09ram_07_u:1671: 7.024.009c mṛtyo prasīda yāce tvāṃ naya māṃ yamasādanam
GE09ram_07_u:1672: 7.024.010a kiṃ nu me duṣkṛtaṃ karma kṛtaṃ dehāntare purā
GE09ram_07_u:1674: 7.024.011a na khalv idānīṃ paśyāmi duḥkhasyāntam ihātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1675: 7.024.011c aho dhin mānuṣāṃl lokān nāsti khalv adhamaḥ paraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1676: 7.024.012a yad durbalā balavatā bāndhavā rāvaṇena me
GE09ram_07_u:1679: 7.024.013c aho durvṛttam ātmānaṃ svayam eva na budhyate
GE09ram_07_u:1682: 7.024.015a yasmād eṣa parakhyāsu strīṣu rajyati durmatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1683: 7.024.015c tasmād dhi strīkṛtenaiva vadhaṃ prāpsyati vāraṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1684: 7.024.016a śaptaḥ strībhiḥ sa tu tadā hatatejāḥ suniṣprabha
GE09ram_07_u:1691: 7.024.019c abravīt kim idaṃ bhadre vaktum arhasi me drutam
GE09ram_07_u:1693: 7.024.020c hatāsmi vidhavā rājaṃs tvayā balavatā kṛtā
GE09ram_07_u:1694: 7.024.021a ete viryāt tvayā rājan daityā vinihatā raṇe
GE09ram_07_u:1696: 7.024.022a tatra me nihato bhartā garīyāñ jīvitād api
GE09ram_07_u:1697: 7.024.022c sa tvayā dayitas tatra bhrātrā śatrusamena vai
GE09ram_07_u:1698: 7.024.023a yā tvayāsmi hatā rājan svayam eveha bandhunā
GE09ram_07_u:1699: 7.024.023c duḥkhaṃ vaidhavyaśabdaṃ ca dattaṃ bhokṣyāmy ahaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_07_u:1700: 7.024.024a nanu nāma tvayā rakṣyo jāmātā samareṣv api
GE09ram_07_u:1701: 7.024.024c taṃ nihatya raṇe rājan svayam eva na lajjase
GE09ram_07_u:1702: 7.024.025a evam uktas tayā rakṣo bhaginyā krośamānayā
GE09ram_07_u:1703: 7.024.025c abravīt sāntvayitvā tāṃ sāmapūrvam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1704: 7.024.026a alaṃ vatse viṣādena na bhetavyaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1706: 7.024.027a yuddhe pramatto vyākṣipto jayakāṅkṣī kṣipañ śarān
GE09ram_07_u:1707: 7.024.027c nāvagacchāmi yuddheṣu svān parān vāpy ahaṃ śubhe
GE09ram_07_u:1708: 7.024.027e tenāsau nihataḥ saṃkhye mayā bhartā tava svasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1709: 7.024.028a asmin kāle tu yat prāptaṃ tat kariṣyāmi te hitam
GE09ram_07_u:1712: 7.024.029c prabhuḥ prayāṇe dāne ca rākṣasānāṃ mahaujasām
GE09ram_07_u:1713: 7.024.030a tatra mātṛṣvasuḥ putro bhrātā tava kharaḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1714: 7.024.030c bhaviṣyati sadā kurvan yad vakṣyasi vacaḥ svayam
GE09ram_07_u:1715: 7.024.031a śīghraṃ gacchatv ayaṃ śūro daṇḍakān parirakṣitum
GE09ram_07_u:1717: 7.024.032a sa hi śapto vanoddeśaḥ kruddhenośanasā purā
GE09ram_07_u:1718: 7.024.032c rākṣasānām ayaṃ vāso bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1719: 7.024.033a evam uktvā daśagrīvaḥ sainyaṃ tasyādideśa ha
GE09ram_07_u:1721: 7.024.034a sa taiḥ sarvaiḥ parivṛto rākṣasair ghoradarśanaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1723: 7.024.035a sa tatra kārayām āsa rājyaṃ nihatakaṇṭakam
GE09ram_07_u:1724: 7.024.035c sā ca śūrpaṇakhā prītā nyavasad daṇḍakāvane
GE09ram_07_u:1725: 7.025.001a sa tu dattvā daśagrīvo vanaṃ ghoraṃ kharasya tat
GE09ram_07_u:1727: 7.025.002a tato nikumbhilā nāma laṅkāyāḥ kānanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_07_u:1730: 7.025.003c dadarśa viṣṭhitaṃ yajñaṃ saṃpradīptam iva śriyā
GE09ram_07_u:1734: 7.025.005c abravīt kim idaṃ vatsa vartate tad bravīhi me
GE09ram_07_u:1735: 7.025.006a uśanā tv abravīt tatra gurur yajñasamṛddhaye
GE09ram_07_u:1737: 7.025.007a aham ākhyāmi te rājañ śrūyatāṃ sarvam eva ca
GE09ram_07_u:1738: 7.025.007c yajñās te sapta putreṇa prāptāḥ subahuvistarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1740: 7.025.008c rājasūyas tathā yajño gomedho vaiṣṇavas tathā
GE09ram_07_u:1741: 7.025.009a māheśvare pravṛtte tu yajñe pumbhiḥ sudurlabhe
GE09ram_07_u:1742: 7.025.009c varāṃs te labdhavān putraḥ sākṣāt paśupater iha
GE09ram_07_u:1744: 7.025.010c māyāṃ ca tāmasīṃ nāma yayā saṃpadyate tamaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1746: 7.025.011c prayuddhasya gatiḥ śakyā na hi jñātuṃ surāsuraiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1747: 7.025.012a akṣayāv iṣudhī bāṇaiś cāpaṃ cāpi sudurjayam
GE09ram_07_u:1748: 7.025.012c astraṃ ca balavat saumya śatruvidhvaṃsanaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_07_u:1749: 7.025.013a etān sarvān varāṃl labdhvā putras te 'yaṃ daśānana
GE09ram_07_u:1750: 7.025.013c adya yajñasamāptau ca tvatpratīkṣaḥ sthito aham
GE09ram_07_u:1751: 7.025.014a tato 'bravīd daśagrīvo na śobhanam idaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:1753: 7.025.015a ehīdānīṃ kṛtaṃ yad dhi tad akartuṃ na śakyate
GE09ram_07_u:1754: 7.025.015c āgaccha saumya gacchāmaḥ svam eva bhavanaṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:1759: 7.025.018a vibhīṣaṇas tu tā nārīr dṛṣṭvā śokasamākulāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1760: 7.025.018c tasya tāṃ ca matiṃ jñātvā dharmātmā vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:1764: 7.025.020c tvām atikramya madhunā rājan kumbhīnasī hṛtā
GE09ram_07_u:1765: 7.025.021a rāvaṇas tv abravīd vākyaṃ nāvagacchāmi kiṃ tv idam
GE09ram_07_u:1766: 7.025.021c ko vāyaṃ yas tvayākhyāto madhur ity eva nāmataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1767: 7.025.022a vibhīṣaṇas tu saṃkruddho bhrātaraṃ vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:1768: 7.025.022c śrūyatām asya pāpasya karmaṇaḥ phalam āgatam
GE09ram_07_u:1771: 7.025.024a pitur jyeṣṭho jananyāś ca asmākaṃ tv āryako 'bhavat
GE09ram_07_u:1774: 7.025.025c bhavaty asmākam eṣā vai bhrātṝṇāṃ dharmataḥ svasā
GE09ram_07_u:1775: 7.025.026a sā hṛtā madhunā rājan rākṣasena balīyasā
GE09ram_07_u:1778: 7.025.027c dharṣayitvā hṛtā rājan guptā hy antaḥpure tava
GE09ram_07_u:1779: 7.025.028a śrutvā tv etan mahārāja kṣāntam eva hato na saḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1780: 7.025.028c yasmād avaśyaṃ dātavyā kanyā bhartre hi dātṛbhiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1781: 7.025.028e asminn evābhisaṃprāptaṃ loke viditam astu te
GE09ram_07_u:1783: 7.025.029c kalpyatāṃ me rathaḥ śīghraṃ śūrāḥ sajjībhavantu ca
GE09ram_07_u:1784: 7.025.030a bhrātā me kumbhakarṇaś ca ye ca mukhyā niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1786: 7.025.031a adya taṃ samare hatvā madhuṃ rāvaṇanirbhayam
GE09ram_07_u:1788: 7.025.032a tato vijitya tridivaṃ vaśe sthāpya puraṃdaram
GE09ram_07_u:1792: 7.025.034a indrajit tv agrataḥ sainyaṃ sainikān parigṛhya ca
GE09ram_07_u:1793: 7.025.034c rāvaṇo madhyataḥ śūraḥ kumbhakarṇaś ca pṛṣṭhataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1794: 7.025.035a vibhīṣaṇas tu dharmātmā laṅkāyāṃ dharmam ācarat
GE09ram_07_u:1795: 7.025.035c te tu sarve mahābhāgā yayur madhupuraṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:1796: 7.025.036a rathair nāgaiḥ kharair uṣṭrair hayair dīptair mahoragaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1798: 7.025.037a daityāś ca śataśas tatra kṛtavairāḥ suraiḥ saha
GE09ram_07_u:1800: 7.025.038a sa tu gatvā madhupuraṃ praviśya ca daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1801: 7.025.038c na dadarśa madhuṃ tatra bhaginīṃ tatra dṛṣṭavān
GE09ram_07_u:1802: 7.025.039a sā prahvā prāñjalir bhūtvā śirasā pādayor gatā
GE09ram_07_u:1804: 7.025.040a tāṃ samutthāpayām āsa na bhetavyam iti bruvan
GE09ram_07_u:1805: 7.025.040c rāvaṇo rākṣasaśreṣṭhaḥ kiṃ cāpi karavāṇi te
GE09ram_07_u:1806: 7.025.041a sābravīd yadi me rājan prasannas tvaṃ mahābala
GE09ram_07_u:1807: 7.025.041c bhartāraṃ na mamehādya hantum arhasi mānada
GE09ram_07_u:1808: 7.025.042a satyavāg bhava rājendra mām avekṣasva yācatīm
GE09ram_07_u:1809: 7.025.042c tvayā hy uktaṃ mahābāho na bhetavyam iti svayam
GE09ram_07_u:1810: 7.025.043a rāvaṇas tv abravīd dhṛṣṭaḥ svasāraṃ tatra saṃsthitām
GE09ram_07_u:1811: 7.025.043c kva cāsau tava bhartā vai mama śīghraṃ nivedyatām
GE09ram_07_u:1812: 7.025.044a saha tena gamiṣyāmi suralokaṃ jayāya vai
GE09ram_07_u:1814: 7.025.045a ity uktā sā prasuptaṃ taṃ samutthāpya niśācaram
GE09ram_07_u:1816: 7.025.046a eṣa prāpto daśagrīvo mama bhrātā niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1818: 7.025.047a tad asya tvaṃ sahāyārthaṃ sabandhur gaccha rākṣasa
GE09ram_07_u:1820: 7.025.048a tasyās tad vacanaṃ śrutvā tathety āha madhur vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1827: 7.026.001a sa tu tatra daśagrīvaḥ saha sainyena vīryavān
GE09ram_07_u:1832: 7.026.003c padminībhiś ca phullābhir mandākinyā jalair api
GE09ram_07_u:1839: 7.026.007a geyāt puṣpasamṛddhyā ca śaityād vāyor guṇair gireḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1847: 7.026.011a yasya vaktraṃ śaśinibhaṃ bhruvau cāpanibhe śubhe
GE09ram_07_u:1852: 7.026.013a kva gacchasi varārohe kāṃ siddhiṃ bhajase svayam
GE09ram_07_u:1860: 7.026.017a madviśiṣṭaḥ pumān ko 'nyaḥ śakro viṣṇur athāśvinau
GE09ram_07_u:1861: 7.026.017c mām atītya hi yasya tvaṃ yāsi bhīru na śobhanam
GE09ram_07_u:1862: 7.026.018a viśrama tvaṃ pṛthuśroṇi śilātalam idaṃ śubham
GE09ram_07_u:1863: 7.026.018c trailokye yaḥ prabhuś caiva tulyo mama na vidyate
GE09ram_07_u:1864: 7.026.019a tad eṣa prāñjaliḥ prahvo yācate tvāṃ daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1865: 7.026.019c yaḥ prabhuś cāpi bhartā ca trailokyasya bhajasva mām
GE09ram_07_u:1867: 7.026.020c prasīda nārhase vaktum īdṛśaṃ tvaṃ hi me guruḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1868: 7.026.021a anyebhyo 'pi tvayā rakṣyā prāpnuyāṃ dharṣaṇaṃ yadi
GE09ram_07_u:1869: 7.026.021c dharmataś ca snuṣā te 'haṃ tattvam etad bravīmi te
GE09ram_07_u:1871: 7.026.022c sutasya yadi me bhāryā tatas tvaṃ me snuṣā bhaveḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1872: 7.026.023a bāḍham ity eva sā rambhā prāha rāvaṇam uttaram
GE09ram_07_u:1874: 7.026.024a putraḥ priyataraḥ prāṇair bhrātur vaiśravaṇasya te
GE09ram_07_u:1875: 7.026.024c khyāto yas triṣu lokeṣu nalakūbara ity asau
GE09ram_07_u:1876: 7.026.025a dharmato yo bhaved vipraḥ kṣatriyo vīryato bhavet
GE09ram_07_u:1877: 7.026.025c krodhād yaś ca bhaved agniḥ kṣāntyā ca vasudhāsamaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1879: 7.026.026c tam uddiśya ca me sarvaṃ vibhūṣaṇam idaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:1880: 7.026.027a yasya tasya hi nānyasya bhāvo māṃ prati tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_07_u:1881: 7.026.027c tena satyena māṃ rājan moktum arhasy ariṃdama
GE09ram_07_u:1882: 7.026.028a sa hi tiṣṭhati dharmātmā sāmprataṃ matsamutsukaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1883: 7.026.028c tan na vighnaṃ sutasyeha kartum arhasi muñca mām
GE09ram_07_u:1885: 7.026.029c mānanīyo mayā hi tvaṃ lālanīyā tathāsmi te
GE09ram_07_u:1886: 7.026.030a evaṃ bruvāṇāṃ rambhāṃ tāṃ dharmārthasahitaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1887: 7.026.030c nirbhartsya rākṣaso mohāt pratigṛhya balād balī
GE09ram_07_u:1893: 7.026.033a tadavasthāṃ ca tāṃ dṛṣṭvā mahātmā nalakūbaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1894: 7.026.033c abravīt kim idaṃ bhadre pādayoḥ patitāsi me
GE09ram_07_u:1895: 7.026.034a sā tu niśvasamānā ca vepamānātha sāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1897: 7.026.035a eṣa deva daśagrīvaḥ prāpto gantuṃ triviṣṭapam
GE09ram_07_u:1900: 7.026.036c gṛhītvā tena pṛṣṭāsmi kasya tvam iti rakṣasā
GE09ram_07_u:1901: 7.026.037a mayā tu sarvaṃ yat satyaṃ tad dhi tasmai niveditam
GE09ram_07_u:1903: 7.026.038a yācyamāno mayā deva snuṣā te 'ham iti prabho
GE09ram_07_u:1904: 7.026.038c tat sarvaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā balāt tenāsmi dharṣitā
GE09ram_07_u:1905: 7.026.039a evaṃ tvam aparādhaṃ me kṣantum arhasi mānada
GE09ram_07_u:1906: 7.026.039c na hi tulyaṃ balaṃ saumya striyāś ca puruṣasya ca
GE09ram_07_u:1907: 7.026.040a evaṃ śrutvā tu saṃkruddhas tadā vaiśvaraṇātmajaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1908: 7.026.040c dharṣaṇāṃ tāṃ parāṃ śrutvā dhyānaṃ saṃpraviveśa ha
