GE09ram_07_u:1909: 7.026.041a tasya tat karma vijñāya tadā vaiśravaṇātmajaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1913: 7.026.043a akāmā tena yasmāt tvaṃ balād bhadre pradharṣitā
GE09ram_07_u:1914: 7.026.043c tasmāt sa yuvatīm anyāṃ nākāmām upayāsyati
GE09ram_07_u:1915: 7.026.044a yadā tv akāmāṃ kāmārto dharṣayiṣyati yoṣitam
GE09ram_07_u:1916: 7.026.044c mūrdhā tu saptadhā tasya śakalībhavitā tadā
GE09ram_07_u:1918: 7.026.045c devadundubhayo neduḥ puṣpavṛṣṭiś ca khāc cyutā
GE09ram_07_u:1920: 7.026.046c jñātvā lokagatiṃ sarvāṃ tasya mṛtyuṃ ca rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1921: 7.026.047a śrutvā tu sa daśagrīvas taṃ śāpaṃ romaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_07_u:1927: 7.027.003a śrutvā tu rāvaṇaṃ prāptam indraḥ saṃcalitāsanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1928: 7.027.003c abravīt tatra tān devān sarvān eva samāgatān
GE09ram_07_u:1929: 7.027.004a ādityān savasūn rudrān viśvān sādhyān marudgaṇān
GE09ram_07_u:1931: 7.027.005a evam uktās tu śakreṇa devāḥ śakrasamā yudhi
GE09ram_07_u:1933: 7.027.006a sa tu dīnaḥ paritrasto mahendro rāvaṇaṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:1934: 7.027.006c viṣṇoḥ samīpam āgatya vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:1936: 7.027.007c asau hi balavān rakṣo yuddhārtham abhivartate
GE09ram_07_u:1937: 7.027.008a varapradānād balavān na khalv anyena hetunā
GE09ram_07_u:1938: 7.027.008c tac ca satyaṃ hi kartavyaṃ vākyaṃ deva prajāpateḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1939: 7.027.009a tad yathā namucir vṛtro balir narakaśambarau
GE09ram_07_u:1940: 7.027.009c tvan mataṃ samavaṣṭabhya yathā dagdhās tathā kuru
GE09ram_07_u:1941: 7.027.010a na hy anyo deva devānām āpatsu sumahābala
GE09ram_07_u:1942: 7.027.010c gatiḥ parāyaṇaṃ vāsti tvām ṛte puruṣottama
GE09ram_07_u:1943: 7.027.011a tvaṃ hi nārāyaṇaḥ śrīmān padmanābhaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1945: 7.027.012a tad ākhyāhi yathātattvaṃ devadeva mama svayam
GE09ram_07_u:1947: 7.027.013a evam uktaḥ sa śakreṇa devo nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1948: 7.027.013c abravīn na paritrāsaḥ kāryas te śrūyatāṃ ca me
GE09ram_07_u:1949: 7.027.014a na tāvad eṣa durvṛttaḥ śakyo daivatadānavaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1951: 7.027.015a sarvathā tu mahat karma kariṣyati balotkaṭaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1953: 7.027.016a bravīṣi yat tu māṃ śakra saṃyuge yotsyasīti ha
GE09ram_07_u:1955: 7.027.017a anihatya ripuṃ viṣṇur na hi pratinivartate
GE09ram_07_u:1956: 7.027.017c durlabhaś caiṣa kāmo 'dya varam āsādya rākṣase
GE09ram_07_u:1959: 7.027.019a aham enaṃ vadhiṣyāmi rāvaṇaṃ sasutaṃ yudhi
GE09ram_07_u:1968: 7.027.023c akampano nikumbhaś ca śukaḥ sāraṇa eva ca
GE09ram_07_u:1973: 7.027.026a sa hi devagaṇān sarvān nānāpraharaṇaiḥ śitaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1975: 7.027.027a etasminn antare śūro vasūnām aṣṭamo vasuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1977: 7.027.028a tato yuddhaṃ samabhavat surāṇāṃ rākṣasaiḥ saha
GE09ram_07_u:1979: 7.027.029a tatas te rākṣasāḥ śūrā devāṃs tān samare sthitān
GE09ram_07_u:1981: 7.027.030a surās tu rākṣasān ghorān mahāvīryān svatejasā
GE09ram_07_u:1983: 7.027.031a etasminn antare śūraḥ sumālī nāma rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1985: 7.027.032a devānāṃ tad balaṃ sarvaṃ nānāpraharaṇaiḥ śitaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1987: 7.027.033a te mahābāṇavarṣaiś ca śūlaiḥ prāsaiś ca dāruṇaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1988: 7.027.033c pīḍyamānāḥ surāḥ sarve na vyatiṣṭhan samāhitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1991: 7.027.035a saṃvṛtaḥ svair anīkais tu praharantaṃ niśācaram
GE09ram_07_u:1993: 7.027.036a sumattayos tayor āsīd yuddhaṃ loke sudāruṇam
GE09ram_07_u:1997: 7.027.038a hatvā tu saṃyuge tasya rathaṃ bāṇaśataiḥ śitaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1998: 7.027.038c gadāṃ tasya vadhārthāya vasur jagrāha pāṇinā
GE09ram_07_u:2001: 7.027.040a tasya mūrdhani solkābhā patantī ca tadā babhau
GE09ram_07_u:2003: 7.027.041a tasya naivāsthi kāyo vā na māṃsaṃ dadṛśe tadā
GE09ram_07_u:2005: 7.027.042a taṃ dṛṣṭvā nihataṃ saṃkhye rākṣasās te samantataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2008: 7.028.001c vidrutaṃ cāpi svaṃ sainyaṃ lakṣayitvārditaṃ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2009: 7.028.002a tataḥ sa balavān kruddho rāvaṇasya suto yudhi
GE09ram_07_u:2012: 7.028.003c abhidudrāva senāṃ tāṃ vanāny agnir iva jvalan
GE09ram_07_u:2014: 7.028.004c vidudruvur diśaḥ sarvā devās tasya ca darśanāt
GE09ram_07_u:2015: 7.028.005a na tatrāvasthitaḥ kaś cid raṇe tasya yuyutsataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2017: 7.028.006a na bhetavyaṃ na gantavyaṃ nivartadhvaṃ raṇaṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:2018: 7.028.006c eṣa gacchati me putro yuddhārtham aparājitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2019: 7.028.007a tataḥ śakrasuto devo jayanta iti viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2021: 7.028.008a tatas te tridaśāḥ sarve parivārya śacīsutam
GE09ram_07_u:2023: 7.028.009a teṣāṃ yuddhaṃ mahad abhūt sadṛśaṃ devarakṣasām
GE09ram_07_u:2027: 7.028.011a śacīsutas tv api tathā jayantas tasya sārathim
GE09ram_07_u:2028: 7.028.011c taṃ caiva rāvaṇiṃ kruddhaḥ pratyavidhyad raṇājire
GE09ram_07_u:2031: 7.028.013a tataḥ pragṛhya śastrāṇi sāravanti mahānti ca
GE09ram_07_u:2034: 7.028.014a tataḥ pravyathitā lokāḥ saṃjajñe ca tamo mahat
GE09ram_07_u:2036: 7.028.015a tatas tad daivatabalaṃ samantāt taṃ śacīsutam
GE09ram_07_u:2037: 7.028.015c bahuprakāram asvasthaṃ tatra tatra sma dhāvati
GE09ram_07_u:2038: 7.028.016a nābhyajānaṃs tadānyonyaṃ śatrūn vā daivatāni vā
GE09ram_07_u:2040: 7.028.017a etasminn antare śūraḥ pulomā nāma vīryavān
GE09ram_07_u:2042: 7.028.018a gṛhītvā taṃ tu naptāraṃ praviṣṭaḥ sa mahodadhim
GE09ram_07_u:2043: 7.028.018c mātāmaho 'ryakas tasya paulomī yena sā śacī
GE09ram_07_u:2046: 7.028.020a rāvaṇis tv atha saṃhṛṣṭo balaiḥ parivṛtaḥ svakaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2047: 7.028.020c abhyadhāvata devāṃs tān mumoca ca mahāsvanam
GE09ram_07_u:2048: 7.028.021a dṛṣṭvā praṇāśaṃ putrasya rāvaṇeś cāpi vikramam
GE09ram_07_u:2050: 7.028.022a sa tu divyo mahābhīmaḥ sajja eva mahārathaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2052: 7.028.023a tato meghā rathe tasmiṃs taḍidvanto mahāsvanāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2056: 7.028.025a rudrair vasubhir ādityaiḥ sādhyaiś ca samarudgaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2058: 7.028.026a nirgacchatas tu śakrasya paruṣaṃ pavano vavau
GE09ram_07_u:2059: 7.028.026c bhāskaro niṣprabhaś cāsīn maholkāś ca prapedire
GE09ram_07_u:2066: 7.028.030a putraṃ taṃ vārayitvāsau svayam eva vyavasthitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2068: 7.028.031a tato yuddhaṃ pravṛttaṃ tu surāṇāṃ rākṣasaiḥ saha
GE09ram_07_u:2071: 7.028.032c nājñāyata tadā yuddhe saha kenāpy ayudhyata
GE09ram_07_u:2073: 7.028.033c yena kenaiva saṃrabdhas tāḍayām āsa vai surān
GE09ram_07_u:2075: 7.028.034c prayuddhas taiś ca saṃgrāme kṛttaḥ śastrair nirantaram
GE09ram_07_u:2076: 7.028.035a tatas tad rākṣasaṃ sainyaṃ tridaśaiḥ samarudgaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2078: 7.028.036a ke cid vinihatāḥ śastrair veṣṭanti sma mahītale
GE09ram_07_u:2079: 7.028.036c vāhaneṣv avasaktāś ca sthitā evāpare raṇe
GE09ram_07_u:2080: 7.028.037a rathān nāgān kharān uṣṭrān pannagāṃs turagāṃs tathā
GE09ram_07_u:2082: 7.028.038a tān samāliṅgya bāhubhyāṃ viṣṭabdhāḥ ke cid ucchritāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2083: 7.028.038c devais tu śastrasaṃviddhā mamrire ca niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2089: 7.028.041c nirīkṣya tad balaṃ sarvaṃ daivatair vinipātitam
GE09ram_07_u:2092: 7.028.043a tataḥ śakro mahac cāpaṃ visphārya sumahāsvanam
GE09ram_07_u:2093: 7.028.043c yasya visphāraghoṣeṇa svananti sma diśo daśa
GE09ram_07_u:2094: 7.028.044a tad vikṛṣya mahac cāpam indro rāvaṇamūrdhani
GE09ram_07_u:2099: 7.028.046c nājñāyata tadā kiṃ cit sarvaṃ hi tamasā vṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:2100: 7.029.001a tatas tamasi saṃjāte rākṣasā daivataiḥ saha
GE09ram_07_u:2102: 7.029.002a tatas tu devasainyena rākṣasānāṃ mahad balam
GE09ram_07_u:2103: 7.029.002c daśāṃśaṃ sthāpitaṃ yuddhe śeṣaṃ nītaṃ yamakṣayam
GE09ram_07_u:2104: 7.029.003a tasmiṃs tu tamasā naddhe sarve te devarākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2106: 7.029.004a indraś ca rāvaṇaś caiva rāvaṇiś ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2107: 7.029.004c tasmiṃs tamojālavṛte moham īyur na te trayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2108: 7.029.005a sa tu dṛṣṭvā balaṃ sarvaṃ nihataṃ rāvaṇo raṇe
GE09ram_07_u:2109: 7.029.005c krodham abhyāgamat tīvraṃ mahānādaṃ ca muktavān
GE09ram_07_u:2110: 7.029.006a krodhāt sūtaṃ ca durdharṣaḥ syandanastham uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:2112: 7.029.007a adyaitāṃs tridaśān sarvān vikramaiḥ samare svayam
GE09ram_07_u:2114: 7.029.008a aham indraṃ vadhiṣyāmi varuṇaṃ dhanadaṃ yamam
GE09ram_07_u:2116: 7.029.009a viṣādo na ca kartavyaḥ śīghraṃ vāhaya me ratham
GE09ram_07_u:2117: 7.029.009c dviḥ khalu tvāṃ bravīmy adya yāvadantaṃ nayasva mām
GE09ram_07_u:2118: 7.029.010a ayaṃ sa nandanoddeśo yatra vartāmahe vayam
GE09ram_07_u:2119: 7.029.010c naya mām adya tatra tvam udayo yatra parvataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2120: 7.029.011a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā turagān sa manojavān
GE09ram_07_u:2122: 7.029.012a tasya taṃ niścayaṃ jñātvā śakro deveśvaras tadā
GE09ram_07_u:2123: 7.029.012c rathasthaḥ samarasthāṃs tān devān vākyam athābravīt
GE09ram_07_u:2124: 7.029.013a surāḥ śṛṇuta madvākyaṃ yat tāvan mama rocate
GE09ram_07_u:2125: 7.029.013c jīvann eva daśagrīvaḥ sādhu rakṣo nigṛhyatām
GE09ram_07_u:2126: 7.029.014a eṣa hy atibalaḥ sainye rathena pavanaujasā
GE09ram_07_u:2128: 7.029.015a na hy eṣa hantuṃ śakyo 'dya varadānāt sunirbhayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2129: 7.029.015c tad grahīṣyāmahe rakṣo yattā bhavata saṃyuge
GE09ram_07_u:2130: 7.029.016a yathā baliṃ nigṛhyaitat trailokyaṃ bhujyate mayā
GE09ram_07_u:2131: 7.029.016c evam etasya pāpasya nigraho mama rocate
GE09ram_07_u:2132: 7.029.017a tato 'nyaṃ deśam āsthāya śakraḥ saṃtyajya rāvaṇam
GE09ram_07_u:2138: 7.029.020a tataḥ śakro nirīkṣyātha praviṣṭaṃ taṃ balaṃ svakam
GE09ram_07_u:2141: 7.029.021c hā hatāḥ smeti taṃ dṛṣṭvā grastaṃ śakreṇa rāvaṇam
GE09ram_07_u:2144: 7.029.023a sa tāṃ praviśya māyāṃ tu dattāṃ gopatinā purā
GE09ram_07_u:2146: 7.029.024a tataḥ sa devān saṃtyajya śakram evābhyayād drutam
GE09ram_07_u:2147: 7.029.024c mahendraś ca mahātejā na dadarśa sutaṃ ripoḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2148: 7.029.025a sa mātaliṃ hayāṃś caiva tāḍayitvā śarottamaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2150: 7.029.026a tataḥ śakro rathaṃ tyaktva visṛjya ca sa mātalim
GE09ram_07_u:2152: 7.029.027a sa tu māyā balād rakṣaḥ saṃgrāme nābhyadṛśyata
GE09ram_07_u:2154: 7.029.028a sa taṃ yadā pariśrāntam indraṃ mene 'tha rāvaṇiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2156: 7.029.029a taṃ dṛṣṭvātha balāt tasmin māyayāpahṛtaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_07_u:2157: 7.029.029c mahendram amarāḥ sarve kiṃ nv etad iti cukruśuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2158: 7.029.029e na hi dṛśyati vidyāvān māyayā yena nīyate
GE09ram_07_u:2159: 7.029.030a etasminn antare cāpi sarve suragaṇās tadā
GE09ram_07_u:2162: 7.029.031c na śaśāka raṇe sthātuṃ na yoddhuṃ śastrapīḍitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2163: 7.029.032a taṃ tu dṛṣṭvā pariśrāntaṃ prahārair jarjaracchavim
GE09ram_07_u:2165: 7.029.033a āgaccha tāta gacchāvo nivṛttaṃ raṇakarma tat
GE09ram_07_u:2166: 7.029.033c jitaṃ te viditaṃ bho 'stu svastho bhava gatajvaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2167: 7.029.034a ayaṃ hi surasainyasya trailokyasya ca yaḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2168: 7.029.034c sa gṛhīto mayā śakro bhagnamānāḥ surāḥ kṛtāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2169: 7.029.035a yatheṣṭaṃ bhuṅkṣva trailokyaṃ nigṛhya ripum ojasā
GE09ram_07_u:2170: 7.029.035c vṛthā te kiṃ śramaṃ kṛtvā yuddhaṃ hi tava niṣphalam
GE09ram_07_u:2172: 7.029.036c tac chrutvā rāvaṇer vākyaṃ svasthacetā daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2190: 7.030.001c prajāpatiṃ puraskṛtya gatā laṅkāṃ surās tadā
GE09ram_07_u:2193: 7.030.003a vatsa rāvaṇa tuṣṭo 'smi tava putrasya saṃyuge
GE09ram_07_u:2195: 7.030.004a jitaṃ hi bhavatā sarvaṃ trailokyaṃ svena tejasā
GE09ram_07_u:2196: 7.030.004c kṛtā pratijñā saphalā prīto 'smi svasutena vai
GE09ram_07_u:2198: 7.030.005c indrajit tv iti vikhyāto jagaty eṣa bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:2200: 7.030.006c yam āśritya tvayā rājan sthāpitās tridaśā vaśe
GE09ram_07_u:2205: 7.030.009a abravīt tu tadā devo rāvaṇiṃ kamalodbhavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2206: 7.030.009c nāsti sarvāmaratvaṃ hi keṣāṃ cit prāṇināṃ bhuvi
GE09ram_07_u:2209: 7.030.011a mameṣṭaṃ nityaśo deva havyaiḥ saṃpūjya pāvakam
GE09ram_07_u:2211: 7.030.012a tasmiṃś ced asamāpte tu japyahome vibhāvasoḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2212: 7.030.012c yudhyeyaṃ deva saṃgrāme tadā me syād vināśanam
GE09ram_07_u:2213: 7.030.013a sarvo hi tapasā caiva vṛṇoty amaratāṃ pumān
GE09ram_07_u:2214: 7.030.013c vikrameṇa mayā tv etad amaratvaṃ pravartitam
GE09ram_07_u:2215: 7.030.014a evam astv iti taṃ prāha vākyaṃ devaḥ prajāpatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2216: 7.030.014c muktaś cendrajitā śakro gatāś ca tridivaṃ surāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2219: 7.030.016a taṃ tu dṛṣṭvā tathābhūtaṃ prāha devaḥ prajāpatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2220: 7.030.016c śakrakrato kim utkaṇṭhāṃ karoṣi smara duṣkṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:2221: 7.030.017a amarendra mayā bahvyaḥ prajāḥ sṛṣṭāḥ purā prabho
GE09ram_07_u:2223: 7.030.018a tāsāṃ nāsti viśeṣo hi darśane lakṣaṇe 'pi vā
GE09ram_07_u:2225: 7.030.019a so 'haṃ tāsāṃ viśeṣārthaṃ striyam ekāṃ vinirmame
GE09ram_07_u:2226: 7.030.019c yad yat prajānāṃ pratyaṅgaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ tat tad uddhṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:2227: 7.030.020a tato mayā rūpaguṇair ahalyā strī vinirmitā
GE09ram_07_u:2228: 7.030.020c ahalyety eva ca mayā tasyā nāma pravartitam
GE09ram_07_u:2229: 7.030.021a nirmitāyāṃ tu devendra tasyāṃ nāryāṃ surarṣabha
GE09ram_07_u:2231: 7.030.022a tvaṃ tu śakra tadā nārīṃ jānīṣe manasā prabho
GE09ram_07_u:2233: 7.030.023a sā mayā nyāsabhūtā tu gautamasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2234: 7.030.023c nyastā bahūni varṣāṇi tena niryātitā ca sā
GE09ram_07_u:2235: 7.030.024a tatas tasya parijñāya mayā sthairyaṃ mahāmuneḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2236: 7.030.024c jñātvā tapasi siddhiṃ ca patnyarthaṃ sparśitā tadā
GE09ram_07_u:2237: 7.030.025a sa tayā saha dharmātmā ramate sma mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2238: 7.030.025c āsan nirāśā devās tu gautame dattayā tayā
GE09ram_07_u:2239: 7.030.026a tvaṃ kruddhas tv iha kāmātmā gatvā tasyāśramaṃ muneḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2240: 7.030.026c dṛṣṭavāṃś ca tadā tāṃ strīṃ dīptām agniśikhām iva
GE09ram_07_u:2241: 7.030.027a sā tvayā dharṣitā śakra kāmārtena samanyunā
GE09ram_07_u:2242: 7.030.027c dṛṣṭas tvaṃ ca tadā tena āśrame paramarṣiṇā
GE09ram_07_u:2245: 7.030.029a yasmān me dharṣitā patnī tvayā vāsava nirbhayam
GE09ram_07_u:2246: 7.030.029c tasmāt tvaṃ samare rājañ śatruhastaṃ gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_07_u:2247: 7.030.030a ayaṃ tu bhāvo durbuddhe yas tvayeha pravartitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2248: 7.030.030c mānuṣeṣv api sarveṣu bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2250: 7.030.031c tatrārdhaṃ tasya yaḥ kartā tvayy ardhaṃ nipatiṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:2251: 7.030.032a na ca te sthāvaraṃ sthānaṃ bhaviṣyati puraṃdara
GE09ram_07_u:2253: 7.030.033a yaś ca yaś ca surendraḥ syād dhruvaḥ sa na bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:2254: 7.030.033c eṣa śāpo mayā mukta ity asau tvāṃ tadābravīt
GE09ram_07_u:2255: 7.030.034a tāṃ tu bhāryāṃ vinirbhartsya so 'bravīt sumahātapāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2258: 7.030.035c tasmād rūpavatī loke na tvam ekā bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_07_u:2259: 7.030.036a rūpaṃ ca tat prajāḥ sarvā gamiṣyanti sudurlabham
GE09ram_07_u:2262: 7.030.037c śāpotsargād dhi tasyedaṃ muneḥ sarvam upāgatam
GE09ram_07_u:2263: 7.030.038a tat smara tvaṃ mahābāho duṣkṛtaṃ yat tvayā kṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:2264: 7.030.038c yena tvaṃ grahaṇaṃ śatror gato nānyena vāsava
GE09ram_07_u:2265: 7.030.039a śīghraṃ yajasva yajñaṃ tvaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ susamāhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2266: 7.030.039c pāvitas tena yajñena yāsyasi tridivaṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2267: 7.030.040a putraś ca tava devendra na vinaṣṭo mahāraṇe
GE09ram_07_u:2269: 7.030.041a etac chrutvā mahendras tu yajñam iṣṭvā ca vaiṣṇavam
GE09ram_07_u:2270: 7.030.041c punas tridivam ākrāmad anvaśāsac ca devatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2271: 7.030.042a etad indrajito rāma balaṃ yat kīrtitaṃ mayā
GE09ram_07_u:2272: 7.030.042c nirjitas tena devendraḥ prāṇino 'nye ca kiṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2273: 7.031.001a tato rāmo mahātejā vismayāt punar eva hi
GE09ram_07_u:2275: 7.031.002a bhagavan kiṃ tadā lokāḥ śūnyā āsan dvijottama
GE09ram_07_u:2276: 7.031.002c dharṣaṇāṃ yatra na prāpto rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2278: 7.031.003c bahiṣkṛtā varāstraiś ca bahavo nirjitā nṛpāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2279: 7.031.004a rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā agastyo bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2281: 7.031.005a sa evaṃ bādhamānas tu pārthivān pārthivarṣabha
GE09ram_07_u:2285: 7.031.007a tulya āsīn nṛpas tasya pratāpād vasuretasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2286: 7.031.007c arjuno nāma yasyāgniḥ śarakuṇḍe śayaḥ sadā
GE09ram_07_u:2287: 7.031.008a tam eva divasaṃ so 'tha haihayādhipatir balī
GE09ram_07_u:2288: 7.031.008c arjuno narmadāṃ rantuṃ gataḥ strībhiḥ saheśvaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2290: 7.031.009c kvārjuno vo nṛpaḥ so 'dya śīghram ākhyātum arhatha
GE09ram_07_u:2295: 7.031.012a śrutvā viśravasaḥ putraḥ paurāṇām arjunaṃ gatam
GE09ram_07_u:2297: 7.031.013a sa tam abhram ivāviṣṭam udbhrāntam iva medinīm
GE09ram_07_u:2306: 7.031.017c paśyamānas tato vindhyaṃ rāvaṇo narmadāṃ yayau
GE09ram_07_u:2317: 7.031.022c iṣṭām iva varāṃ nārīm avagāhya daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2327: 7.031.026c madbhayād anilo hy eṣa vāty asau susamāhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2328: 7.031.027a iyaṃ cāpi saricchreṣṭhā narmadā narma vardhinī
GE09ram_07_u:2330: 7.031.028a tad bhavantaḥ kṣatāḥ śastrair nṛpair indrasamair yudhi
GE09ram_07_u:2332: 7.031.029a te yūyam avagāhadhvaṃ narmadāṃ śarmadāṃ nṛṇām
GE09ram_07_u:2339: 7.031.033a rākṣasendragajais tais tu kṣobhyate narmadā nadī
GE09ram_07_u:2341: 7.031.034a tatas te rākṣasāaḥ snātvā narmadāyā varāmbhasi
GE09ram_07_u:2342: 7.031.034c uttīrya puṣpāṇy ājahrur balyarthaṃ rāvaṇasya tu
GE09ram_07_u:2346: 7.031.036c avatīrṇo nadīṃ snātuṃ gaṅgām iva mahāgajaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2347: 7.031.037a tatra snātvā ca vidhivaj japtvā japyam anuttamam
GE09ram_07_u:2348: 7.031.037c narmadā salilāt tasmād uttatāra sa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2350: 7.031.038c yatra yatra sa yāti sma rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2351: 7.031.038e jāmbūnadamayaṃ liṅgaṃ tatra tatra sma nīyate
GE09ram_07_u:2352: 7.031.039a vālukavedimadhye tu tal liṅgaṃ sthāpya rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2353: 7.031.039c arcayām āsa gandhaiś ca puṣpaiś cāmṛtagandhibhiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2358: 7.032.001a narmadā puline yatra rākṣasendraḥ sa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2360: 7.032.002a arjuno jayatāṃ śreṣṭho māhiṣmatyāḥ patiḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2362: 7.032.003a tāsāṃ madhyagato rāja rarāja sa tato 'rjunaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2364: 7.032.004a jijñāsuḥ sa tu bāhūnāṃ sahasrasyottamaṃ balam
GE09ram_07_u:2365: 7.032.004c rurodha narmadā vegaṃ bāhubhiḥ sa tadārjunaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2371: 7.032.007c puṣpopahāraṃ tat sarvaṃ rāvaṇasya jahāra ha
GE09ram_07_u:2373: 7.032.008c narmadāṃ paśyate kāntāṃ pratikūlāṃ yathā priyām
GE09ram_07_u:2375: 7.032.009c vardhantam ambhaso vegaṃ pūrvām āśāṃ praviśya tu
GE09ram_07_u:2382: 7.032.013a ardhayojanamātraṃ tu gatvā tau tu niśācarau
GE09ram_07_u:2396: 7.032.020a ity evaṃ bhāṣamāṇau tau niśamya śukasāraṇau
GE09ram_07_u:2399: 7.032.021c sakṛd eva kṛto rāvaḥ saraktaḥ preṣito ghanaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2401: 7.032.022c saṃvṛto rākṣasendras tu tatrāgād yatra so 'rjunaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2402: 7.032.023a nātidīrgheṇa kālena sa tato rākṣaso balī
GE09ram_07_u:2404: 7.032.024a sa tatra strīparivṛtaṃ vāśitābhir iva dvipam
GE09ram_07_u:2407: 7.032.025c ity evam arjunāmātyān āha gambhīrayā girā
GE09ram_07_u:2408: 7.032.026a amātyāḥ kṣipram ākhyāta haihayasya nṛpasya vai
GE09ram_07_u:2411: 7.032.027c uttasthuḥ sāyudhās taṃ ca rāvaṇaṃ vākyam abruvan
GE09ram_07_u:2412: 7.032.028a yuddhasya kālo vijñātaḥ sādhu bhoḥ sādhu rāvaṇa
GE09ram_07_u:2413: 7.032.028c yaḥ kṣībaṃ strīvṛtaṃ caiva yoddhum icchasi no nṛpam
GE09ram_07_u:2416: 7.032.029c yuddhaśraddhā tu yady asti śvas tāta samare 'rjunam
GE09ram_07_u:2419: 7.032.031a tatas te rāvaṇāmātyair amātyāḥ pārthivasya tu
GE09ram_07_u:2420: 7.032.031c sūditāś cāpi te yuddhe bhakṣitāś ca bubhukṣitaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2429: 7.032.036a arjunāya tu tat karma rāvaṇasya samantriṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2431: 7.032.037a uktvā na bhetavyam iti strījanaṃ sa tato 'rjunaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2442: 7.032.042c prahastaḥ preṣayan kruddho rarāsa ca yathāmbudaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2455: 7.032.049a sahasrabāhos tad yuddhaṃ viṃśadbāhoś ca dāruṇam
GE09ram_07_u:2459: 7.032.051a baloddhatau yathā nāgau vāśitārthe yathā vṛṣau
GE09ram_07_u:2460: 7.032.051c meghāv iva vinardantau siṃhāv iva balotkaṭau
GE09ram_07_u:2461: 7.032.052a rudrakālāv iva kruddhau tau tathā rākṣasārjunau
GE09ram_07_u:2462: 7.032.052c parasparaṃ gadābhyāṃ tau tāḍayām āsatur bhṛśam
GE09ram_07_u:2466: 7.032.054c tathā tābhyāṃ gadāpātair diśaḥ sarvāḥ pratiśrutāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2472: 7.032.057c samam āsīt tayor yuddhaṃ yathā pūrvaṃ balīndrayoḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2473: 7.032.058a śṛṅgair maharṣabhau yadvad dantāgrair iva kuñjarau
GE09ram_07_u:2481: 7.032.062a sa vihvalaṃ tad ālakṣya daśagrīvaṃ tato 'rjunaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2483: 7.032.063a sa taṃ bāhusahasreṇa balād gṛhya daśānanam
GE09ram_07_u:2484: 7.032.063c babandha balavān rājā baliṃ nārāyaṇo yathā
GE09ram_07_u:2487: 7.032.065a vyāghro mṛgam ivādāya siṃharāḍ iva dantinam
GE09ram_07_u:2488: 7.032.065c rarāsa haihayo rājā harṣād ambudavan muhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2489: 7.032.066a prahastas tu samāśvasto dṛṣṭvā baddhaṃ daśānanam
GE09ram_07_u:2490: 7.032.066c saha tai rākasaiḥ kruddha abhidudrāva pārthivam
GE09ram_07_u:2491: 7.032.067a naktaṃcarāṇāṃ vegas tu teṣām āpatatāṃ babhau
GE09ram_07_u:2493: 7.032.068a muñca muñceti bhāṣantas tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cāsakṛt
GE09ram_07_u:2495: 7.032.069a aprāptāny eva tāny āśu asaṃbhrāntas tadārjunaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2497: 7.032.070a tatas tair eva rakṣāṃsi durdharaiḥ pravarāyudhaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2498: 7.032.070c bhittvā vidrāvayām āsa vāyur ambudharān iva
GE09ram_07_u:2506: 7.033.001c ṛṣiḥ pulastyaḥ śuśrāva kathitaṃ divi daivataiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2515: 7.033.006a pulastya iti taṃ śrutvā vacanaṃ haihayādhipaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2519: 7.033.008a tatas tam ṛṣim āyāntam udyantam iva bhāskaram
GE09ram_07_u:2521: 7.033.009a sa tasya madhuparkaṃ ca pādyam arghyaṃ ca dāpayan
GE09ram_07_u:2524: 7.033.010c adyāhaṃ tu dvijendrendra yasmāt paśyāmi durdṛśam
GE09ram_07_u:2525: 7.033.011a adya me kuśalaṃ deva adya me kulam uddhṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:2526: 7.033.011c yat te devagaṇair vandyau vande 'haṃ caraṇāv imau
GE09ram_07_u:2527: 7.033.012a idaṃ rājyam ime putrā ime dārā ime vayam
GE09ram_07_u:2528: 7.033.012c brahman kiṃ kurma kiṃ kāryam ājñāpayatu no bhavān
GE09ram_07_u:2529: 7.033.013a taṃ dharme 'gniṣu bhṛtyeṣu śivaṃ pṛṣṭvātha pārthivam
GE09ram_07_u:2532: 7.033.014c atulaṃ te balaṃ yena daśagrīvas tvayā jitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2534: 7.033.015c so 'yam adya tvayā baddhaḥ pautro me 'tīvadurjayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2535: 7.033.016a tat putraka yaśaḥ sphītaṃ nāma viśrāvitaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_07_u:2547: 7.033.021a evaṃ sa rāvaṇaḥ prāptaḥ kārtavīryāt tu dharṣaṇāt
GE09ram_07_u:2550: 7.033.022c nāvajñā parataḥ kāryā ya icchec chreya ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2556: 7.034.001c cacāra pṛthivīṃ sarvām anirviṇṇas tathā kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2557: 7.034.002a rākṣasaṃ vā manuṣyaṃ vā śṛṇute yaṃ balādhikam
GE09ram_07_u:2558: 7.034.002c rāvaṇas taṃ samāsādya yuddhe hvayati darpitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2559: 7.034.003a tataḥ kadā cit kiṣkindhāṃ nagarīṃ vālipālitām
GE09ram_07_u:2561: 7.034.004a tatas taṃ vānarāmātyas tāras tārāpitā prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2563: 7.034.005a rākṣasendra gato vālī yas te pratibalo bhavet
GE09ram_07_u:2564: 7.034.005c nānyaḥ pramukhataḥ sthātuṃ tava śaktaḥ plavaṃgamaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2566: 7.034.006c imaṃ muhūrtam āyāti vālī tiṣṭha muhūrtakam
GE09ram_07_u:2567: 7.034.007a etān asthicayān paśya ya ete śaṅkhapāṇḍurāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2570: 7.034.008c tathā vālinam āsādya tadantaṃ tava jīvitam
GE09ram_07_u:2571: 7.034.009a atha vā tvarase martuṃ gaccha dakṣiṇasāgaram
GE09ram_07_u:2572: 7.034.009c vālinaṃ drakṣyase tatra bhūmiṣṭham iva bhāskaram
GE09ram_07_u:2573: 7.034.010a sa tu tāraṃ vinirbhartsya rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2580: 7.034.013c pāpābhiprāyavān dṛṣṭaś cakāra na ca saṃbhramam
GE09ram_07_u:2581: 7.034.014a śaśam ālakṣya siṃho vā pannagaṃ garuḍo yathā
GE09ram_07_u:2582: 7.034.014c na cintayati taṃ vālī rāvaṇaṃ pāpaniścayam
GE09ram_07_u:2587: 7.034.017a ity evaṃ matim āsthāya vālī karṇam upāśritaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2588: 7.034.017c japan vai naigamān mantrāṃs tasthau parvatarāḍ iva
GE09ram_07_u:2591: 7.034.019a hastagrāhyaṃ tu taṃ matvā pādaśabdena rāvaṇam
GE09ram_07_u:2593: 7.034.020a grahītukāmaṃ taṃ gṛhya rakṣasām īśvaraṃ hariḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2595: 7.034.021a sa taṃ pīḍdayamānas tu vitudantaṃ nakhair muhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2596: 7.034.021c jahāra rāvaṇaṃ vālī pavanas toyadaṃ yathā
GE09ram_07_u:2606: 7.034.027a sabhājyamāno bhūtais tu khecaraiḥ khecaro hariḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2608: 7.034.028a tatra saṃdhyām upāsitvā snātvā japtvā ca vānaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2612: 7.034.030a tatrāpi saṃdhyām anvāsya vāsaviḥ sa harīśvaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2614: 7.034.031a caturṣv api samudreṣu saṃdhyām anvāsya vānaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2617: 7.034.032c kutas tvam iti covāca prahasan rāvaṇaṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:2619: 7.034.033c rākṣaseśo harīśaṃ tam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:2621: 7.034.034c yuddhepsur ahaṃ saṃprāptaḥ sa cādyāsāditas tvayā
GE09ram_07_u:2622: 7.034.035a aho balam aho vīryam aho gambhīratā ca te
GE09ram_07_u:2624: 7.034.036a evam aśrāntavad vīra śīghram eva ca vānara
GE09ram_07_u:2625: 7.034.036c māṃ caivodvahamānas tu ko 'nyo vīraḥ kramiṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:2626: 7.034.037a trayāṇām eva bhūtānāṃ gatir eṣā plavaṃgama
GE09ram_07_u:2629: 7.034.038c tvayā saha ciraṃ sakhyaṃ susnigdhaṃ pāvakāgrataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2635: 7.034.041c kiṣkindhāṃ viśatur hṛṣṭau siṃhau giriguhām iva
GE09ram_07_u:2636: 7.034.042a sa tatra māsam uṣitaḥ sugrīva iva rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2638: 7.034.043a evam etat purāvṛttaṃ vālinā rāvaṇaḥ prabho
GE09ram_07_u:2639: 7.034.043c dharṣitaś ca kṛtaś cāpi bhrātā pāvakasaṃnidhau
GE09ram_07_u:2641: 7.034.044c so 'pi tayā vinirdagdhaḥ śalabho vahninā yathā
GE09ram_07_u:2644: 7.035.002a atulaṃ balam etābhyāṃ vālino rāvaṇasya ca
GE09ram_07_u:2645: 7.035.002c na tv etau hanumadvīryaiḥ samāv iti matir mama
GE09ram_07_u:2646: 7.035.003a śauryaṃ dākṣyaṃ balaṃ dhairyaṃ prājñatā nayasādhanam
GE09ram_07_u:2647: 7.035.003c vikramaś ca prabhāvaś ca hanūmati kṛtālayāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2649: 7.035.004c samāśvāsya kapīn bhūyo yojanānāṃ śataṃ plutaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2651: 7.035.005c dṛṣṭvā saṃbhāṣitā cāpi sītā viśvāsitā tathā
GE09ram_07_u:2656: 7.035.008a na kālasya na śakrasya na viṣṇor vittapasya ca
GE09ram_07_u:2657: 7.035.008c karmāṇi tāni śrūyante yāni yuddhe hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2658: 7.035.009a etasya bāhuvīryeṇa laṅkā sītā ca lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2659: 7.035.009c prāpto mayā jayaś caiva rājyaṃ mitrāṇi bāndhavāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2660: 7.035.010a hanūmān yadi me na syād vānarādhipateḥ sakhā
GE09ram_07_u:2661: 7.035.010c pravṛttam api ko vettuṃ jānakyāḥ śaktimān bhavet
GE09ram_07_u:2663: 7.035.011c tadā vaire samutpanne na dagdho vīrudho yathā
GE09ram_07_u:2664: 7.035.012a na hi veditavān manye hanūmān ātmano balam
GE09ram_07_u:2666: 7.035.013a etan me bhagavan sarvaṃ hanūmati mahāmune
GE09ram_07_u:2668: 7.035.014a rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā hetuyuktam ṛṣis tataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2669: 7.035.014c hanūmataḥ samakṣaṃ tam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:2670: 7.035.015a satyam etad raghuśreṣṭha yad bravīṣi hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2671: 7.035.015c na bale vidyate tulyo na gatau na matau paraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2672: 7.035.016a amoghaśāpaiḥ śāpas tu datto 'sya ṛṣibhiḥ purā
GE09ram_07_u:2673: 7.035.016c na veditā balaṃ yena balī sann arimardanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2674: 7.035.017a bālye 'py etena yat karma kṛtaṃ rāma mahābala
GE09ram_07_u:2675: 7.035.017c tan na varṇayituṃ śakyam atibālatayāsya te
GE09ram_07_u:2676: 7.035.018a yadi vāsti tv abhiprāyas tac chrotuṃ tava rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:2677: 7.035.018c samādhāya matiṃ rāma niśāmaya vadāmy aham
GE09ram_07_u:2679: 7.035.019c yatra rājyaṃ praśāsty asya keṣarī nāma vai pitā
GE09ram_07_u:2680: 7.035.020a tasya bhāryā babhūveṣṭā hy añjaneti pariśrutā
GE09ram_07_u:2681: 7.035.020c janayām āsa tasyāṃ vai vāyur ātmajam uttamam
GE09ram_07_u:2683: 7.035.021c phalāny āhartukāmā vai niṣkrāntā gahane carā
GE09ram_07_u:2684: 7.035.022a eṣa mātur viyogāc ca kṣudhayā ca bhṛśārditaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2685: 7.035.022c ruroda śiśur atyarthaṃ śiśuḥ śarabharāḍ iva
GE09ram_07_u:2687: 7.035.023c dadṛśe phalalobhāc ca utpapāta raviṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:2692: 7.035.026a nāpy evaṃ vegavān vāyur garuḍo na manas tathā
GE09ram_07_u:2694: 7.035.027a yadi tāvac chiśor asya īdṛśau gativikramau
GE09ram_07_u:2695: 7.035.027c yauvanaṃ balam āsādya kathaṃ vego bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:2696: 7.035.028a tam anuplavate vāyuḥ plavantaṃ putram ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2699: 7.035.029c pitur balāc ca bālyāc ca bhāskarābhyāśam āgataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2700: 7.035.030a śiśur eṣa tv adoṣajña iti matvā divākaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2701: 7.035.030c kāryaṃ cātra samāyattam ity evaṃ na dadāha saḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2702: 7.035.031a yam eva divasaṃ hy eṣa grahītuṃ bhāskaraṃ plutaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2703: 7.035.031c tam eva divasaṃ rāhur jighṛkṣati divākaram
GE09ram_07_u:2707: 7.035.033c abravīd bhrukuṭīṃ kṛtvā devaṃ devagaṇair vṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:2709: 7.035.034c kim idaṃ tat tvayā dattam anyasya balavṛtrahan
GE09ram_07_u:2710: 7.035.035a adyāhaṃ parvakāle tu jighṛkṣuḥ sūryam āgataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2711: 7.035.035c athānyo rāhur āsādya jagrāha sahasā ravim
GE09ram_07_u:2712: 7.035.036a sa rāhor vacanaṃ śrutvā vāsavaḥ saṃbhramānvitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2716: 7.035.038a indraḥ karīndram āruhya rāhuṃ kṛtvā puraḥsaram
GE09ram_07_u:2719: 7.035.039c anena ca sa vai dṛṣṭa ādhāvañ śailakūṭavat
GE09ram_07_u:2720: 7.035.040a tataḥ sūryaṃ samutsṛjya rāhum evam avekṣya ca
GE09ram_07_u:2721: 7.035.040c utpapāta punar vyoma grahītuṃ siṃhikā sutam
GE09ram_07_u:2725: 7.035.042c indra indreti saṃtrāsān muhur muhur abhāṣata
GE09ram_07_u:2727: 7.035.043c śrutvendrovāca māṃ bhaiṣīr ayam enaṃ nihanmy aham
GE09ram_07_u:2728: 7.035.044a airāvataṃ tato dṛṣṭvā mahat tad idam ity api
GE09ram_07_u:2731: 7.035.045c muhūrtam abhavad ghoram indrāgnyor iva bhāsvaram
GE09ram_07_u:2747: 7.035.053c tvayā sma bhagavan sṛṣṭāḥ prajānātha caturvidhāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2748: 7.035.054a tvayā datto 'yam asmākam āyuṣaḥ pavanaḥ patiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2749: 7.035.054c so 'smān prāṇeśvaro bhūtvā kasmād eṣo 'dya sattama
GE09ram_07_u:2750: 7.035.055a rurodha duḥkhaṃ janayann antaḥpura iva striyaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2751: 7.035.055c tasmāt tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ prāptā vāyunopahatā vibho
GE09ram_07_u:2752: 7.035.056a vāyusaṃrodhajaṃ duḥkham idaṃ no nuda śatruhan
GE09ram_07_u:2753: 7.035.057a etat prajānāṃ śrutvā tu prajānāthaḥ prajāpatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2754: 7.035.057c kāraṇād iti tān uktvā prajāḥ punar abhāṣata
GE09ram_07_u:2755: 7.035.058a yasmin vaḥ kāraṇe vāyuś cukrodha ca rurodha ca
GE09ram_07_u:2756: 7.035.058c prajāḥ śṛṇudhvaṃ tat sarvaṃ śrotavyaṃ cātmanaḥ kṣamam
GE09ram_07_u:2758: 7.035.059c rāhor vacanam ājñāya rājñā vaḥ kopito 'nilaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2760: 7.035.060c śarīraṃ hi vinā vāyuṃ samatāṃ yāti reṇubhiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2761: 7.035.061a vāyuḥ prāṇāḥ sukhaṃ vāyur vāyuḥ sarvam idaṃ jagat
GE09ram_07_u:2762: 7.035.061c vāyunā saṃparityaktaṃ na sukhaṃ vindate jagat
GE09ram_07_u:2763: 7.035.062a adyaiva ca parityaktaṃ vāyunā jagad āyuṣā
GE09ram_07_u:2765: 7.035.063a tad yāmas tatra yatrāste māruto rukprado hi vaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2776: 7.036.001c śiśukaṃ taṃ samādāya uttasthau dhātur agrataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2778: 7.036.002c pādayor nyapatad vāyus tisro' vasthāya vedhase
GE09ram_07_u:2780: 7.036.003c vāyum utthāpya hastena śiśuṃ taṃ parimṛṣṭavān
GE09ram_07_u:2782: 7.036.004c jalasiktaṃ yathā sasyaṃ punar jīvitam āptavān
GE09ram_07_u:2783: 7.036.005a prāṇavantam imaṃ dṛṣṭvā prāṇo gandhavaho mudā
GE09ram_07_u:2790: 7.036.008c jānatām api tat sarvaṃ hitaṃ vakṣyāmi śrūyatām
GE09ram_07_u:2791: 7.036.009a anena śiśunā kāryaṃ kartavyaṃ vo bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:2797: 7.036.012a aham evāsya dāsyāmi paramaṃ varam uttamam
GE09ram_07_u:2799: 7.036.013a mārtāṇḍas tv abravīt tatra bhagavāṃs timirāpahaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2801: 7.036.014a yadā tu śāstrāṇy adhyetuṃ śaktir asya bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:2802: 7.036.014c tadāsya śāstraṃ dāsyāmi yena vāgmī bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:2803: 7.036.015a varuṇaś ca varaṃ prādān nāsya mṛtyur bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:2806: 7.036.016c diśate 'sya varaṃ tuṣṭa aviṣādaṃ ca saṃyuge
GE09ram_07_u:2808: 7.036.017c ity evaṃ varadaḥ prāha tadā hy ekākṣipiṅgalaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2809: 7.036.018a matto madāyudhānāṃ ca na vadhyo 'yaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:2810: 7.036.018c ity evaṃ śaṃkareṇāpi datto 'sya paramo varaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2812: 7.036.019c dīrghāayuś ca mahātmā ca iti brahmābravīd vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2814: 7.036.020c śilpinā pravaraḥ prāha varam asya mahāmatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2817: 7.036.022a tataḥ surāṇāṃ tu varair dṛṣṭvā hy enam akaṃkṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:2823: 7.036.025a evam uktvā tam āmantrya mārutaṃ te 'maraiḥ saha
GE09ram_07_u:2825: 7.036.026a so 'pi gandhavahaḥ putraṃ pragṛhya gṛham ānayat
GE09ram_07_u:2831: 7.036.029a srugbhāṇḍān agnihotraṃ ca valkalānāṃ ca saṃcayān
GE09ram_07_u:2834: 7.036.030c jānanta ṛṣayas taṃ vai kṣamante tasya nityaśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2835: 7.036.031a yadā keṣariṇā tv eṣa vāyunā sāñjanena ca
GE09ram_07_u:2839: 7.036.033a bādhase yat samāśritya balam asmān plavaṃgama
GE09ram_07_u:2845: 7.036.036a sa tu rājyaṃ ciraṃ kṛtvā vānarāṇāṃ harīśvaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2848: 7.036.037c pitrye pade kṛto rājā sugrīvo vālinaḥ pade
GE09ram_07_u:2849: 7.036.038a sugrīveṇa samaṃ tv asya advaidhaṃ chidravarjitam
GE09ram_07_u:2851: 7.036.039a eṣa śāpavaśād eva na vedabalam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2853: 7.036.040a na hy eṣa rāma sugrīvo bhrāmyamāṇo 'pi vālinā
GE09ram_07_u:2854: 7.036.040c vedayāno na ca hy eṣa balam ātmani mārutiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2871: 7.036.045a tad etat kathitaṃ sarvaṃ yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
GE09ram_07_u:2873: 7.036.046a dṛṣṭaḥ saṃbhāṣitaś cāsi rāma gacchamahe vayam
GE09ram_07_u:2874: 7.036.046c evam uktvā gatāḥ sarve ṛṣayas te yathāgatam
GE09ram_07_u:2875: 7.037.001a vimṛśya ca tato rāmo vayasyam akutobhayam
GE09ram_07_u:2877: 7.037.002a darśitā bhavatā prītir darśitaṃ sauhṛdaṃ param
GE09ram_07_u:2878: 7.037.002c udyogaś ca kṛto rājan bharatena tvayā saha
GE09ram_07_u:2879: 7.037.003a tad bhavān adya kāśeyīṃ purīṃ vārāṇasīṃ vraja
GE09ram_07_u:2883: 7.037.005a visṛjya taṃ vayasyaṃ sa svāgatān pṛthivīpatīn
GE09ram_07_u:2886: 7.037.006c dharmaś ca niyato nityaṃ satyaṃ ca bhavatāṃ sadā
GE09ram_07_u:2887: 7.037.007a yuṣmākaṃ ca prabhāvena tejasā ca mahātmanām
GE09ram_07_u:2889: 7.037.008a hetumātram ahaṃ tatra bhavatāṃ tejasāṃ hataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2894: 7.037.010c kālo hy atītaḥ sumahān gamane rocatāṃ matiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2895: 7.037.011a pratyūcus taṃ ca rājāno harṣeṇa mahatānvitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2896: 7.037.011c diṣṭyā tvaṃ vijayī rāma rājyaṃ cāpi pratiṣṭhitam
GE09ram_07_u:2897: 7.037.012a diṣṭyā pratyāhṛtā sītā diṣṭyā śatruḥ parājitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2898: 7.037.012c eṣa naḥ paramaḥ kāma eṣā naḥ kīrtir uttamā
GE09ram_07_u:2899: 7.037.013a yat tvāṃ vijayinaṃ rāma paśyāmo hataśātravam
GE09ram_07_u:2900: 7.037.013c upapannaṃ ca kākutstha yat tvam asmān praśaṃsasi
GE09ram_07_u:2901: 7.037.014a praśaṃsārhā hi jānanti praśaṃsāṃ vaktum īdṛśīm
GE09ram_07_u:2902: 7.037.014c āpṛcchāmo gamiṣyāmo hṛdistho naḥ sadā bhavān
GE09ram_07_u:2903: 7.037.015a bhavec ca te mahārāja prītir asmāsu nityadā
GE09ram_07_u:2904: 7.038.001a te prayātā mahātmānaḥ pārthivāḥ sarvato diśam
GE09ram_07_u:2906: 7.038.002a akṣauhiṇī sahasrais te samavetās tv anekaśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2909: 7.038.003c na nāma rāvaṇaṃ yuddhe paśyāmaḥ purataḥ sthitam
GE09ram_07_u:2911: 7.038.004c hatā hi rākṣasās tatra pārthivaiḥ syur na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2914: 7.038.006a etāś cānyāś ca rājānaḥ kathās tatra sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2916: 7.038.007a yathāpurāṇi te gatvā ratnāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_07_u:2918: 7.038.008a aśvān ratnāni vastrāṇi hastinaś ca madotkaṭān
GE09ram_07_u:2919: 7.038.008c candanāni ca divyāni divyāny ābharaṇāni ca
GE09ram_07_u:2920: 7.038.009a bharato lakṣmaṇaś caiva śatrughnaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2921: 7.038.009c ādāya tāni ratnāni ayodhyām agaman punaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2922: 7.038.010a āgatāś ca purīṃ ramyām ayodhyāṃ puruṣarṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2924: 7.038.011a pratigṛhya ca tat sarvaṃ prītiyuktaḥ sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2926: 7.038.012a vibhīṣaṇāya ca dadau ye cānye ṛkṣavānarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2928: 7.038.013a te sarve hṛṣṭamanaso rāmadattāni tāny atha
GE09ram_07_u:2929: 7.038.013c śirobhir dhārayām āsur bāhubhiś ca mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2930: 7.038.014a papuś caiva sugandhīni madhūni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_07_u:2931: 7.038.014c māṃsāni ca sumṛṣṭāni phalāny āsvādayanti ca
GE09ram_07_u:2932: 7.038.015a evaṃ teṣāṃ nivasatāṃ māsaḥ sāgro gatas tadā
GE09ram_07_u:2933: 7.038.015c muhūrtam iva tat sarvaṃ rāmabhaktyā samarthayan
GE09ram_07_u:2934: 7.038.016a reme rāmaḥ sa taiḥ sārdhaṃ vānaraiḥ kāmarūpibhiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2935: 7.038.016c rājabhiś ca mahāvīryai rākṣasaiś ca mahābalaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2936: 7.038.017a evaṃ teṣāṃ yayau māso dvitīyaḥ śaiśiraḥ sukham
GE09ram_07_u:2939: 7.039.001c rāghavas tu mahātejāḥ sugrīvam idam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:2943: 7.039.003c paśya tvaṃ hanumantaṃ ca nalaṃ ca sumahābalam
GE09ram_07_u:2944: 7.039.004a suṣeṇaṃ śvaśuraṃ śūraṃ tāraṃ ca balināṃ varam
GE09ram_07_u:2945: 7.039.004c kumudaṃ caiva durdharṣaṃ nīlaṃ ca sumahābalam
GE09ram_07_u:2946: 7.039.005a vīraṃ śatabaliṃ caiva maindaṃ dvividam eva ca
GE09ram_07_u:2947: 7.039.005c gajaṃ gavākṣaṃ gavayaṃ śarabhaṃ ca mahābalam
GE09ram_07_u:2951: 7.039.007c paśya tvaṃ prītisaṃyukto mā caiṣāṃ vipriyaṃ kṛthāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2952: 7.039.008a evam uktvā ca sugrīvaṃ praśasya ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2954: 7.039.009a taṅkāṃ praśādhi dharmeṇa saṃmato hy asi pārthiva
GE09ram_07_u:2955: 7.039.009c purasya rākṣasānāṃ ca bhrātur vaiśvaraṇasya ca
GE09ram_07_u:2956: 7.039.010a mā ca buddhim adharme tvaṃ kuryā rājan kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_07_u:2957: 7.039.010c buddhimanto hi rājāno dhruvam aśnanti medinīm
GE09ram_07_u:2958: 7.039.011a ahaṃ ca nityaśo rājan sugrīvasahitas tvayā
GE09ram_07_u:2959: 7.039.011c smartavyaḥ parayā prītyā gaccha tvaṃ vigatajvaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2961: 7.039.012c sādhu sādhv iti kākutsthaṃ praśaśaṃsuḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2962: 7.039.013a tava buddhir mahābāho vīryam adbhutam eva ca
GE09ram_07_u:2963: 7.039.013c mādhuryaṃ paramaṃ rāma svayambhor iva nityadā
GE09ram_07_u:2964: 7.039.014a teṣām evaṃ bruvāṇānāṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca rakṣasām
GE09ram_07_u:2966: 7.039.015a sneho me paramo rājaṃs tvayi nityaṃ pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2967: 7.039.015c bhaktiś ca niyatā vīra bhāvo nānyatra gacchati
GE09ram_07_u:2969: 7.039.016c tāvac charīre vatsyantu mama prāṇā na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2971: 7.039.017c utthāya ca pariṣvajya vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:2972: 7.039.018a evam etat kapiśreṣṭha bhavitā nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2973: 7.039.018c lokā hi yāvat sthāsyanti tāvat sthāsyati me kathā
GE09ram_07_u:2974: 7.039.019a cariṣyati kathā yāval lokān eṣā hi māmikā
GE09ram_07_u:2975: 7.039.019c tāvac charīre vatsyanti prāṇās tava na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2976: 7.039.020a tato 'sya hāraṃ candrābhaṃ mucya kaṇṭhāt sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2981: 7.039.022c praṇamya śirasā pādau prajagmus te mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2984: 7.039.024a sarve ca te bāṣpagalāḥ sāśrunetrā vicetasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2985: 7.039.024c saṃmūḍhā iva duḥkhena tyajante rāghavaṃ tadā
GE09ram_07_u:2987: 7.040.001c bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito rāmaḥ pramumoda sukhī sukham
GE09ram_07_u:2990: 7.040.003a saumya rāma nirīkṣasva saumyena vadanena mām
GE09ram_07_u:2991: 7.040.003c kailāsaśikharāt prāptaṃ viddhi māṃ puṣkaraṃ prabho
GE09ram_07_u:2992: 7.040.004a tava śāsanam ājñāya gato 'smi dhanadaṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:2993: 7.040.004c upasthātuṃ naraśreṣṭha sa ca māṃ pratyabhāṣata
GE09ram_07_u:2996: 7.040.006a mamāpi paramā prītir hate tasmin durātmani
GE09ram_07_u:2998: 7.040.007a sa tvaṃ rāmeṇa laṅkāyāṃ nirjitaḥ paramātmanā
GE09ram_07_u:2999: 7.040.007c vaha saumya tam eva tvam aham ājñāpayāmi te
GE09ram_07_u:3000: 7.040.008a eṣa me paramaḥ kāmo yat tvaṃ rāghavanandanam
GE09ram_07_u:3003: 7.040.009c tvatsakāśaṃ punaḥ prāptaḥ sa evaṃ pratigṛhṇa mām
GE09ram_07_u:3004: 7.040.010a bāḍham ity eva kākutsthaḥ puṣpakaṃ samapūjayat
GE09ram_07_u:3005: 7.040.010c lājākṣataiś ca puṣpaiś ca gandhaiś ca susugandhibhiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3006: 7.040.011a gamyatāṃ ca yathākāmam āgacches tvaṃ yadā smare
GE09ram_07_u:3007: 7.040.011c evam astv iti rāmeṇa visṛṣṭaḥ puṣpakaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3013: 7.040.014a anāmayāc ca martyānāṃ sāgro māso gato hy ayam
GE09ram_07_u:3014: 7.040.014c jīrṇānām api sattvānāṃ mṛtyur nāyāti rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:3015: 7.040.015a putrān nāryaḥ prasūyante vapuṣmantaś ca mānavāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3017: 7.040.016a kāle ca vāsavo varṣaṃ pātayaty amṛtopamam
GE09ram_07_u:3019: 7.040.017a īdṛśo naś ciraṃ rājā bhavatv iti nareśvara
GE09ram_07_u:3020: 7.040.017c kathayanti pure paurā janā janapadeṣu ca
GE09ram_07_u:3022: 7.040.018c śrutvā rāmo mudā yuktaḥ pramumoda sukhī sukham
GE09ram_07_u:3023: 7.041.001a sa visṛjya tato rāmaḥ puṣpakaṃ hemabhūṣitam
GE09ram_07_u:3025: 7.041.002a candanāgaru cūtaiś ca tuṅga kāleyakair api
GE09ram_07_u:3027: 7.041.003a priyaṅgubhiḥ kadambaiś ca tathā kurabakair api
GE09ram_07_u:3028: 7.041.003c jambūbhiḥ pāṭalībhiś ca kovidāraiś ca saṃvṛtām
GE09ram_07_u:3031: 7.041.005a kokilair bhṛṅgarājaiś ca nānāvarṇaiś ca pakṣibhiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3033: 7.041.006a śātakumbhanibhāḥ ke cit ke cid agniśikhopamāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3034: 7.041.006c nīlāñjananibhāś cānye bhānti tatra sma pādapāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3041: 7.041.010a nandanaṃ hi yathendrasya brāhmaṃ caitrarathaṃ yathā
GE09ram_07_u:3042: 7.041.010c tathārūpaṃ hi rāmasya kānanaṃ tan niveśitam
GE09ram_07_u:3048: 7.041.013c pāyayām āsa kākutsthaḥ śacīm indro yathāmṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:3049: 7.041.014a māṃsāni ca vicitrāṇi phalāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_07_u:3052: 7.041.015c bālāś ca rūpavatyaś ca striyaḥ pānavaśaṃ gatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3053: 7.041.016a evaṃ rāmo mudā yuktā sītāṃ surucirānanām
GE09ram_07_u:3054: 7.041.016c ramayām āsa vaidehīm ahany ahani devavat
GE09ram_07_u:3055: 7.041.017a tathā tu ramamāṇasya tasyaivaṃ śiśiraḥ śubhaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3059: 7.041.019a sītā ca devakāryāṇi kṛtvā paurvāhṇikāni tu
GE09ram_07_u:3063: 7.041.021a dṛṣṭvā tu rāghavaḥ patnīṃ kalyāṇena samanvitām
GE09ram_07_u:3064: 7.041.021c praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe sādhu sādhv iti cābravīt
GE09ram_07_u:3066: 7.041.022c kim icchasi hi tad brūhi kaḥ kāmaḥ kriyatāṃ tava
GE09ram_07_u:3067: 7.041.023a prahasantī tu vaidehī rāmaṃ vākyam athābravīt
GE09ram_07_u:3071: 7.041.025a eṣa me paramaḥ kāmo yan mūlaphalabhojiṣu
GE09ram_07_u:3074: 7.041.026c visrabdhā bhava vaidehi śvo gamiṣyasy asaṃśayam
GE09ram_07_u:3075: 7.041.027a evam uktvā tu kākutstho maithilīṃ janakātmajām
GE09ram_07_u:3079: 7.042.002a vijayo madhumattaś ca kāśyapaḥ piṅgalaḥ kuśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3083: 7.042.004a tataḥ kathāyāṃ kasyāṃ cid rāghavaḥ samabhāṣata
GE09ram_07_u:3084: 7.042.004c kāḥ kathā nagare bhadra vartante viṣayeṣu ca
GE09ram_07_u:3085: 7.042.005a mām āśritāni kāny āhuḥ paurajānapadā janāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3086: 7.042.005c kiṃ ca sītāṃ samāśritya bharataṃ kiṃ nu lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_07_u:3087: 7.042.006a kiṃ nu śatrughnam āśritya kaikeyīṃ mātaraṃ ca me
GE09ram_07_u:3088: 7.042.006c vaktavyatāṃ ca rājāno nave rājye vrajanti hi
GE09ram_07_u:3089: 7.042.007a evam ukte tu rāmeṇa bhadraḥ prāñjalir abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:3090: 7.042.007c sthitāḥ kathāḥ śubhā rājan vartante puravāsinām
GE09ram_07_u:3093: 7.042.009a evam uktas tu bhadreṇa rāghavo vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:3096: 7.042.010c śrutvedānīṃ śubhaṃ kuryāṃ na kuryām aśubhāni ca
GE09ram_07_u:3098: 7.042.011c kathayante yathā paurā janā janapadeṣu ca
GE09ram_07_u:3099: 7.042.012a rāghaveṇaivam uktas tu bhadraḥ suruciraṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3101: 7.042.013a śṛṇu rājan yathā paurāḥ kathayanti śubhāśubham
GE09ram_07_u:3104: 7.042.014c akṛtaṃ pūrvakaiḥ kaiś cid devair api sadānavaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3106: 7.042.015c vānarāś ca vaśaṃ nītā ṛṣkāś ca saha rākṣasaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3107: 7.042.016a hatvā ca rāvaṇaṃ yuddhe sītām āhṛtya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3108: 7.042.016c amarṣaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā svaveśma punar ānayat
GE09ram_07_u:3110: 7.042.017c aṅkam āropya hi purā rāvaṇena balād dhṛtām
GE09ram_07_u:3111: 7.042.018a laṅkām api punar nītām aśokavanikāṃ gatām
GE09ram_07_u:3112: 7.042.018c rakṣasāṃ vaśam āpannāṃ kathaṃ rāmo na kutsate
GE09ram_07_u:3114: 7.042.019c yathā hi kurute rājā prajā tam anuvartate
GE09ram_07_u:3116: 7.042.020c nagareṣu ca sarveṣu rājañ janapadeṣu ca
GE09ram_07_u:3118: 7.042.021c uvāca sarvān suhṛdaḥ katham etan nivedyatām
GE09ram_07_u:3119: 7.042.022a sarve tu śirasā bhūmāv abhivādya praṇamya ca
GE09ram_07_u:3120: 7.042.022c pratyūcū rāghavaṃ dīnam evam etan na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3121: 7.042.023a śrutvā tu vākyaṃ kākutsthaḥ sarveṣāṃ samudīritam
GE09ram_07_u:3122: 7.042.023c visarjayām āsa tadā sarvāṃs tāñ śatrutāpanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3123: 7.043.001a visṛjya tu suhṛdvargaṃ buddhyā niścitya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3124: 7.043.001c samīpe dvāḥstham āsīnam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:3127: 7.043.003a rāmasya bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā dvāḥstho mūrdhni kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3129: 7.043.004a uvāca ca tadā vākyaṃ vardhayitvā kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3130: 7.043.004c draṣṭum icchasi rājā tvāṃ gamyatāṃ tatra māciram
GE09ram_07_u:3131: 7.043.005a bāḍham ity eva saumitriḥ śrutvā rāghava śāsanam
GE09ram_07_u:3133: 7.043.006a prayāntaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā dvāḥstho bharatam antikāt
GE09ram_07_u:3134: 7.043.006c uvāca prāñjalir vākyaṃ rājā tvāṃ draṣṭum icchati
GE09ram_07_u:3135: 7.043.007a bharatas tu vacaḥ śrutvā dvāḥsthād rāmasamīritam
GE09ram_07_u:3138: 7.043.008c śatrughnabhavanaṃ gatvā tato vākyaṃ jagāda ha
GE09ram_07_u:3139: 7.043.009a ehy āgaccha raghuśreṣṭha rājā tvāṃ draṣṭum icchati
GE09ram_07_u:3140: 7.043.009c gato hi lakṣmaṇaḥ pūrvaṃ bharataś ca mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3141: 7.043.010a śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tasya śatrughno rāmaśāsanam
GE09ram_07_u:3142: 7.043.010c śirasā vandya dharaṇīṃ prayayau yatra rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3146: 7.043.012c eteṣu jīvitaṃ mahyam ete prāṇā bahiścarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3148: 7.043.013c prahvāḥ prāñjalayo bhūtvā viviśus te samāhitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3149: 7.043.014a te tu dṛṣṭvā mukhaṃ tasya sagrahaṃ śaśinaṃ yathā
GE09ram_07_u:3151: 7.043.015a bāṣpapūrṇe ca nayane dṛṣṭva rāmasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3152: 7.043.015c hataśobhāṃ yathā padmaṃ mukhaṃ vīkṣya ca tasya te
GE09ram_07_u:3154: 7.043.016c tasthuḥ samāhitāḥ sarve rāmaś cāśrūṇy avartayat
GE09ram_07_u:3155: 7.043.017a tān pariṣvajya bāhubhyām utthāpya ca mahābhujaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3156: 7.043.017c āsaneṣv ādhvam ity uktvā tato vākyaṃ jagāda ha
GE09ram_07_u:3157: 7.043.018a bhavanto mama sarvasvaṃ bhavanto mama jīvitam
GE09ram_07_u:3158: 7.043.018c bhavadbhiś ca kṛtaṃ rājyaṃ pālayāmi nareśvarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3163: 7.044.002a sarve śṛṇuta bhadraṃ vo mā kurudhvaṃ mano 'nyathā
GE09ram_07_u:3164: 7.044.002c paurāṇāṃ mama sītāyāṃ yādṛśī vartate kathā
GE09ram_07_u:3166: 7.044.003c vartate mayi bībhatsaḥ sa me marmāṇi kṛntati
GE09ram_07_u:3167: 7.044.004a ahaṃ kila kule jata ikṣvākūṇāṃ mahātmanām
GE09ram_07_u:3169: 7.044.005a jānāsi hi yathā saumya daṇḍake vijane vane
GE09ram_07_u:3170: 7.044.005c rāvaṇena hṛtā sītā sa ca vidhvaṃsito mayā
GE09ram_07_u:3173: 7.044.007a candrādityau ca śaṃsete surāṇāṃ saṃnidhau purā
GE09ram_07_u:3177: 7.044.009a antarātmā ca me vetti sītāṃ śuddhāṃ yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_07_u:3178: 7.044.009c tato gṛhītvā vaidehīm ayodhyām aham āgataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3179: 7.044.010a ayaṃ tu me mahān vādaḥ śokaś ca hṛdi vartate
GE09ram_07_u:3181: 7.044.011a akīrtir yasya gīyeta loke bhūtasya kasya cit
GE09ram_07_u:3182: 7.044.011c pataty evādhamāṃl lokān yāvac chabdaḥ sa kīrtyate
GE09ram_07_u:3183: 7.044.012a akīrtir nindyate daivaiḥ kīrtir deveṣu pūjyate
GE09ram_07_u:3184: 7.044.012c kīrtyarthaṃ ca samārambhaḥ sarva eva mahātmanām
GE09ram_07_u:3185: 7.044.013a apy ahaṃ jīvitaṃ jahyāṃ yuṣmān vā puruṣarṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3188: 7.044.014c na hi paśyāmy ahaṃ bhūyaḥ kiṃ cid duḥkham ato 'dhikam
GE09ram_07_u:3189: 7.044.015a śvas tvaṃ prabhāte saumitre sumantrādhiṣṭhitaṃ ratham
GE09ram_07_u:3191: 7.044.016a gaṅgāyās tu pare pāre vālmīkeḥ sumahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3194: 7.044.017c śīghram āgaccha saumitre kuruṣva vacanaṃ mama
GE09ram_07_u:3195: 7.044.018a na cāsmi prativaktavyaḥ sītāṃ prati kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_07_u:3196: 7.044.018c aprītiḥ paramā mahyaṃ bhavet tu prativārite
GE09ram_07_u:3197: 7.044.019a śāpitāś ca mayā yūyaṃ bhujābhyāṃ jīvitena ca
GE09ram_07_u:3198: 7.044.019c ye māṃ vākyāntare brūyur anunetuṃ kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_07_u:3199: 7.044.020a mānayantu bhavanto māṃ yadi macchāsane sthitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3200: 7.044.020c ito 'dya nīyatāṃ sītā kuruṣva vacanaṃ mama
GE09ram_07_u:3202: 7.044.021c paśyeyam iti tasyāś ca kāmaḥ saṃvartyatām ayam
GE09ram_07_u:3203: 7.044.022a evam uktvā tu kākutstho bāṣpeṇa pihitekṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3210: 7.045.003c mayā netā maharṣīṇāṃ śīghram ānīyatāṃ rathaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3211: 7.045.004a sumantras tu tathety uktvā yuktaṃ paramavājibhiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3214: 7.045.005c ratho 'yaṃ samanuprāpto yat kāryaṃ kriyatāṃ prabho
GE09ram_07_u:3215: 7.045.006a evam uktaḥ sumantreṇa rājaveśma sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3217: 7.045.007a gaṅgātīre mayā devi munīnām āśrame śubhe
GE09ram_07_u:3219: 7.045.008a evam uktā tu vaidehī lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā
GE09ram_07_u:3221: 7.045.009a vāsāṃsi ca mahārhāṇi ratnāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_07_u:3224: 7.045.010c saumitris tu tathety uktvā ratham āropya maithilīm
GE09ram_07_u:3226: 7.045.011a abravīc ca tadā sītā lakṣmaṇaṃ lakṣmivardhanam
GE09ram_07_u:3228: 7.045.012a nayanaṃ me sphuraty adya gātrotkampaś ca jāyate
GE09ram_07_u:3229: 7.045.012c hṛdayaṃ caiva saumitre asvastham iva lakṣaye
GE09ram_07_u:3230: 7.045.013a autsukyaṃ paramaṃ cāpi adhṛtiś ca parā mama
GE09ram_07_u:3231: 7.045.013c śūnyām iva ca paśyāmi pṛthivīṃ pṛthulocana
GE09ram_07_u:3232: 7.045.014a api svasti bhavet tasya bhrātus te bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
GE09ram_07_u:3233: 7.045.014c śvaśrūṇāṃ caiva me vīra sarvāsām aviśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3234: 7.045.015a pure janapade caiva kuśalaṃ prāṇinām api
GE09ram_07_u:3236: 7.045.016a lakṣmaṇo 'rthaṃ tu taṃ śrutvā śirasā vandya maithilīm
GE09ram_07_u:3237: 7.045.016c śivam ity abravīd dhṛṣṭo hṛdayena viśuṣyatā
GE09ram_07_u:3239: 7.045.017c prabhāte punar utthāya saumitriḥ sūtam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:3240: 7.045.018a yojayasva rathaṃ śīghram adya bhāgīrathī jalam
GE09ram_07_u:3244: 7.045.020a sā tu sūtasya vacanād āruroha rathottamam
GE09ram_07_u:3245: 7.045.020c sītā saumitriṇā sārdhaṃ sumitreṇa ca dhīmatā
GE09ram_07_u:3248: 7.045.022a sītā tu paramāyattā dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇam āturam
GE09ram_07_u:3249: 7.045.022c uvāca vākyaṃ dharmajña kim idaṃ rudyate tvayā
GE09ram_07_u:3251: 7.045.023c harṣakāle kim arthaṃ māṃ viṣādayasi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_07_u:3253: 7.045.024c kaccid vinā kṛtas tena dvirātre śokam āgataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3255: 7.045.025c na cāham evaṃ śocāmi maivaṃ tvaṃ bāliśo bhava
GE09ram_07_u:3256: 7.045.026a tārayasva ca māṃ gaṅgāṃ darśayasva ca tāpasān
GE09ram_07_u:3257: 7.045.026c tato dhanāni vāsāṃsi dāsyāmy ābharaṇāni ca
GE09ram_07_u:3259: 7.045.027c tatra caikāṃ niśām uṣya yāsyāmas tāṃ purīṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3260: 7.045.028a tasyās tad vacanaṃ śrutvā pramṛjya nayane śubhe
GE09ram_07_u:3261: 7.045.028c titīrṣur lakṣmaṇo gaṅgāṃ śubhāṃ nāvam upāharat
GE09ram_07_u:3264: 7.046.002a sumantraṃ caiva sarathaṃ sthīyatām iti lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3266: 7.046.003a tatas tīram upāgamya bhāgīrathyāḥ sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3268: 7.046.004a hṛdgataṃ me mahac chalyaṃ yad asmy āryeṇa dhīmatā
GE09ram_07_u:3270: 7.046.005a śreyo hi maraṇaṃ me 'dya mṛtyor vā yat paraṃ bhavet
GE09ram_07_u:3271: 7.046.005c na cāsminn īdṛśe kārye niyojyo lokanindite
GE09ram_07_u:3272: 7.046.006a prasīda na ca me roṣaṃ kartum arhasi suvrate
GE09ram_07_u:3273: 7.046.006c ity añjalikṛto bhūmau nipapāta sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3274: 7.046.007a rudantaṃ prāñjaliṃ dṛṣṭvā kāṅkṣantaṃ mṛtyum ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3276: 7.046.008a kim idaṃ nāvagacchāmi brūhi tattvena lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_07_u:3277: 7.046.008c paśyāmi tvāṃ ca na svatham api kṣemaṃ mahīpateḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3278: 7.046.009a śāpito 'si narendreṇa yat tvaṃ saṃtāpam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3279: 7.046.009c tad brūyāḥ saṃnidhau mahyam aham ājñāpayāmi te
GE09ram_07_u:3281: 7.046.010c avāṅmukho bāṣpagalo vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:3284: 7.046.012a na tāni vacanīyāni mayā devi tavāgrataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3285: 7.046.012c yāni rājñā hṛdi nyastāny amarṣaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3286: 7.046.013a sā tvāṃ tyaktā nṛpatinā nirdoṣā mama saṃnidhau
GE09ram_07_u:3287: 7.046.013c paurāpavāda bhītena grāhyaṃ devi na te 'nyathā
GE09ram_07_u:3288: 7.046.014a āśramānteṣu ca mayā tyaktavyā tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_07_u:3289: 7.046.014c rājñaḥ śāsanam ājñāya tavaivaṃ kila daurhṛdam
GE09ram_07_u:3291: 7.046.015c puṇyaṃ ca ramaṇīyaṃ ca mā viṣādaṃ kṛthāḥ śubhe
GE09ram_07_u:3296: 7.046.018a pativratātvam āsthāya rāmaṃ kṛtvā sadā hṛdi
GE09ram_07_u:3297: 7.046.018c śreyas te paramaṃ devi tathā kṛtvā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:3299: 7.047.001c paraṃ viṣādam āgamya vaidehī nipapāta ha
GE09ram_07_u:3302: 7.047.003a māmikeyaṃ tanur nūnaṃ sṛṣṭā duḥkhāya lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_07_u:3303: 7.047.003c dhātrā yasyās tathā me 'dya duḥkhamūrtiḥ pradṛśyate
GE09ram_07_u:3304: 7.047.004a kiṃ nu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ ko vā dārair viyojitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3305: 7.047.004c yāhaṃ śuddha samācārā tyaktā nṛpatinā satī
GE09ram_07_u:3308: 7.047.006a sā kathaṃ hy āśrame saumya vatsyāmi vijanīkṛtā
GE09ram_07_u:3310: 7.047.007a kiṃ ca vakṣyāmi muniṣu kiṃ mayāpakṛtaṃ nṛpe
GE09ram_07_u:3311: 7.047.007c kasmin vā kāraṇe tyaktā rāghaveṇa mahātmanā
GE09ram_07_u:3312: 7.047.008a na khalv adyaiva saumitre jīvitaṃ jāhnavī jale
GE09ram_07_u:3313: 7.047.008c tyajeyaṃ rājavaṃśas tu bhartur me parihāsyate
GE09ram_07_u:3314: 7.047.009a yathājñāṃ kuru saumitre tyaja māṃ duḥkhabhāginīm
GE09ram_07_u:3315: 7.047.009c nideśe sthīyatāṃ rājñaḥ śṛṇu cedaṃ vaco mama
GE09ram_07_u:3317: 7.047.010c śirasā vandya caraṇau kuśalaṃ brūhi pārthivam
GE09ram_07_u:3318: 7.047.011a yathā bhrātṛṣu vartethās tathā paureṣu nityadā
GE09ram_07_u:3319: 7.047.011c paramo hy eṣa dharmaḥ syād eṣā kīrtir anuttamā
GE09ram_07_u:3320: 7.047.012a yat tvaṃ paurajanaṃ rājan dharmeṇa samavāpnuyāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3324: 7.047.013c śirasā dharaṇīṃ gatvā vyāhartuṃ na śaśāka ha
GE09ram_07_u:3325: 7.047.014a pradakṣiṇaṃ ca kṛtvā sa rudann eva mahāsvanam
GE09ram_07_u:3328: 7.047.015c saṃmūḍha iva duḥkhena ratham adhyāruhad drutam
GE09ram_07_u:3329: 7.047.016a muhur muhur apāvṛtya dṛṣṭvā sītām anāthavat
GE09ram_07_u:3331: 7.047.017a dūrasthaṃ ratham ālokya lakṣmaṇaṃ ca muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3337: 7.048.001a sītāṃ tu rudatīṃ dṛṣṭvā ye tatra munidārakāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3338: 7.048.001c prādravan yatra bhagavān āste vālmīkir agryadhīḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3340: 7.048.002c sarve nivedayām āsus tasyās tu ruditasvanam
GE09ram_07_u:3342: 7.048.003c patnī śrīr iva saṃmohād virauti vikṛtasvarā
GE09ram_07_u:3343: 7.048.004a bhagavan sādhu paśyemāṃ devatām iva khāc cyutām
GE09ram_07_u:3344: 7.048.004c na hy enāṃ mānuṣīṃ vidmaḥ satkriyāsyāḥ prayujyatām
GE09ram_07_u:3345: 7.048.005a teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā buddhyā niścitya dharmavit
GE09ram_07_u:3347: 7.048.006a taṃ tu deśam abhipretya kiṃ cit padbhyāṃ mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3348: 7.048.006c arghyam ādāya ruciraṃ jāhvanī tīram āśritaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3351: 7.048.007c uvāca madhurāṃ vāṇīṃ hlādayann iva tejasā
GE09ram_07_u:3352: 7.048.008a snuṣā daśarāthasya tvaṃ rāmasya mahiṣī satī
GE09ram_07_u:3353: 7.048.008c janakasya sutā rājñaḥ svāgataṃ te pativrate
GE09ram_07_u:3356: 7.048.010a apāpāṃ vedmi sīte tvāṃ tapo labdhena cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_07_u:3359: 7.048.011c tās tvāṃ vatse yathā vatsaṃ pālayiṣyanti nityaśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3360: 7.048.012a idam arghyaṃ pratīccha tvaṃ visrabdhā vigatajvarā
GE09ram_07_u:3361: 7.048.012c yathā svagṛham abhyetya viṣādaṃ caiva mā kṛthāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3362: 7.048.013a śrutvā tu bhāṣitaṃ sītā muneḥ paramam adbhutam
GE09ram_07_u:3363: 7.048.013c śirasā vandya caraṇau tathety āha kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3364: 7.048.014a taṃ prayāntaṃ muniṃ sītā prāñjaliḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nvagāt
GE09ram_07_u:3366: 7.048.015a taṃ dṛṣṭvā munim āyāntaṃ vaidehyānugataṃ tadā
GE09ram_07_u:3367: 7.048.015c upājagmur mudā yuktā vacanaṃ caidam abruvan
GE09ram_07_u:3369: 7.048.016c abhivādayāmaḥ sarvās tvām ucyatāṃ kiṃ ca kurmahe
GE09ram_07_u:3370: 7.048.017a tāsāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā vālmīkir idam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:3373: 7.048.018c apāpā patinā tyaktā paripālyā mayā sadā
GE09ram_07_u:3374: 7.048.019a imāṃ bhavatyaḥ paśyantu snehena parameṇa ha
GE09ram_07_u:3375: 7.048.019c gauravān mama vākyasya pūjyā vo 'stu viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3376: 7.048.020a muhur muhuś ca vaidehīṃ parisāntvya mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3377: 7.048.020c svam āśramaṃ śiṣya vṛtaḥ punar āyān mahātapāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3378: 7.049.001a dṛṣṭvā tu maithilīṃ sītām āśramaṃ saṃraveśitām
GE09ram_07_u:3382: 7.049.003a ato duḥkhataraṃ kiṃ nu rāghavasya bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:3384: 7.049.004a vyaktaṃ daivād ahaṃ manye rāghavasya vinā bhavam
GE09ram_07_u:3385: 7.049.004c vaidehyā sārathe sārdhaṃ daivaṃ hi duratikramam
GE09ram_07_u:3386: 7.049.005a yo hi devān sagandharvān asurān saha rākṣasaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3387: 7.049.005c nihanyād rāghavaḥ kruddhaḥ sa daivam anuvartate
GE09ram_07_u:3388: 7.049.006a purā mama pitur vākyair daṇḍake vijane vane
GE09ram_07_u:3391: 7.049.007c paurāṇāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā nṛśaṃsaṃ pratibhāti me
GE09ram_07_u:3392: 7.049.008a ko nu dharmāśrayaḥ sūta karmaṇy asmin yaśohare
GE09ram_07_u:3395: 7.049.009c sumantraḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:3396: 7.049.010a na saṃtāpas tvayā kāryaḥ saumitre maithilīṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:3397: 7.049.010c dṛṣṭam etat purā vipraiḥ pitus te lakṣmaṇāgrataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3399: 7.049.011c tvāṃ caiva maithilīṃ caiva śatrughnabharatau tathā
GE09ram_07_u:3401: 7.049.012a na tv idaṃ tvayi vaktavyaṃ saumitre bharate 'pi vā
GE09ram_07_u:3402: 7.049.012c rājñā vo 'vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ durvāsā yad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:3404: 7.049.013c ṛṣiṇā vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ vasiṣṭhasya ca saṃnidhau
GE09ram_07_u:3405: 7.049.014a ṛṣes tu vacanaṃ śrutvā mām āha puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3406: 7.049.014c sūta na kva cid evaṃ te vaktavyaṃ janasaṃnidhau
GE09ram_07_u:3408: 7.049.015c naiva jātv anṛtaṃ kuryām iti me saumya darśanam
GE09ram_07_u:3409: 7.049.016a sarvathā nāsty avaktavyaṃ mayā saumya tavāgrataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3410: 7.049.016c yadi te śravaṇe śraddhā śrūyatāṃ raghunandana
GE09ram_07_u:3411: 7.049.017a yady apy ahaṃ narendreṇa rahasyaṃ śrāvitaḥ purā
GE09ram_07_u:3412: 7.049.017c tac cāpy udāhariṣyāmi daivaṃ hi duratikramam
GE09ram_07_u:3413: 7.049.018a tac chrutvā bhāṣitaṃ tasya gambhīrārthapadaṃ mahat
GE09ram_07_u:3414: 7.049.018c tathyaṃ brūhīti saumitriḥ sūtaṃ vākyam athābravīt
GE09ram_07_u:3416: 7.050.001c tad vākyam ṛṣiṇā proktaṃ vyāhartum upacakrame
GE09ram_07_u:3417: 7.050.002a purā nāmnā hi durvāsā atreḥ putro mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3418: 7.050.002c vasiṣṭhasyāśrame puṇye sa vārṣikyam uvāsa ha
GE09ram_07_u:3419: 7.050.003a tam āśramaṃ mahātejāḥ pitā te sumahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3421: 7.050.004a sa dṛṣṭvā sūryasaṃkāśaṃ jvalantam iva tejasā
GE09ram_07_u:3423: 7.050.004e tau munī tāpasa śreṣṭhau vinītas tv abhyavādayat
GE09ram_07_u:3424: 7.050.005a sa tābhyāṃ pūjito rājā svāgatenāsanena ca
GE09ram_07_u:3425: 7.050.005c pādyena phalamūlaiś ca so 'py āste munibhiḥ saha
GE09ram_07_u:3426: 7.050.006a teṣāṃ tatropaviṣṭānāṃ tās tāḥ sumadhurāḥ kathāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3428: 7.050.007a tataḥ kathāyāṃ kasyāṃ cit prāñjaliḥ pragraho nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3429: 7.050.007c uvāca taṃ mahātmānam atreḥ putraṃ tapodhanam
GE09ram_07_u:3430: 7.050.008a bhagavan kiṃ pramāṇena mama vaṃśo bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:3431: 7.050.008c kimāyuś ca hi me rāmaḥ putrāś cānye kimāyuṣaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3432: 7.050.009a rāmasya ca sutā ye syus teṣām āyuḥ kiyad bhavet
GE09ram_07_u:3433: 7.050.009c kāmyayā bhagavan brūhi vaṃśasyāsya gatiṃ mama
GE09ram_07_u:3434: 7.050.010a tac chrutvā vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ rājño daśarathasya tu
GE09ram_07_u:3437: 7.050.011c sukhinaś ca samṛddhāś ca bhaviṣyanty asya cānujāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3438: 7.050.012a kasmiṃś cit karaṇe tvāṃ ca maithilīṃ ca yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_07_u:3444: 7.050.015a sa sarvam akhilaṃ rājño vaṃśasyāsya gatāgatam
GE09ram_07_u:3446: 7.050.016a tūṣṇīṃbhūte munau tasmin rājā daśarathas tadā
GE09ram_07_u:3448: 7.050.017a etad vaco mayā tatra muninā vyāhṛtaṃ purā
GE09ram_07_u:3449: 7.050.017c śrutaṃ hṛdi ca nikṣiptaṃ nānyathā tad bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:3450: 7.050.018a evaṃgate na saṃtāpaṃ gantum arhasi rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:3451: 7.050.018c sītārthe rāghavārthe vā dṛḍho bhava narottama
GE09ram_07_u:3452: 7.050.019a tac chrutvā vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ sūtasya paramādbhutam
GE09ram_07_u:3453: 7.050.019c praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe sādhu sādhv iti cābravīt
GE09ram_07_u:3455: 7.050.020c astam arko gato vāsaṃ gomatyāṃ tāv athoṣatuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3456: 7.051.001a tatra tāṃ rajanīm uṣya gomatyāṃ raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3457: 7.051.001c prabhāte punar utthāya lakṣmaṇaḥ prayayau tadā
GE09ram_07_u:3460: 7.051.003a saumitris tu paraṃ dainyaṃ jagāma sumahāmatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3461: 7.051.003c rāmapādau samāsādya vakṣyāmi kim ahaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3466: 7.051.006a sa dṛṣṭvā rāghavaṃ dīnam āsīnaṃ paramāsane
GE09ram_07_u:3472: 7.051.008e punar asmy āgato vīra pādamūlam upāsitum
GE09ram_07_u:3473: 7.051.009a mā śucaḥ puruṣavyāghra kālasya gatir īdṛśī
GE09ram_07_u:3474: 7.051.009c tvadvidhā na hi śocanti sattvavanto manasvinaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3477: 7.051.011a śaktas tvam ātmanātmānaṃ vijetuṃ manasaiva hi
GE09ram_07_u:3478: 7.051.011c lokān sarvāṃś ca kākutstha kiṃ punar duḥkham īdṛśam
GE09ram_07_u:3482: 7.051.013c tyajemāṃ durbalāṃ buddhiṃ saṃtāpaṃ mā kuruṣva ha
GE09ram_07_u:3483: 7.051.014a evam uktas tu kākutstho lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā
GE09ram_07_u:3485: 7.051.015a evam etan naraśreṣṭha yathā vadasi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_07_u:3486: 7.051.015c paritoṣaś ca me vīra mama kāryānuśāsane
GE09ram_07_u:3487: 7.051.016a nirvṛtiś ca kṛtā saumya saṃtāpaś ca nirākṛtaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3489: 7.052.001a tataḥ sumantras tv āgamya rāghavaṃ vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:3490: 7.052.001c ete nivāritā rājan dvāri tiṣṭhanti tāpasāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3494: 7.052.003a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rāmaḥ provāca dharmavit
GE09ram_07_u:3496: 7.052.004a rājñas tv ājñāṃ puraskṛtya dvāḥstho mūrdhni kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3497: 7.052.004c praveśayām āsa tatas tāpasān saṃmatān bahūn
GE09ram_07_u:3502: 7.052.007a pratigṛhya tu tat sarvaṃ rāmaḥ prītipuraskṛtaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3504: 7.052.008a uvāca ca mahābāhuḥ sarvān eva mahāmunīn
GE09ram_07_u:3506: 7.052.009a rāmasya bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā sarva eva maharṣayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3509: 7.052.010c prayataḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā rāghavo vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:3510: 7.052.011a kim āgamanakaryaṃ vaḥ kiṃ karomi tapodhanāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3512: 7.052.012a idaṃ rājyaṃ ca sakalaṃ jīvitaṃ ca hṛdi sthitam
GE09ram_07_u:3513: 7.052.012c sarvam etad dvijārthaṃ me satyam etad bravīmi vaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3514: 7.052.013a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā sādhuvādo mahān abhūt
GE09ram_07_u:3516: 7.052.014a ūcuś ca te mahātmāno harṣeṇa mahatānvitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3522: 7.052.016c kuruṣva kartā hy asi nātra saṃśayo;
GE09ram_07_u:3524: 7.053.001a bruvadbhir evam ṛṣibhiḥ kākutstho vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:3525: 7.053.001c kiṃ kāryaṃ brūta bhavatāṃ bhayaṃ nāśayitāsmi vaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3526: 7.053.002a tathā vadati kākutsthe bhargavo vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:3527: 7.053.002c bhayaṃ naḥ śṛṇu yan mūlaṃ deśasya ca nareśvara
GE09ram_07_u:3530: 7.053.004a brahmaṇyaś ca śaraṇyaś ca buddhyā ca pariniṣṭhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3532: 7.053.005a sa madhur vīryasaṃpanno dharme ca susamāhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3533: 7.053.005c bahumānāc ca rudreṇa dattas tasyādbhuto varaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3535: 7.053.006c dadau mahātmā suprīto vākayṃ caitad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:3536: 7.053.007a tvayāyam atulo dharmo matprasādāt kṛtaḥ śubhaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3537: 7.053.007c prītyā paramayā yukto dadāmy āyudham uttamam
GE09ram_07_u:3538: 7.053.008a yāvat suraiś ca vipraiś ca na virudhyer mahāsura
GE09ram_07_u:3539: 7.053.008c tāvac chūlaṃ tavedaṃ syād anyathā nāśam āpnuyāt
GE09ram_07_u:3540: 7.053.009a yaś ca tvām abhiyuñjīta yuddhāya vigatajvaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3541: 7.053.009c taṃ śūlaṃ bhasmasāt kṛtvā punar eṣyati te karam
GE09ram_07_u:3542: 7.053.010a evaṃ rudrād varaṃ labdhvā bhūya eva mahāsuraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3543: 7.053.010c praṇipatya mahādevaṃ vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:3544: 7.053.011a bhagavan mama vaṃśasya śūlam etad anuttamam
GE09ram_07_u:3545: 7.053.011c bhavet tu satataṃ deva surāṇām īśvaro hy asi
GE09ram_07_u:3546: 7.053.012a taṃ bruvāṇaṃ madhuṃ devaḥ sarvabhūtapatiḥ śivaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3548: 7.053.013a mā bhūt te viphalā bāṇī matprāsādakṛtā śubhā
GE09ram_07_u:3549: 7.053.013c bhavataḥ putram ekaṃ tu śūlam etad gamiṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:3550: 7.053.014a yāvat karasthaḥ śūlo 'yaṃ bhaviṣyati sutasya te
GE09ram_07_u:3552: 7.053.015a evaṃ madhuvaraṃ labdhvā devāt sumahad adbhutam
GE09ram_07_u:3554: 7.053.016a tasya patnī mahābhagā priyā kumbhīnasī hi yā
GE09ram_07_u:3555: 7.053.016c viśvāsayor apatyaṃ sā hy analāyāṃ mahāprabhā
GE09ram_07_u:3556: 7.053.017a tasyāḥ putro mahāvīryo lavaṇo nāma dāruṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3557: 7.053.017c bālyāt prabhṛti duṣṭātmā pāpāny eva samācarat
GE09ram_07_u:3558: 7.053.018a taṃ putraṃ durvinītaṃ tu dṛṣṭvā duḥkhasamanvitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3559: 7.053.018c madhuḥ sa śokam āpede na cainaṃ kiṃ cid abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:3560: 7.053.019a sa vihāya imaṃ lokaṃ praviṣṭo varuṇālayam
GE09ram_07_u:3561: 7.053.019c śūlaṃ niveśya lavaṇe varaṃ tasmai nyavedayat
GE09ram_07_u:3563: 7.053.020c saṃtāpayati lokāṃs trīn viśeṣeṇa tu tāpasān
GE09ram_07_u:3565: 7.053.021c śrutvā pramāṇaṃ kākutsthaṃ tvaṃ hi naḥ paramā gatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3566: 7.053.022a bahavaḥ pārthivā rāma bhayārtair ṛṣibhiḥ purā
GE09ram_07_u:3567: 7.053.022c abhayaṃ yācitā vīra trātāraṃ na ca vidmahe
GE09ram_07_u:3568: 7.053.023a te vayaṃ rāvaṇaṃ śrutvā hataṃ sabalavāhanam
GE09ram_07_u:3569: 7.053.023c trātāraṃ vidmahe rāma nānyaṃ bhuvi narādhipam
GE09ram_07_u:3571: 7.054.001a tathokte tān ṛṣīn rāmaḥ pratyuvāca kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3572: 7.054.001c kimāhāraḥ kimācāro lavaṇaḥ kva ca vartate
GE09ram_07_u:3573: 7.054.002a rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā ṛṣayaḥ sarva eva te
GE09ram_07_u:3574: 7.054.002c tato nivedayām āsur lavaṇo vavṛdhe yathā
GE09ram_07_u:3576: 7.054.003c ācāro raudratā nityaṃ vāso madhuvane sadā
GE09ram_07_u:3578: 7.054.004c mānuṣāṃś caiva kurute nityam āhāram āhnikam
GE09ram_07_u:3581: 7.054.006a tac chrutvā rāghavo vākyam uvāca sa mahāmunīn
GE09ram_07_u:3582: 7.054.006c ghātayiṣyāmi tad rakṣo vyapagacchatu vo bhayam
GE09ram_07_u:3584: 7.054.007c sa bhrātṝn sahitān sarvān uvāca raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3585: 7.054.008a ko hantā lavaṇaṃ vīrāḥ kasyāṃśaḥ sa vidhīyatām
GE09ram_07_u:3587: 7.054.009a rāghaveṇaivam uktas tu bharato vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:3588: 7.054.009c aham enaṃ badhiṣyāmi mamāṃśaḥ sa vidhīyatām
GE09ram_07_u:3591: 7.054.011a śatrughnas tv abravīd vākyaṃ praṇipatya narādhipam
GE09ram_07_u:3593: 7.054.012a āryeṇa hi purā śūnyā ayodhyā rakṣitā purī
GE09ram_07_u:3599: 7.054.014e preṣye mayi sthite rājan na bhūyaḥ kleśam āpnuyāt
GE09ram_07_u:3600: 7.054.015a tathā bruvati śatrughne rāghavaḥ punar abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:3601: 7.054.015c evaṃ bhavatu kākutstha kriyatāṃ mama śāsanam
GE09ram_07_u:3602: 7.054.016a rājye tvām abhiṣekṣyāmi maghos tu nagare śubhe
GE09ram_07_u:3604: 7.054.017a śūras tvaṃ kṛtavidyaś ca samarthaḥ saṃniveśane
GE09ram_07_u:3605: 7.054.017c nagaraṃ madhunā juṣṭaṃ tathā janapadāñ śubhān
GE09ram_07_u:3606: 7.054.018a yo hi vaṃśaṃ samutpāṭya pārthivasya punaḥ kṣaye
GE09ram_07_u:3607: 7.054.018c na vidhatte nṛpaṃ tatra narakaṃ sa nigacchati
GE09ram_07_u:3608: 7.054.019a sa tvaṃ hatvā madhusutaṃ lavaṇaṃ pāpaniścayam
GE09ram_07_u:3609: 7.054.019c rājyaṃ praśādhi dharmeṇa vākyaṃ me yady avekṣase
GE09ram_07_u:3610: 7.054.020a uttaraṃ ca na vaktavyaṃ śūra vākyāntare mama
GE09ram_07_u:3614: 7.055.001a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa parāṃ vrīḍām upāgataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3615: 7.055.001c śatrughno vīryasaṃpanno mandaṃ mandam uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:3619: 7.055.003a evam ukte tu śūreṇa śatrughnena mahātmanā
GE09ram_07_u:3620: 7.055.003c uvāca rāmaḥ saṃhṛṣṭo lakṣmaṇaṃ bharataṃ tathā
GE09ram_07_u:3623: 7.055.005a purodhasaṃ ca kākutsthau naigamān ṛtvijas tathā
GE09ram_07_u:3624: 7.055.005c mantriṇaś caiva me sarvān ānayadhvaṃ mamājñayā
GE09ram_07_u:3632: 7.055.009a ayaṃ śaras tv amoghas te divyaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3634: 7.055.010a sṛṣṭaḥ śaro 'yaṃ kākutstha yadā śete mahārṇave
GE09ram_07_u:3635: 7.055.010c svayambhūr ajito devo yaṃ nāpaśyan surāsurāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3639: 7.055.012a sraṣṭukāmena lokāṃs trīṃs tau cānena hatau yudhi
GE09ram_07_u:3640: 7.055.012c anena śaramukhyena tato lokāṃś cakāra saḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3641: 7.055.013a nāyaṃ mayā śaraḥ pūrvaṃ rāvaṇasya vadhārthinā
GE09ram_07_u:3642: 7.055.013c mukhaḥ śatrughna bhūtānāṃ mahāṃs trāso bhaved iti
GE09ram_07_u:3643: 7.055.014a yac ca tasya mahac chūlaṃ tryambakeṇa mahātmanā
GE09ram_07_u:3645: 7.055.015a tat saṃnikṣipya bhavane pūjyamānaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3646: 7.055.015c diśaḥ sarvāḥ samālokya prāpnoty āhāram ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3647: 7.055.016a yadā tu yuddham ākāṅkṣan kaś cid enaṃ samāhvayet
GE09ram_07_u:3648: 7.055.016c tadā śūlaṃ gṛhītvā tad bhasma rakṣaḥ karoti tam
GE09ram_07_u:3653: 7.055.019a anyathā kriyamāṇe tu avadhyaḥ sa bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:3654: 7.055.019c yadi tv evaṃ kṛte vīra vināśam upayāsyati
GE09ram_07_u:3655: 7.055.020a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ śūlasya ca viparyayam
GE09ram_07_u:3657: 7.056.001a evam uktvā tu kākutsthaṃ praśasya ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3660: 7.056.002c rathānāṃ ca sahasre dve gajānāṃ śatam eva ca
GE09ram_07_u:3665: 7.056.005a balaṃ ca subhṛtaṃ vīra hṛṣṭapuṣṭam anuttamam
GE09ram_07_u:3667: 7.056.006a na hy arthās tatra tiṣṭhanti na dārā na ca bāndhavāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3668: 7.056.006c suprīto bhṛtyavargas tu yatra tiṣṭhati rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:3670: 7.056.007c eka eva dhanuṣpānis tad gaccha tvaṃ madhor vanam
GE09ram_07_u:3671: 7.056.008a yathā tvāṃ na prajānāti gacchantaṃ yuddhakāṅkṣiṇam
GE09ram_07_u:3672: 7.056.008c lavaṇas tu madhoḥ putras tathā gaccher aśaṅkitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3673: 7.056.009a na tasya mṛtyur anyo 'sti kaścid dhi puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_07_u:3674: 7.056.009c darśanaṃ yo 'bhigaccheta sa vadhyo lavaṇena hi
GE09ram_07_u:3675: 7.056.010a sa grīṣme vyapayāte tu varṣarātra upasthite
GE09ram_07_u:3676: 7.056.010c hanyās tvaṃ lavaṇaṃ saumya sa hi kālo 'sya durmateḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3677: 7.056.011a maharṣīṃs tu puraskṛtya prayāntu tava sainikāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3679: 7.056.012a tataḥ sthāpya balaṃ sarvaṃ nadītīre samāhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3680: 7.056.012c agrato dhanuṣā sārdhaṃ gaccha tvaṃ laghuvikrama
GE09ram_07_u:3681: 7.056.013a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa śatrughnas tān mahābalān
GE09ram_07_u:3682: 7.056.013c senāmukhyān samānīya tato vākyam uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:3683: 7.056.014a ete vo gaṇitā vāsā yatra yatra nivatsyatha
GE09ram_07_u:3684: 7.056.014c sthātavyaṃ cāvirodhena yathā bādhā na kasya cit
GE09ram_07_u:3685: 7.056.015a tathā tāṃs tu samājñāpya niryāpya ca mahad balam
GE09ram_07_u:3686: 7.056.015c kausalyāṃ ca sumitrāṃ ca kaukeyīṃ cābhyavādayat
GE09ram_07_u:3692: 7.057.001a prasthāpya tad balaṃ sarvaṃ māsamātroṣitaḥ pathi
GE09ram_07_u:3693: 7.057.001c eka evāśu śatrughno jagāma tvaritas tadā
GE09ram_07_u:3695: 7.057.002c vālmīker āśramaṃ puṇyam agacchad vāsam uttamam
GE09ram_07_u:3697: 7.057.003c kṛtāñjalir atho bhūtvā vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:3698: 7.057.004a bhagavan vastum icchāmi guroḥ kṛtyād ihāgataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3699: 7.057.004c śvaḥ prabhāte gamiṣyāmi pratīcīṃ vāruṇīṃ diśam
GE09ram_07_u:3702: 7.057.006a svam āśramam idaṃ saumya rāghavāṇāṃ kulasya ha
GE09ram_07_u:3703: 7.057.006c āsanaṃ pādyam arghyaṃ ca nirviśaṅkaḥ pratīccha me
GE09ram_07_u:3704: 7.057.007a pratigṛhya tataḥ pūjāṃ phalamūlaṃ ca bhojanam
GE09ram_07_u:3705: 7.057.007c bhakṣayām āsa kākutsthas tṛptiṃ ca paramāṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3706: 7.057.008a sa tu bhuktvā mahābāhur maharṣiṃ tam uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:3708: 7.057.009a tasya tadbhāṣitaṃ śrutvā vālmīkir vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:3712: 7.057.011a sa bāla eva saudāso mṛgayām upacakrame
GE09ram_07_u:3715: 7.057.012c bhakṣayāṇāv asaṃtuṣṭau paryāptiṃ ca na jagmatuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3716: 7.057.013a sa tu tau rākṣasau dṛṣṭvā nirmṛgaṃ ca vanaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:3718: 7.057.014a vinipātya tam ekaṃ tu saudāsaḥ puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3720: 7.057.015a nirīkṣamāṇaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā sahāyas tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3721: 7.057.015c saṃtāpam akarod ghoraṃ saudāsaṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:3722: 7.057.016a yasmād anaparāddhaṃ tvaṃ sahāyaṃ mama jaghnivān
GE09ram_07_u:3724: 7.057.017a evam uktvā tu taṃ rakṣas tatraivāntaradhīyata
GE09ram_07_u:3728: 7.057.019a tatra yajño mahān āsīd bahuvarṣa gaṇāyutān
GE09ram_07_u:3733: 7.057.021c dīyatām iti śīghraṃ vai nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
GE09ram_07_u:3734: 7.057.022a tac chrutvā vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ rakṣasā kāmarūpiṇā
GE09ram_07_u:3736: 7.057.023a haviṣyaṃ sāmiṣaṃ svādu yathā bhavati bhojanam
GE09ram_07_u:3737: 7.057.023c tathā kuruṣva śīghraṃ vai parituṣyed yathā guruḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3739: 7.057.024c sa ca rakṣaḥ punas tatra sūdaveṣam athākarot
GE09ram_07_u:3740: 7.057.025a sa mānuṣam atho māṃsaṃ pārthivāya nyavedayat
GE09ram_07_u:3741: 7.057.025c idaṃ svāduhaviṣyaṃ ca sāmiṣaṃ cānnam āhṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:3742: 7.057.026a sa bhojanaṃ vasiṣṭhāya patnyā sārdham upāharat
GE09ram_07_u:3746: 7.057.028a yasmāt tvaṃ bhojanaṃ rājan mamaitad dātum icchasi
GE09ram_07_u:3747: 7.057.028c tasmād bhojanam etat te bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3748: 7.057.029a sa rājā saha patnyā vai praṇipatya muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3749: 7.057.029c punar vasiṣṭhaṃ provāca yad uktaṃ brahmarūpiṇā
GE09ram_07_u:3750: 7.057.030a tac chrutā pārthivendrasya rakṣasā vikṛtaṃ ca tat
GE09ram_07_u:3752: 7.057.031a mayā roṣaparītena yad idaṃ vyāhṛtaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3753: 7.057.031c naitac chakyaṃ vṛthā kartuṃ pradāsyāmi ca te varam
GE09ram_07_u:3755: 7.057.032c matprasādāc ca rājendra atītaṃ na smariṣyasi
GE09ram_07_u:3756: 7.057.033a evaṃ sa rājā taṃ śāpam upabhujyārimardanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3760: 7.057.035a tasya tāṃ pārthivendrasya kathāṃ śrutvā sudāruṇam
GE09ram_07_u:3762: 7.058.001a yām eva rātriṃ śatrughna parṇaśālāṃ samāviśat
GE09ram_07_u:3763: 7.058.001c tām eva rātriṃ sītāpi prasūtā dārakadvayam
GE09ram_07_u:3765: 7.058.002c vālmīkeḥ priyam ācakhyuḥ sītāyāḥ prasavaṃ śubham
GE09ram_07_u:3767: 7.058.003a teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā munir harṣam upāgamat
GE09ram_07_u:3769: 7.058.004a kuśamuṣṭim upādāya lavaṃ caiva tu sa dvijaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3771: 7.058.005a yas tayoḥ pūrvajo jātaḥ sa kuśair mantrasaṃskṛtaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3772: 7.058.005c nirmārjanīyas tu bhavet kuśa ity asya nāmataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3773: 7.058.006a yaś cāparo bhavet tābhyāṃ lavena susamāhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3774: 7.058.006c nirmārjanīyo vṛddhābhir lavaś ceti sa nāmataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3775: 7.058.007a evaṃ kuśalavau nāmnā tāv ubhau yamajātakau
GE09ram_07_u:3777: 7.058.008a te rakṣāṃ jagṛhus tāṃ ca munihastāt samāhitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3778: 7.058.008c akurvaṃś ca tato rakṣāṃ tayor vigatakalmaṣāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3779: 7.058.009a tathā tāṃ kriyamāṇāṃ tu rakṣāṃ gotraṃ ca nāma ca
GE09ram_07_u:3780: 7.058.009c saṃkīrtanaṃ ca rāmasya sītāyāḥ prasavau śubhau
GE09ram_07_u:3781: 7.058.010a ardharātre tu śatrughnaḥ śuśrāva sumahat priyam
GE09ram_07_u:3782: 7.058.010c parṇaśālāṃ gato rātrau diṣṭyā diṣṭyeti cābravīt
GE09ram_07_u:3785: 7.058.012a prabhāte tu mahāvīryaḥ kṛtvā paurvāhṇikaṃ kramam
GE09ram_07_u:3786: 7.058.012c muniṃ prāñjalir āmantrya prāyāt paścānmukhaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3789: 7.058.014a sa tatra munibhiḥ sārdhaṃ bhārgavapramukhair nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3793: 7.059.002a śūlasya ca balaṃ brahman ke ca pūrvaṃ nipātitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3798: 7.059.004c ikṣvākuvaṃśaprabhave yad vṛttaṃ tac chṛṇuṣva me
GE09ram_07_u:3800: 7.059.005c māndhatā iti vikhyātas triṣu lokeṣu vīryavān
GE09ram_07_u:3801: 7.059.006a sa kṛtvā pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ śāsane pṛthivīpatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3802: 7.059.006c suralokam atho jetum udyogam akaron nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3803: 7.059.007a indrasya tu bhayaṃ tīvraṃ surāṇāṃ ca mahātmanām
GE09ram_07_u:3809: 7.059.010a rājā tvaṃ mānuṣaṃ loke na tāvat puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_07_u:3811: 7.059.011a yadi vīra samagrā te medinī nikhilā vaśe
GE09ram_07_u:3813: 7.059.012a indram evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ tu māndhātā vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:3815: 7.059.013a tam uvāca sahasrākṣo lavaṇo nāma rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3817: 7.059.014a tac chrutvā vipriyaṃ ghoraṃ sahasrākṣeṇa bhāṣitam
GE09ram_07_u:3818: 7.059.014c vrīḍito 'vāṅmukho rājā vyāhartuṃ na śaśāka ha
GE09ram_07_u:3819: 7.059.015a āmantrya tu sahasrākṣaṃ hriyā kiṃ cid avāṅmukhaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3820: 7.059.015c punar evāgamac chrīmān imaṃ lokaṃ nareśvaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3822: 7.059.016c ājagāma madhoḥ putraṃ vaśe kartum aninditaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3824: 7.059.017c dūtaṃ saṃpreṣayām āsa sakāśaṃ lavaṇasya saḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3825: 7.059.018a sa gatvā vipriyāṇy āha bahūni madhunaḥ sutam
GE09ram_07_u:3826: 7.059.018c vadantam evaṃ taṃ dūtaṃ bhakṣayām āsa rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3828: 7.059.019c ardayām āsa tad rakṣaḥ śaravṛṣṭyā samantataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3829: 7.059.020a tataḥ prahasya lavaṇaḥ śūlaṃ jagrāha pāṇinā
GE09ram_07_u:3833: 7.059.022a evaṃ sa rājā sumahān hataḥ sabalavāhanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3834: 7.059.022c śūlasya ca balaṃ vīra aprameyam anuttamam
GE09ram_07_u:3835: 7.059.023a śvaḥ prabhāte tu lavaṇaṃ vadhiṣyasi na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3836: 7.059.023c agṛhītāyudhaṃ kṣipraṃ dhruvo hi vijayas tava
GE09ram_07_u:3837: 7.060.001a kathāṃ kathayatāṃ teṣāṃ jayaṃ cākāṅkṣatāṃ śubham
GE09ram_07_u:3839: 7.060.002a tataḥ prabhāte vimale tasmin kāle sa rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3841: 7.060.003a etasminn antare śūraḥ śatrughno yamunāṃ nadīm
GE09ram_07_u:3845: 7.060.005a tato dadarśa śatrughnaṃ sthitaṃ dvāri dhṛtāyudham
GE09ram_07_u:3846: 7.060.005c tam uvāca tato rakṣaḥ kim anena kariṣyasi
GE09ram_07_u:3848: 7.060.006c bhakṣitāni mayā roṣāt kālam ākāṅkṣase nu kim
GE09ram_07_u:3850: 7.060.007c svayaṃ praviṣṭo nu mukhaṃ katham āsādya durmate
GE09ram_07_u:3851: 7.060.008a tasyaivaṃ bhāṣamāṇasya hasataś ca muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3855: 7.060.010a uvāca ca susaṃkruddhaḥ śatrughnas taṃ niśācaram
GE09ram_07_u:3856: 7.060.010c yoddhum icchāmi durbuddhe dvandvayuddhaṃ tvayā saha
GE09ram_07_u:3860: 7.060.012c śatrus tvaṃ sarvajīvānāṃ na me jīvan gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_07_u:3861: 7.060.013a tasmiṃs tathā bruvāṇe tu rākṣasaḥ prahasann iva
GE09ram_07_u:3863: 7.060.014a mama mātṛṣvasur bhrātā rāvaṇo nāma rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3865: 7.060.015a tac ca sarvaṃ mayā kṣāntaṃ rāvaṇasyā kulakṣayam
GE09ram_07_u:3866: 7.060.015c avajñāṃ purataḥ kṛtvā mayā yūyaṃ viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3867: 7.060.016a na hatāś ca hi me sarve paribhūtās tṛṇaṃ yathā
GE09ram_07_u:3868: 7.060.016c bhūtaś caiva bhaviṣyāś ca yūyaṃ ca puruṣādhamāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3869: 7.060.017a tasya te yuddhakāmasyā yuddhaṃ dāsyāmi durmate
GE09ram_07_u:3870: 7.060.017c īpsitaṃ yādṛśaṃ tubhyaṃ sajjaye yāvad āyudham
GE09ram_07_u:3871: 7.060.018a tam uvācātha śatrughna kva me jīvan gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_07_u:3872: 7.060.018c durbalo 'py āgataḥ śatrur na moktavyaḥ kṛtātmanā
GE09ram_07_u:3873: 7.060.019a yo hi viklavayā buddhyā prasaraṃ śatrave dadau
GE09ram_07_u:3874: 7.060.019c sa hato mandabuddhitvād yathā kāpuruṣas tathā
GE09ram_07_u:3875: 7.061.001a tac chrutvā bhāṣitaṃ tasya śatrughnasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3876: 7.061.001c krodham āhārayat tīvraṃ tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
GE09ram_07_u:3877: 7.061.002a pāṇau pāṇiṃ viniṣpiṣya dantān kaṭakaṭāyya ca
GE09ram_07_u:3879: 7.061.003a taṃ bruvāṇaṃ tathā vākyaṃ lavaṇaṃ ghoravikramam
GE09ram_07_u:3880: 7.061.003c śatrughno deva śatrughna idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:3881: 7.061.004a śatrughno na tadā jāto yadānye nirjitās tvayā
GE09ram_07_u:3882: 7.061.004c tad adya bāṇābhihato vraja taṃ yamasādanam
GE09ram_07_u:3883: 7.061.005a ṛṣayo 'py adya pāpātman mayā tvāṃ nihataṃ raṇe
GE09ram_07_u:3884: 7.061.005c paśyantu viprā vidvāṃsas tridaśā iva rāvaṇam
GE09ram_07_u:3886: 7.061.006c puraṃ janapadaṃ cāpi kṣemam etad bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:3888: 7.061.007c pravekṣyate te hṛdayaṃ padmam aṃśur ivārkajaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3891: 7.061.009a tad dṛṣṭvā viphalaṃ karma rākṣasaḥ punar eva tu
GE09ram_07_u:3892: 7.061.009c pādapān subahūn gṛhya śatrughne vyasṛjad balī
GE09ram_07_u:3893: 7.061.010a śatrughnaś cāpi tejasvī vṛkṣān āpatato bahūn
GE09ram_07_u:3895: 7.061.011a tato bāṇamayaṃ varṣaṃ vyasṛjad rākṣasor asi
GE09ram_07_u:3896: 7.061.011c śatrughno vīryasaṃpanno vivyathe na ca rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3897: 7.061.012a tataḥ prahasya lavaṇo vṛkṣam utpāṭya līlayā
GE09ram_07_u:3898: 7.061.012c śirasy abhyahanac chūraṃ srastāṅgaḥ sa mumoha vai
GE09ram_07_u:3899: 7.061.013a tasmin nipatite vīre hāhākāro mahān abhūt
GE09ram_07_u:3901: 7.061.014a tam avajñāya tu hataṃ śatrughnaṃ bhuvi pātitam
GE09ram_07_u:3902: 7.061.014c rakṣo labdhāntaram api na viveśa svam ālayam
GE09ram_07_u:3903: 7.061.015a nāpi śūlaṃ prajagrāha taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhuvi pātitam
GE09ram_07_u:3904: 7.061.015c tato hata iti jñātvā tān bhakṣān samudāvahat
GE09ram_07_u:3905: 7.061.016a muhūrtāl labdhasaṃjñas tu punas tasthau dhṛtāyudhaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3907: 7.061.017a tato divyam amoghaṃ taṃ jagrāha śaram uttamam
GE09ram_07_u:3908: 7.061.017c jvalantaṃ tejasā ghoraṃ pūrayantaṃ diśo daśa
GE09ram_07_u:3913: 7.061.020a taṃ dīptam iva kālāgniṃ yugānte samupasthite
GE09ram_07_u:3916: 7.061.021c jagad dhi sarvam asvasthaṃ pitāmaham upasthitam
GE09ram_07_u:3918: 7.061.022c kaccil lokakṣayo deva prāpto vā yugasaṃkayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3919: 7.061.023a nedṛśaṃ dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ na śrutaṃ vā prapitāmaha
GE09ram_07_u:3921: 7.061.024a teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā brahmā lokapitāmanaḥ
