GE09ram_07_u:3924: 7.061.025c tejasā yasya sarve sma saṃmūḍhāḥ surasattamāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3925: 7.061.026a eṣo hi pūrvaṃ devasya lokakartuḥ sanātanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3926: 7.061.026c śaras tejomayo vatsā yena vai bhayam āgatam
GE09ram_07_u:3927: 7.061.027a eṣa vai kaiṭabhasyārthe madhunaś ca mahāśaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3928: 7.061.027c sṛṣṭo mahātmanā tena vadhārthaṃ daityayos tayoḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3929: 7.061.028a evam etaṃ prajānīdhvaṃ viṣṇos tejomayaṃ śaram
GE09ram_07_u:3930: 7.061.028c eṣā caiva tanuḥ pūrvā viṣṇos tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3933: 7.061.030a tasya te devadevasya niśamya madhurāṃ giram
GE09ram_07_u:3937: 7.061.032a ākāśam āvṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā devair hi raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3938: 7.061.032c siṃhanādaṃ muhuḥ kṛtvā dadarśa lavaṇaṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3939: 7.061.033a āhūtaś ca tatas tena śatrughnena mahātmanā
GE09ram_07_u:3941: 7.061.034a ākarṇāt sa vikṛṣyātha tad dhanur dhanvināṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3948: 7.061.037a tac ca divyaṃ mahac chūlaṃ hate lavaṇarākṣase
GE09ram_07_u:3954: 7.062.001a hate tu lavaṇe devāḥ sendrāḥ sāgnipurogamāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3956: 7.062.002a diṣṭyā te vijayo vatsa diṣṭya lavaṇarākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3958: 7.062.003a varadāḥ sma mahābāho sarva eva samāgatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3959: 7.062.003c vijayākāṅkṣiṇas tubhyam amoghaṃ darśanaṃ hi naḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3960: 7.062.004a devānāṃ bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā śūro mūrdhni kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3962: 7.062.005a imāṃ madhupurīṃ ramyāṃ madhurāṃ deva nirmitām
GE09ram_07_u:3963: 7.062.005c niveśaṃ prapnuyāṃ śīghram eṣa me 'stu varo mataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3964: 7.062.006a taṃ devāḥ prītamanaso bāḍham ity eva rāghavam
GE09ram_07_u:3965: 7.062.006c bhaviṣyati purī ramyā śūrasenā na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3966: 7.062.007a te tathoktvā mahātmāno divam āruruhus tadā
GE09ram_07_u:3968: 7.062.008a sā sena śīghram āgacchac chrutvā śatrughnaśāsanam
GE09ram_07_u:3970: 7.062.009a sā purī divyasaṃkāśā varṣe dvādaśame śubhā
GE09ram_07_u:3972: 7.062.010a kṣetrāṇi sasya yuktāni kāle varṣati vāsavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3976: 7.062.012a yac ca tena mahac chūnyaṃ lavaṇena kṛtaṃ purā
GE09ram_07_u:3980: 7.062.014a tasya buddhiḥ samutpannā niveśya madhurāṃ purīm
GE09ram_07_u:3984: 7.063.002a mantriṇo balamukhyāṃś ca nivartya ca purodhasaṃ
GE09ram_07_u:3986: 7.063.003a sa gatvā gaṇitān vāsān saptāṣṭau raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3988: 7.063.004a sa praviśya purīṃ ramyāṃ śrīmān ikṣvākunandanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3992: 7.063.006a yad ājñaptaṃ mahārāja sarvaṃ tat kṛtavān aham
GE09ram_07_u:3993: 7.063.006c hataḥ sa lavaṇaḥ pāpaḥ purī sā ca niveśitā
GE09ram_07_u:3994: 7.063.007a dvādaśaṃ ca gataṃ varṣaṃ tvāṃ vinā raghunandana
GE09ram_07_u:3995: 7.063.007c notsaheyam ahaṃ vastuṃ tvayā virahito nṛpa
GE09ram_07_u:3997: 7.063.008c mātṛhīno yathā vatsas tvāṃ vinā pravasāmy aham
GE09ram_07_u:3999: 7.063.009c mā viṣādaṃ kṛthā vīra naitat kṣatriya ceṣṭitam
GE09ram_07_u:4001: 7.063.010c prajāś ca paripālyā hi kṣatradharmeṇa rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:4002: 7.063.011a kāle kāle ca māṃ vīra ayodhyām avalokitum
GE09ram_07_u:4003: 7.063.011c āgaccha tvaṃ naraśreṣṭha gantāsi ca puraṃ tava
GE09ram_07_u:4004: 7.063.012a mamāpi tvaṃ sudayitaḥ prāṇair api na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4006: 7.063.013a tasmāt tvaṃ vasa kākutstha pañcarātraṃ mayā saha
GE09ram_07_u:4009: 7.063.014c śatrughno dīnayā vācā bāḍham ity eva cābravīt
GE09ram_07_u:4015: 7.063.017c bharatena ca śatrughno jagāmāśu purīṃ tadā
GE09ram_07_u:4016: 7.064.001a prasthāpya tu sa śatrughnaṃ bhrātṛbhyāṃ saha rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4021: 7.064.003c asakṛt putraputreti vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:4022: 7.064.004a kiṃ nu me duṣkṛtaṃ karma pūrvaṃ dehāntare kṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:4023: 7.064.004c yad ahaṃ putram ekaṃ tvāṃ paśyāmi nidhanaṃ gatam
GE09ram_07_u:4025: 7.064.005c akāle kālam āpannaṃ duḥkhāya mama putraka
GE09ram_07_u:4026: 7.064.006a alpair ahobhir nidhanaṃ gamiṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4027: 7.064.006c ahaṃ ca jananī caiva tava śokena putraka
GE09ram_07_u:4028: 7.064.007a na smarāmy anṛtaṃ hy uktaṃ na ca hiṃsāṃ smarāmy aham
GE09ram_07_u:4029: 7.064.007c kena me duṣkṛtenādya bāla eva mamātmajaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4031: 7.064.008a nedṛśaṃ dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ me śrutaṃ vā ghoradarśanam
GE09ram_07_u:4033: 7.064.009a rāmasya duṣkṛtaṃ kiṃ cin mahad asti na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4034: 7.064.009c tvaṃ rājañ jīvayasvainaṃ bālaṃ mṛtyuvaśaṃ gatam
GE09ram_07_u:4035: 7.064.010a bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito rājan dīrgham āyur avāpnuhi
GE09ram_07_u:4036: 7.064.010c uṣitāḥ sma sukhaṃ rājye tavāsmin sumahābala
GE09ram_07_u:4040: 7.064.012c asadvṛtte tu nṛpatāv akāle mriyate janaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4041: 7.064.013a yadā pureṣv ayuktāni janā janapadeśu ca
GE09ram_07_u:4042: 7.064.013c kurvate na ca rakṣāsti tadākālakṛtaṃ bhayam
GE09ram_07_u:4044: 7.064.014c pure janapade vāpi tadā bālavadho hy ayam
GE09ram_07_u:4045: 7.064.015a evaṃ bahuvidhair vākyair nindayāno muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4047: 7.065.001a tathā tu karuṇaṃ tasya dvijasya paridevitam
GE09ram_07_u:4050: 7.065.002c vasiṣṭhaṃ vāmadevaṃ ca bhrātṝṃś ca sahanaigamān
GE09ram_07_u:4051: 7.065.003a tato dvijā vasiṣṭhena sārdham aṣṭau praveśitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4058: 7.065.006c raghavaḥ sarvam ācaṣṭe dvijo yasmāt praroditi
GE09ram_07_u:4059: 7.065.007a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rājño dīnasya nāradaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4060: 7.065.007c pratyuvāca śubhaṃ vākyam ṛṣīṇāṃ saṃnidhau nṛpam
GE09ram_07_u:4063: 7.065.009a purā kṛtayuge rāma brāhmaṇā vai tapasvinaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4064: 7.065.009c abrāhmaṇas tadā rājan na tapasvī kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_07_u:4070: 7.065.012c mānavā ye mahātmānas tasmiṃs tretāyuge yuge
GE09ram_07_u:4071: 7.065.013a brahmakṣatraṃ tu tat sarvaṃ yat pūrvam aparaṃ ca yat
GE09ram_07_u:4073: 7.065.014a apaśyantas tu te sarve viśeṣam adhikaṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4075: 7.065.015a adharmaḥ pādam ekaṃ tu pātayat pṛthivītale
GE09ram_07_u:4076: 7.065.015c adharmeṇa hi saṃyuktās tena mandābhavan dvijāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4079: 7.065.017a tretāyuge tv avartanta brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyaś ca ye
GE09ram_07_u:4080: 7.065.017c tapo 'tapyanta te sarve śuśrūṣām apare janāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4081: 7.065.018a sa dharmaḥ paramas teṣāṃ vaiśyaśūdram athāgamat
GE09ram_07_u:4082: 7.065.018c pūjāṃ ca sarvavarṇānāṃ śūdrāś cakrur viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4088: 7.065.021c na śūdro labhate dharmam ugraṃ taptaṃ nararṣabha
GE09ram_07_u:4090: 7.065.022c bhaviṣyā śūdrayonyāṃ hi tapaścaryā kalau yuge
GE09ram_07_u:4092: 7.065.023c sa vai viṣayaparyante tava rājan mahātapāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4093: 7.065.023e śūdras tapyati durbuddhis tena bālavadho hy ayam
GE09ram_07_u:4094: 7.065.024a yo hy adharmam akāryaṃ vā viṣaye pārthivasya hi
GE09ram_07_u:4095: 7.065.024c karoti rājaśārdūla pure vā durmatir naraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4096: 7.065.024e kṣipraṃ hi narakaṃ yāti sa ca rājā na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4097: 7.065.025a sa tvaṃ puruṣaśārdūla mārgasva viṣayaṃ svakam
GE09ram_07_u:4098: 7.065.025c duṣkṛtaṃ yatra paśyethās tatra yatnaṃ samācara
GE09ram_07_u:4099: 7.065.026a evaṃ te dharmavṛddhiś ca nṛṇāṃ cāyurvivardhanam
GE09ram_07_u:4101: 7.066.001a nāradasya tu tad vākyaṃ śrutvāmṛtamayaṃ yathā
GE09ram_07_u:4102: 7.066.001c praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe lakṣmaṇaṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:4104: 7.066.002c bālasya ca śarīraṃ tat tailadroṇyāṃ nidhāpaya
GE09ram_07_u:4105: 7.066.003a gandhaiś ca paramodārais tailaiś ca susugandhibhiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4106: 7.066.003c yathā na kṣīyate bālas tathā saumya vidhīyatām
GE09ram_07_u:4108: 7.066.004c vipattiḥ paribhedo vā bhaven na ca tathā kuru
GE09ram_07_u:4111: 7.066.006a iṅgitaṃ sa tu vijñāya puṣpako hemabhūṣitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4113: 7.066.007a so 'bravīt praṇato bhūtvā ayam asmi narādhipa
GE09ram_07_u:4117: 7.066.009a dhanur gṛhītvā tūṇīṃ ca khagdaṃ ca ruciraprabham
GE09ram_07_u:4119: 7.066.010a prāyāt pratīcīṃ sa marūn vicinvaṃś ca samantataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4121: 7.066.011a apaśyamānas tatrāpi svalpam apy atha duṣkṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:4122: 7.066.011c pūrvām api diśaṃ sarvām athāpaśyan narādhipaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4125: 7.066.013a tasmin sarasi tapyantaṃ tāpasaṃ sumahat tapaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4126: 7.066.013c dadarśa rāghavaḥ śrīmāṃl lambamānam adho mukham
GE09ram_07_u:4128: 7.066.014c uvāca rāghavo vākyaṃ dhanyas tvam asi suvrata
GE09ram_07_u:4130: 7.066.015c kautūhalāt tvāṃ pṛcchāmi rāmo dāśarathir hy aham
GE09ram_07_u:4131: 7.066.016a manīṣitas te ko nv arthaḥ svargalābho varāśrayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4132: 7.066.016c yam aśritya tapas taptaṃ śrotum icchāmi tāpasa
GE09ram_07_u:4133: 7.066.017a brāhmaṇo vāsi bhadraṃ te kṣatriyo vāsi durjayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4134: 7.066.017c vaiśyo vā yadi vā śūdraḥ satyam etad bravīhi me
GE09ram_07_u:4136: 7.067.001c avākśirās tathābhūto vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:4140: 7.067.003c śūdraṃ māṃ viddhi kākutstha śambūkaṃ nāma nāmataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4142: 7.067.004c niṣkṛṣya kośād vimalaṃ śiraś ciccheda rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4145: 7.067.006c sa gatvā vinayenaiva taṃ natvā mumude sukhī
GE09ram_07_u:4149: 7.067.008c svāgataṃ te naraśreṣṭha diṣṭyā prāpto 'si rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:4150: 7.067.009a tvaṃ me bahumato rāma guṇair bahubhir uttamaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4151: 7.067.009c atithiḥ pūjanīyaś ca māma rājan hṛdi sthitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4152: 7.067.010a surā hi kathayanti tvām āgataṃ śūdraghātinam
GE09ram_07_u:4153: 7.067.010c brāhmaṇasya tu dharmeṇa tvayā jīvāpitaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4154: 7.067.011a uṣyatāṃ ceha rajanīṃ sakāśe mama rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:4155: 7.067.011c prabhāte puṣpakeṇa tvaṃ gantā svapuram eva hi
GE09ram_07_u:4159: 7.067.013a dattasya hi punar dānaṃ sumahat phalam ucyate
GE09ram_07_u:4160: 7.067.013c tasmāt pradāsye vidhivat tat pratīccha nararṣabha
GE09ram_07_u:4161: 7.067.014a tad rāmaḥ pratijagrāha munes tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4162: 7.067.014c divyam ābharaṇaṃ citraṃ pradīptam iva bhāskaram
GE09ram_07_u:4163: 7.067.015a pratigṛhya tato rāmas tad ābharaṇam uttamam
GE09ram_07_u:4165: 7.067.016a atyadbhutam idaṃ brahman vapuṣā yuktam uttamam
GE09ram_07_u:4166: 7.067.016c kathaṃ bhagavatā prāptaṃ kuto vā kena vāhṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:4168: 7.067.017c āścaryāṇāṃ bahūnāṃ hi nidhiḥ paramako bhavān
GE09ram_07_u:4169: 7.067.018a evaṃ bruvati kākutsthe munir vākyam athābravīt
GE09ram_07_u:4170: 7.067.018c śṛṇu rāma yathāvṛttaṃ purā tretāyuge gate
GE09ram_07_u:4171: 7.068.001a purā tretāyuge hy āsīd araṇyaṃ bahuvistaram
GE09ram_07_u:4174: 7.068.002c aham ākramituṃ śaumya tad araṇyam upāgamam
GE09ram_07_u:4175: 7.068.003a tasya rūpam araṇyasya nirdeṣṭuṃ na śaśāka ha
GE09ram_07_u:4177: 7.068.004a tasyāraṇyasya madhye tu saro yojanam āyatam
GE09ram_07_u:4181: 7.068.006a tasmin saraḥsamīpe tu mahad adbhutam āśramam
GE09ram_07_u:4184: 7.068.007c prabhāte kālyam utthāya saras tad upacakrame
GE09ram_07_u:4185: 7.068.008a athāpaśyaṃḥ śavaṃ tatra supuṣṭam ajaraṃ kva cit
GE09ram_07_u:4186: 7.068.008c tiṣṭhantaṃ parayā lakṣmyā tasmiṃs toyāśaye nṛpa
GE09ram_07_u:4187: 7.068.009a tam arthaṃ cintayāno 'haṃ muhūrtaṃ tatra rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:4188: 7.068.009c viṣṭhito 'smi sarastīre kiṃ nv idaṃ syād iti prabho
GE09ram_07_u:4194: 7.068.012a paśyato me tadā rāma vimānād avaruhya ca
GE09ram_07_u:4195: 7.068.012c taṃ śavaṃ bhakṣayām āsa sa svargī raghunandana
GE09ram_07_u:4196: 7.068.013a tato bhuktvā yathākāmaṃ māṃsaṃ bahu ca suṣṭhu ca
GE09ram_07_u:4200: 7.068.015a tam ahaṃ devasaṃkāśam ārohantam udīkṣya vai
GE09ram_07_u:4201: 7.068.015c athāham abruvaṃ vākyaṃ tam eva puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_07_u:4202: 7.068.016a ko bhavān devasaṃkāśa āhāraś ca vigarhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4203: 7.068.016c tvayāyaṃ bhujyate saumya kiṃ karthaṃ vaktum arhasi
GE09ram_07_u:4205: 7.068.017c āhāro garhitaḥ saumya śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4206: 7.069.001a bhuktvā tu bhāṣitaṃ vākyaṃ mama rāma śubhākṣaram
GE09ram_07_u:4209: 7.069.002c duratikramaṇīyaṃ hi yathā pṛcchasi māṃ dvija
GE09ram_07_u:4210: 7.069.003a purā vaidarbhako rājā pitā mama mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4211: 7.069.003c sudeva iti vikhyātas triṣu lokeṣu vīryavān
GE09ram_07_u:4212: 7.069.004a tasya putradvayaṃ brahman dvābhyāṃ strībhyām ajāyata
GE09ram_07_u:4213: 7.069.004c ahaṃ śveta iti khyāto yavīyān suratho 'bhavat
GE09ram_07_u:4214: 7.069.005a tataḥ pitari svaryāte paurā mām abhyaṣecayan
GE09ram_07_u:4217: 7.069.006c rājyaṃ kārayato brahman prajā dharmeṇa rakṣataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4218: 7.069.007a so 'haṃ nimitte kasmiṃś cid vijñātāyur dvijottama
GE09ram_07_u:4219: 7.069.007c kāladharmaṃ hṛdi nyasya tato vanam upāgamam
GE09ram_07_u:4221: 7.069.008c tapaś cartuṃ praviṣṭo 'smi samīpe sarasaḥ śubhe
GE09ram_07_u:4223: 7.069.009c idaṃ saraḥ samāsādya tapas taptaṃ mayā ciram
GE09ram_07_u:4226: 7.069.011a tato māṃ svargasaṃsthaṃ vai kṣutpipāse dvijottama
GE09ram_07_u:4231: 7.069.013c āhāraḥ kaś ca me deva tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE09ram_07_u:4232: 7.069.014a pitāmahas tu mām āha tavāhāraḥ sudevaja
GE09ram_07_u:4233: 7.069.014c svādūni svāni māṃsāni tāni bhakṣaya nityaśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4234: 7.069.015a svaśarīraṃ tvayā puṣṭaṃ kurvatā tapa uttamam
GE09ram_07_u:4235: 7.069.015c anuptaṃ rohate śveta na kadā cin mahāmate
GE09ram_07_u:4236: 7.069.016a dattaṃ na te 'sti sūkṣmo 'pi vane sattvaniṣevite
GE09ram_07_u:4238: 7.069.017a sa tvaṃ supuṣṭam āhāraiḥ svaśarīram anuttamam
GE09ram_07_u:4240: 7.069.018a yadā tu tad vanaṃ śveta agastyaḥ sumahān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4242: 7.069.019a sa hi tārayituṃ saumya śaktaḥ suragaṇān api
GE09ram_07_u:4243: 7.069.019c kiṃ punas tvāṃ mahābāho kṣutpipāsāvaśaṃ gatam
GE09ram_07_u:4246: 7.069.021a bahūn varṣagaṇān brahman bhujyamānam idaṃ mayā
GE09ram_07_u:4247: 7.069.021c kṣayaṃ nābhyeti brahmarṣe tṛptiś cāpi mamottamā
GE09ram_07_u:4248: 7.069.022a tasya me kṛcchrabhūtasya kṛcchrād asmād vimokṣaya
GE09ram_07_u:4249: 7.069.022c anyeṣām agatir hy atra kumbhayonim ṛte dvijam
GE09ram_07_u:4254: 7.069.025a mayā pratigṛhīte tu tasminn ābharaṇe śubhe
GE09ram_07_u:4255: 7.069.025c mānuṣaḥ pūrvako deho rājarṣeḥ sa nanāśa ha
GE09ram_07_u:4256: 7.069.026a pranaṣṭe tu śarīre 'sau rājarṣiḥ parayā mudā
GE09ram_07_u:4257: 7.069.026c tṛptaḥ pramudito rājā jagāma tridivaṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4261: 7.070.001c gauravād vismayāc caiva bhūyaḥ praṣṭuṃ pracakrame
GE09ram_07_u:4262: 7.070.002a bhagavaṃs tad vanaṃ ghoraṃ tapas tapyati yatra saḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4263: 7.070.002c śveto vaidarbhako rājā kathaṃ tad amṛgadvijam
GE09ram_07_u:4264: 7.070.003a niḥsattvaṃ ca vanaṃ jātaṃ śūnyaṃ manujavarjitam
GE09ram_07_u:4265: 7.070.003c tapaś cartuṃ praviṣṭaḥ sa śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4268: 7.070.005a purā kṛtayuge rāma manur daṇḍadharaḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4269: 7.070.005c tasya putro mahān āsīd ikṣvākuḥ kulavardhanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4270: 7.070.006a taṃ putraṃ pūrvake rājye nikṣipya bhuvi durjayam
GE09ram_07_u:4271: 7.070.006c pṛthivyāṃ rājavaṃśānāṃ bhava kartety uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:4272: 7.070.007a tatheti ca pratijñātaṃ pituḥ putreṇa rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:4273: 7.070.007c tataḥ paramasaṃhṛṣṭo manuḥ punar uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:4275: 7.070.008c daṇḍena ca prajā rakṣa mā ca daṇḍam akāraṇe
GE09ram_07_u:4276: 7.070.009a aparādhiṣu yo daṇḍaḥ pātyate mānaveṣu vai
GE09ram_07_u:4277: 7.070.009c sa daṇḍo vidhivan muktaḥ svargaṃ nayati pārthivam
GE09ram_07_u:4278: 7.070.010a tasmād daṇḍe mahābāho yatnavān bhava putraka
GE09ram_07_u:4279: 7.070.010c dharmo hi paramo loke kurvatas te bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:4280: 7.070.011a iti taṃ bahu saṃdiśya manuḥ putraṃ samādhinā
GE09ram_07_u:4284: 7.070.013a karmabhir bahurūpaiś ca tais tair manusutaḥ sutān
GE09ram_07_u:4287: 7.070.014c mūḍhaś cākṛtividyaś ca na śuśrūṣati pūrvajān
GE09ram_07_u:4288: 7.070.015a nāma tasya ca daṇḍeti pitā cakre 'lpatejasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4290: 7.070.016a sa paśyamānas taṃ doṣaṃ ghoraṃ putrasya rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:4292: 7.070.017a sa daṇḍas tatra rājābhūd ramye parvatarodhasi
GE09ram_07_u:4294: 7.070.018a purasya cākaron nāma madhumantam iti prabho
GE09ram_07_u:4296: 7.070.019a evaṃ sa rājā tad rājyaṃ kārayat sapurohitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4302: 7.071.003a atha kāle tu kasmiṃś cid rājā bhārgavam āśramam
GE09ram_07_u:4308: 7.071.006a kutas tvam asi suśroṇi kasya vāsi sutā śubhe
GE09ram_07_u:4310: 7.071.007a tasya tv evaṃ bruvāṇasya mohonmattasya kāminaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4314: 7.071.009a guruḥ pitā me rājendra tvaṃ ca śiṣyo mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4315: 7.071.009c vyasanaṃ sumahat kruddhaḥ sa te dadyān mahātapāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4316: 7.071.010a yadi vātra mayā kāryaṃ dharmadṛṣṭena satpathā
GE09ram_07_u:4317: 7.071.010c varayasva nṛpa śreṣṭha pitaraṃ me mahādyutim
GE09ram_07_u:4318: 7.071.011a anyathā tu phalaṃ tubhyaṃ bhaved ghorābhisaṃhitam
GE09ram_07_u:4319: 7.071.011c krodhena hi pitā me 'sau trailokyam api nirdahet
GE09ram_07_u:4322: 7.071.013a prasādaṃ kuru suśroṇi na kālaṃ kṣeptum arhasi
GE09ram_07_u:4323: 7.071.013c tvatkṛte hi mama prāṇā vidīryante śubhānane
GE09ram_07_u:4324: 7.071.014a tvāṃ prāpya hi vadho vāpi pāpaṃ vāpi sudāruṇam
GE09ram_07_u:4325: 7.071.014c bhaktaṃ bhajasva māṃ bhīru bhajamānaṃ suvihvalam
GE09ram_07_u:4326: 7.071.015a evam uktvā tu tāṃ kanyāṃ dorbhyāṃ gṛhya balād balī
GE09ram_07_u:4328: 7.071.016a tam anarthaṃ mahāghoraṃ daṇḍaḥ kṛtvā sudāruṇam
GE09ram_07_u:4333: 7.072.001c svam āśramaṃ śiṣya vṛtaḥ kṣudhārtaḥ saṃnyavartata
GE09ram_07_u:4337: 7.072.003c nirdahann iva lokāṃs trīñ śiṣyāṃś cedam uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:4341: 7.072.005c yaḥ pradīptāṃ hutāśasya śikhāṃ vai spraṣṭum icchati
GE09ram_07_u:4342: 7.072.006a yasmāt sa kṛtavān pāpam īdṛśaṃ ghoradarśanam
GE09ram_07_u:4343: 7.072.006c tasmāt prāpsyati durmedhāḥ phalaṃ pāpasya karmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4354: 7.072.012a śrutvā tūśasano vākyaṃ sa āśramāvasatho janaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4355: 7.072.012c niṣkrānto viṣayāt tasya sthānaṃ cakre 'tha bāhyataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4356: 7.072.013a sa tathoktvā munijanam arajām idam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:4359: 7.072.014c araje vijvarā bhuṅkṣva kālaś cātra pratīkṣyatām
GE09ram_07_u:4360: 7.072.015a tvatsamīpe tu ye sattvā vāsam eṣyanti tāṃ niśām
GE09ram_07_u:4362: 7.072.016a ity uktvā bhārgavo vāsam anyatra samupākramat
GE09ram_07_u:4365: 7.072.017c śapto brahmarṣiṇā tena purā vaidharmake kṛte
GE09ram_07_u:4368: 7.072.019a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yan māṃ pṛcchasi rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:4369: 7.072.019c saṃdhyām upāsituṃ vīra samayo hy ativartate
GE09ram_07_u:4372: 7.072.021a sa tair ṛṣibhir abhyastaḥ sahitair brahmasattamaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4373: 7.072.021c ravir astaṃ gato rāma gacchodakam upaspṛśa
GE09ram_07_u:4374: 7.073.001a ṛṣer vacanam ājñāya rāmaḥ saṃdhyām upāsitum
GE09ram_07_u:4380: 7.073.004a sa bhuktavān naraśreṣṭhas tad annam amṛtopamam
GE09ram_07_u:4381: 7.073.004c prītaś ca parituṣṭaś ca tāṃ rātriṃ samupāvasat
GE09ram_07_u:4385: 7.073.006c āpṛcche tvāṃ gamiṣyāmi mām anujñātum arhasi
GE09ram_07_u:4390: 7.073.009a atyadbhutam idaṃ vākyaṃ tava rāma śubhākṣaram
GE09ram_07_u:4392: 7.073.010a muhūrtam api rāma tvāṃ ye nu paśyanti ke cana
GE09ram_07_u:4393: 7.073.010c pāvitāḥ svargabhūtās te pūjyante divi daivataiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4394: 7.073.011a ye ca tvāṃ ghoracakṣurbhir īkṣante prāṇino bhuvi
GE09ram_07_u:4397: 7.073.012c praśādhi rājyaṃ dharmeṇa gatir hi jagato bhavān
GE09ram_07_u:4398: 7.073.013a evam uktas tu muninā prāñjaliḥ prpagraho nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4400: 7.073.014a abhivādya muniśreṣṭhaṃ tāṃś ca sarvāṃs tapodhanān
GE09ram_07_u:4404: 7.073.016a svasthaḥ sa dadṛśe rāmaḥ puṣpake hemabhūṣite
GE09ram_07_u:4410: 7.073.019a lakṣmaṇaṃ bharataṃ caiva gatvā tau laghuvikramau
GE09ram_07_u:4411: 7.073.019c mamāgamanam ākhyāya śabdāpaya ca māṃ ciram
GE09ram_07_u:4414: 7.074.002a dṛṣṭvā tu rāghavaḥ prāptau priyau bharatalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_07_u:4415: 7.074.002c pariṣvajya tato rāmo vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:4419: 7.074.004c sahito yaṣṭum icchāmi tatra dharmo hi śāśvataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4422: 7.074.006a somaś ca rājasūyena iṣṭvā dharmeṇa dharmavit
GE09ram_07_u:4423: 7.074.006c prāptaś ca sarvalokānāṃ kīrtiṃ sthānaṃ ca śāśvatam
GE09ram_07_u:4424: 7.074.007a asminn ahani yac chreyaś cintyatāṃ tan mayā saha
GE09ram_07_u:4425: 7.074.007c hitaṃ cāyati yuktaṃ ca prayatau vaktum arhatha
GE09ram_07_u:4427: 7.074.008c bharataḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:4428: 7.074.009a tvayi dharmaḥ paraḥ sādho tvayi sarvā vasuṃdharā
GE09ram_07_u:4430: 7.074.010a mahīpālāś ca sarve tvāṃ prajāpatim ivāmarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4432: 7.074.011a prajāś ca pitṛvad rājan paśyanti tvāṃ mahābala
GE09ram_07_u:4434: 7.074.012a sa tvam evaṃvidhaṃ yajñam āhartāsi kathaṃ nṛpa
GE09ram_07_u:4436: 7.074.013a pṛthivyāṃ ye ca puruṣā rājan pauruṣam āgatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4439: 7.074.014c pṛthivīṃ nārhase hantuṃ vaśe hi tava vartate
GE09ram_07_u:4440: 7.074.015a bharatasya tu tad vākyaṃ śrutvāmṛtamayaṃ yathā
GE09ram_07_u:4442: 7.074.016a uvāca ca śubhāṃ vāṇīṃ kaikeyyā nandivardhanam
GE09ram_07_u:4448: 7.074.019a prajānāṃ pālanaṃ dharmo rājñāṃ yajñena saṃmitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4449: 7.074.019c tasmāc chṛṇomi te vākyaṃ sādhūktaṃ susamāhitam
GE09ram_07_u:4450: 7.075.001a tathoktavati rāme tu bharate ca mahātmani
GE09ram_07_u:4457: 7.075.004c vṛtro nāma mahān āsīd daiteyo lokasaṃmataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4459: 7.075.005c anurāgeṇa lokāṃs trīn snehāt paśyati sarvataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4460: 7.075.006a dharmajñaś ca kṛtajñaś ca buddhyā ca pariniṣṭhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4463: 7.075.007c rasavanti prasūtāni mūlāni ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_07_u:4465: 7.075.008c sa rājyaṃ tādṛśaṃ bhuṅkte sphītam adbhutadarśanam
GE09ram_07_u:4466: 7.075.009a tasya buddhiḥ samutpannā tapaḥ kuryām anuttamam
GE09ram_07_u:4467: 7.075.009c tapo hi paramaṃ śreyas tapo hi paramaṃ sukham
GE09ram_07_u:4468: 7.075.010a sa nikṣipya sutaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ paureṣu parameśvaram
GE09ram_07_u:4470: 7.075.011a tapas tapyati vṛtre tu vāsavaḥ paramārtavat
GE09ram_07_u:4471: 7.075.011c viṣṇuṃ samupasaṃkramya vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:4473: 7.075.012c balavān sa hi dharmātmā nainaṃ śakṣyāmi bādhitum
GE09ram_07_u:4474: 7.075.013a yady asau tapa ātiṣṭhed bhūya eva sureśvara
GE09ram_07_u:4475: 7.075.013c yāval lokā dhariṣyanti tāvad asya vaśānugāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4477: 7.075.014c kṣaṇaṃ hi na bhaved vṛtraḥ kruddhe tvayi sureśvara
GE09ram_07_u:4478: 7.075.015a yadā hi prītisaṃyogaṃ tvayā viṣṇo samāgataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4480: 7.075.016a sa tvaṃ prasādaṃ lokānāṃ kuruṣva sumahāyaśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4481: 7.075.016c tvatkṛtena hi sarvaṃ syāt praśāntam ajaraṃ jagat
GE09ram_07_u:4482: 7.075.017a ime hi sarve viṣṇo tvāṃ nirīkṣante divaukasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4483: 7.075.017c vṛtraghatena mahatā eṣāṃ sāhyaṃ kuruṣva ha
GE09ram_07_u:4484: 7.075.018a tvayā hi nityaśaḥ sāhyaṃ kṛtam eṣāṃ mahātmanām
GE09ram_07_u:4485: 7.075.018c asahyam idam anyeṣām agatīnāṃ gatir bhavān
GE09ram_07_u:4486: 7.076.001a lakṣmaṇasya tu tad vākyaṃ śrutvā śatrunibarhaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4489: 7.076.002c bhūya eva kathāṃ divyāṃ kathayām āsa lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4493: 7.076.004c tena yuṣmat priyārthaṃ vai nāhaṃ hanmi mahāsuram
GE09ram_07_u:4494: 7.076.005a avaśyaṃ karaṇīyaṃ ca bhavatāṃ sukham uttamam
GE09ram_07_u:4495: 7.076.005c tasmād upāyam ākhyāsye yena vṛtraṃ haniṣyatha
GE09ram_07_u:4497: 7.076.006c tena vṛtraṃ sahasrākṣo haniṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4498: 7.076.007a eko 'ṃśo vāsavaṃ yātu dvitīyo vajram eva tu
GE09ram_07_u:4499: 7.076.007c tṛtīyo bhūtalaṃ śakras tato vṛtraṃ haniṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:4500: 7.076.008a tathā bruvati deveśe devā vākyam athābruvan
GE09ram_07_u:4501: 7.076.008c evam etan na saṃdeho yathā vadasi daityahan
GE09ram_07_u:4505: 7.076.010c tad araṇyam upākrāman yatra vṛtro mahāsuraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4507: 7.076.011c pibantam iva lokāṃs trīn nirdahantam ivāmbaram
GE09ram_07_u:4509: 7.076.012c katham enaṃ vadhiṣyāmaḥ kathaṃ na syāt parājayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4517: 7.076.016c apatac cāsya gātreṣu tam indraṃ duḥkham āviśat
GE09ram_07_u:4520: 7.076.018a tvaṃ gatiḥ paramā deva pūrvajo jagataḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4522: 7.076.019a hataś cāyaṃ tvayā vṛtro brahmahatyā ca vāsavam
GE09ram_07_u:4524: 7.076.020a teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā devānāṃ viṣṇur abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:4525: 7.076.020c mām eva yajatāṃ śakraḥ pāvayiṣyāmi vajriṇam
GE09ram_07_u:4528: 7.076.022a evaṃ saṃdiśya devānāṃ tāṃ vāṇīm amṛtopamā
GE09ram_07_u:4530: 7.077.001a tathā vṛtravadhaṃ sarvam akhilena sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4533: 7.077.002c brahmahatyāvṛtaḥ śakraḥ saṃjñāṃ lebhe na vṛtrahā
GE09ram_07_u:4535: 7.077.003c kālaṃ tatrāvasat kaṃ cid veṣṭamāno yathoragaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4536: 7.077.004a atha naṣṭe sahasrākṣe udvignam abhavaj jagat
GE09ram_07_u:4538: 7.077.005a niḥsrotasaś cāmbuvāhā hradāś ca saritas tathā
GE09ram_07_u:4541: 7.077.006c yad uktaṃ viṣṇunā pūrvaṃ taṃ yajñaṃ samupānayan
GE09ram_07_u:4543: 7.077.007c taṃ deśaṃ sahitā jagmur yatrendro bhayamohitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4544: 7.077.008a te tu dṛṣṭvā sahasrākṣaṃ mohitaṃ brahmahatyayā
GE09ram_07_u:4549: 7.077.010c abhigamyābravīd vākyaṃ kva me sthānaṃ vidhāsyatha
GE09ram_07_u:4550: 7.077.011a te tām ūcus tato devās tuṣṭāḥ prītisamanvitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4553: 7.077.012c saṃnidhau sthānam anyatra varayām āsa durvasā
GE09ram_07_u:4555: 7.077.013c dvitīyena tu vṛkṣeṣu satyam etad bravīmi vaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4556: 7.077.014a yo 'yam aṃśas tṛtīyo me strīṣu yauvanaśāliṣu
GE09ram_07_u:4558: 7.077.015a hantāro brāhmaṇān ye tu prekṣāpūrvam adūṣakān
GE09ram_07_u:4560: 7.077.016a pratyūcus tāṃ tato devā yathā vadasi durvase
GE09ram_07_u:4561: 7.077.016c tathā bhavatu tat sarvaṃ sādhayasva yathepsitam
GE09ram_07_u:4564: 7.077.018a praśāntaṃ ca jagat sarvaṃ sahasrākṣe pratiṣṭhate
GE09ram_07_u:4570: 7.078.002a evam etan naraśreṣṭha yathā vadasi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_07_u:4572: 7.078.003a śrūyate hi purā saumya kardamasya prajāpateḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4573: 7.078.003c putro bāhlīśvaraḥ śrīmān ilo nāma sudhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4574: 7.078.004a sa rājā pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ vaśe kṛtvā mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4576: 7.078.005a suraiś ca paramodārair daiteyaiś ca mahāsuraiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4579: 7.078.006c abibhyaṃś ca trayo lokāḥ saroṣasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4580: 7.078.007a sa rājā tādṛśo hy āsīd dharme vīrye ca niṣṭhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4582: 7.078.008a sa pracakre mahābāhur mṛgayāṃ rucire vane
GE09ram_07_u:4585: 7.078.009c hatvaiva tṛptir nābhūc ca rājñas tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4587: 7.078.010c yatra jāto mahāsenas taṃ deśam upacakrame
GE09ram_07_u:4589: 7.078.011c ramayām āsa durdharṣaiḥ sarvair anucaraiḥ saha
GE09ram_07_u:4592: 7.078.013a ye ca tatra vanoddeśe sattvāḥ puruṣavādinaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4593: 7.078.013c yac ca kiṃ cana tat sarvaṃ nārīsaṃjñaṃ babhūva ha
GE09ram_07_u:4594: 7.078.014a etasminn antare rājā sa ilaḥ kardamātmajaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4598: 7.078.016a tasya duḥkhaṃ mahat tv āsīd dṛṣṭvātmānaṃ tathā gatam
GE09ram_07_u:4599: 7.078.016c umāpateś ca tat karma jñātvā trāsam upāgamat
GE09ram_07_u:4602: 7.078.018a tataḥ prahasya varadaḥ saha devyā mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4605: 7.078.019c puruṣatvam ṛte saumya varaṃ varaya suvrata
GE09ram_07_u:4606: 7.078.020a tataḥ sa rājā śokārtāḥ pratyākhyāto mahātmanā
GE09ram_07_u:4607: 7.078.020c na sa jagrāha strībhūto varam anyaṃ surottamāt
GE09ram_07_u:4610: 7.078.022a īśe varāṇāṃ varade lokānām asi bhāmini
GE09ram_07_u:4611: 7.078.022c amoghadarśane devi bhaje saumye namo 'stu te
GE09ram_07_u:4613: 7.078.023c pratyuvāca śubhaṃ vākyaṃ devī rudrasya saṃmatā
GE09ram_07_u:4614: 7.078.024a ardhasya devo varado varārdhasya tathā hy aham
GE09ram_07_u:4615: 7.078.024c tasmād ardhaṃ gṛhāṇa tvaṃ strīpuṃsor yāvad icchasi
GE09ram_07_u:4616: 7.078.025a tad adbhutatamaṃ śrutvā devyā varam anuttamam
GE09ram_07_u:4618: 7.078.026a yadi devi prasannā me rūpeṇāpratimā bhuvi
GE09ram_07_u:4619: 7.078.026c māsaṃ strītvam upāsitvā māsaṃ syāṃ puruṣaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4621: 7.078.027c pratyuvāca śubhaṃ vākyam evam etad bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:4622: 7.078.028a rājan puruṣabhūtas tvaṃ strībhāvaṃ na smariṣyasi
GE09ram_07_u:4623: 7.078.028c strībhūtaś cāparaṃ māsaṃ na smariṣyasi pauruṣam
GE09ram_07_u:4624: 7.078.029a evaṃ sa rājā puruṣo māmaṃ bhūtvātha kārdamiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4628: 7.079.002a tau rāmaṃ prāñjalībhūtvā tasya rājño mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4629: 7.079.002c vistaraṃ tasya bhāvasya tadā papracchatuḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4630: 7.079.003a kathaṃ sa rājā strībhūto vartayām āsa durgatim
GE09ram_07_u:4631: 7.079.003c puruṣo vā yadā bhūtaḥ kāṃ vṛttiṃ vartayaty asau
GE09ram_07_u:4633: 7.079.004c kathayām āsa kākutṣṭhas tasya rājño yathā gatam
GE09ram_07_u:4634: 7.079.005a tam eva prathamaṃ māsaṃ strībhūtvā lokasundarī
GE09ram_07_u:4635: 7.079.005c tābhiḥ parivṛtā strībhir ye 'sya pūrvaṃ padānugāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4638: 7.079.007a vāhanāni ca sarvāṇi saṃtyaktvā vai samantataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4642: 7.079.009a dadarśa sā ilā tasmin budhaṃ somasutaṃ tadā
GE09ram_07_u:4643: 7.079.009c jvalantaṃ svena vapuṣā pūrṇaṃ somam ivoditam
GE09ram_07_u:4644: 7.079.010a tapantaṃ ca tapas tīvram ambhomadhye durāsadam
GE09ram_07_u:4646: 7.079.011a sā taṃ jalāśayaṃ sarvaṃ kṣobhayām āsa vismitā
GE09ram_07_u:4647: 7.079.011c saha taiḥ pūra puruṣaiḥ strībhūtai raghunandana
GE09ram_07_u:4651: 7.079.013c cintāṃ samabhyatikrāmat kā nv iyaṃ devatādhikā
GE09ram_07_u:4652: 7.079.014a na devīṣu na nāgīṣu nāsurīṣv apsaraḥsu ca
GE09ram_07_u:4653: 7.079.014c dṛṣṭapūrvā mayā kā cid rūpeṇaitena śobhitā
GE09ram_07_u:4655: 7.079.015c iti buddhiṃ samāsthāya jalāt sthalam upāgamat
GE09ram_07_u:4656: 7.079.016a sa āśramaṃ samupāgamya catasraḥ pramadās tataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4657: 7.079.016c śabdāpayata dharmātmā tāś cainaṃ ca vavandire
GE09ram_07_u:4658: 7.079.017a sa tāḥ papraccha dharmātma kasyaiṣā lokasundarī
GE09ram_07_u:4659: 7.079.017c kimartham āgatā ceha satyam ākhyāta māciram
GE09ram_07_u:4660: 7.079.018a śubhaṃ tu tasya tadvākyaṃ madhuraṃ madhurākṣaram
GE09ram_07_u:4661: 7.079.018c śrutvā tu tāḥ striyaḥ sarvā ūcur madhurayā girā
GE09ram_07_u:4662: 7.079.019a asmākam eṣā suśroṇī prabhutve vartate sadā
GE09ram_07_u:4664: 7.079.020a tad vākyam avyaktapadaṃ tāsāṃ strīṇāṃ niśamya tu
GE09ram_07_u:4665: 7.079.020c vidyām āvartanīṃ puṇyām āvartayata sa dvijaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4666: 7.079.021a so 'rthaṃ viditvā nikhilaṃ tasya rājño yathāgatam
GE09ram_07_u:4667: 7.079.021c sarvā eva striyas tāś ca babhāṣe munipuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4668: 7.079.022a atra kiṃ puruṣā bhadrā avasañ śailarodhasi
GE09ram_07_u:4673: 7.079.024c upāsāṃ cakrire śailaṃ bahvyas tā bahudhā tadā
GE09ram_07_u:4675: 7.080.001c āścaryam iti cābrūtām ubhau rāmaṃ janeśvaram
GE09ram_07_u:4676: 7.080.002a atha rāmaḥ kathām etāṃ bhūya eva mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4678: 7.080.003a sarvās tā vidrutā dṛṣṭvā kiṃnarīr ṛṣisattamaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4679: 7.080.003c uvāca rūpasaṃpannāṃ tāṃ striyaṃ prahasann iva
GE09ram_07_u:4681: 7.080.004c bhajasva māṃ varārohe bhaktyā snigdhena cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_07_u:4685: 7.080.006c praśādhi māṃ somasuta yathecchasi tathā kuru
GE09ram_07_u:4687: 7.080.007c sa vai kāmī saha tayā reme candramasaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4688: 7.080.008a budhasya mādhavo māsas tām ilāṃ rucirānanām
GE09ram_07_u:4695: 7.080.011c na ca paśyāmi tat sainyaṃ kva nu te māmakā gatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4696: 7.080.012a tac chrutvā tasya rājarṣer naṣṭasaṃjñasya bhāṣitam
GE09ram_07_u:4697: 7.080.012c pratyuvāca śubhaṃ vākyaṃ sāntvayan parayā girā
GE09ram_07_u:4702: 7.080.015a sa rājā tena vākyena pratyāśvasto mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4704: 7.080.016a tyakṣyāmy ahaṃ svakaṃ rājyaṃ nāhaṃ bhṛtyair vinā kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4706: 7.080.017a suto dharmaparo brahmañ jyeṣṭho mama mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4707: 7.080.017c śaśabindur iti khyātaḥ sa me rājyaṃ prapatsyate
GE09ram_07_u:4708: 7.080.018a na hi śakṣyāmy ahaṃ gatvā bhṛtyadārān sukhānvitān
GE09ram_07_u:4709: 7.080.018c prativaktuṃ mahātejaḥ kiṃ cid apy aśubhaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4710: 7.080.019a tathā bruvati rājendre budhaḥ paramam adbhutam
GE09ram_07_u:4711: 7.080.019c sāntvapūrvam athovāca vāsas ta iha rocatām
GE09ram_07_u:4712: 7.080.020a na saṃtāpas tvayā kāryaḥ kārdameya mahābala
GE09ram_07_u:4715: 7.080.021c vāsāya vidadhe buddhiṃ yad uktaṃ brahmavādinā
GE09ram_07_u:4716: 7.080.022a māsaṃ sa strī tadā bhūtvā ramayaty aniśaṃ śubhā
GE09ram_07_u:4718: 7.080.023a tataḥ sa navame māsi ilā somasutātmajam
GE09ram_07_u:4720: 7.080.024a jātamātraṃ tu suśroṇī pitur haste nyaveśayat
GE09ram_07_u:4724: 7.081.001a tathoktavati rāme tu tasya janma tad adbhutam
GE09ram_07_u:4725: 7.081.001c uvāca lakṣmaṇo bhūyo bharataś ca mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4727: 7.081.002c akarot kiṃ naraśreṣṭha tat tvaṃ śaṃsitum arhasi
GE09ram_07_u:4736: 7.081.007a ayaṃ rājā mahābāhuḥ kardamasya ilaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4737: 7.081.007c jānītainaṃ yathā bhūtaṃ śreyo hy asya vidhīyatām
GE09ram_07_u:4738: 7.081.008a teṣāṃ saṃvadatām eva tam āśramam upāgamat
GE09ram_07_u:4740: 7.081.009a pulastyaś ca kratuś caiva vaṣaṭkāras tathaiva ca
GE09ram_07_u:4741: 7.081.009c oṃkāraś ca mahātejās tam āśramam upāgaman
GE09ram_07_u:4743: 7.081.010c hitaiṣiṇo bāhli pateḥ pṛthag vākyam athābruvan
GE09ram_07_u:4744: 7.081.011a kardamas tv abravīd vākyaṃ sutārthaṃ paramaṃ hitam
GE09ram_07_u:4745: 7.081.011c dvijāḥ śṛṇuta madvākyaṃ yac chreyaḥ pārthivasya hi
GE09ram_07_u:4747: 7.081.012c nāśvamedhāt paro yajñaḥ priyaś caiva mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4749: 7.081.013c kardamenaivam uktās tu sarva eva dvijarṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4750: 7.081.013e rocayanti sma taṃ yajñaṃ rudrasyārādhanaṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:4752: 7.081.014c marutta iti vikhyatas taṃ yajñaṃ samupāharat
GE09ram_07_u:4754: 7.081.015c rudraś ca paramaṃ toṣam ājagāma mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4755: 7.081.016a atha yajñasamāptau tu prītaḥ paramayā mudā
GE09ram_07_u:4756: 7.081.016c umāpatir dvijān sarvān uvācedam ilāṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:4758: 7.081.017c asya bāhlipateś caiva kiṃ karomi priyaṃ śubham
GE09ram_07_u:4759: 7.081.018a tathā vadati deveśe dvijās te susamāhitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4760: 7.081.018c prasādayanti deveśaṃ yathā syāt puruṣas tv ilā
GE09ram_07_u:4761: 7.081.019a tataḥ prītamanā rudraḥ puruṣatvaṃ dadau punaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4763: 7.081.020a nivṛtte hayamedhe tu gate cādarśanaṃ hare
GE09ram_07_u:4765: 7.081.021a rājā tu bāhlim utsṛjya madhyadeśe hy anuttamam
GE09ram_07_u:4769: 7.081.023a sa kāle prāptavāṃl lokam ilo brāhmam anuttamam
GE09ram_07_u:4772: 7.081.024c strībhūtaḥ pauruṣaṃ lebhe yac cānyad api durlabham
GE09ram_07_u:4774: 7.082.001c lakṣmaṇaṃ punār evāha dharmayuktam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4775: 7.082.002a vasiṣṭhaṃ vāmadevaṃ ca jābālim atha kaśyapam
GE09ram_07_u:4777: 7.082.003a etān sarvān samāhūya mantrayitvā ca lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_07_u:4780: 7.082.004c dvijān sarvān samāhūya darśayām āsa rāghavam
GE09ram_07_u:4783: 7.082.006a prāñjalis tu tato bhūtvā rāghavo dvijasāttamān
GE09ram_07_u:4787: 7.082.008a vijñāya tu mataṃ teṣāṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:4789: 7.082.009a śīghraṃ mahadbhir haribhir bahibhiś ca tadāśrayaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4790: 7.082.009c sārdham āgaccha bhadraṃ te anubhoktuṃ makhottamam
GE09ram_07_u:4791: 7.082.010a vibhīṣaṇaś ca rakṣobhiḥ kāmagair bahubhir vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4793: 7.082.011a rājānaś ca naravyāghra ye me priyacikīrṣavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4798: 7.082.013c deśāntaragatā ye ca sadārāś ca maharṣayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4799: 7.082.014a yajñavāṭaś ca sumahān gomatyā naimiṣe vane
GE09ram_07_u:4800: 7.082.014c ājñāpyatāṃ mahābāho tad dhi puṇyam anuttamam
GE09ram_07_u:4804: 7.082.016c agrato bharataḥ kṛtvā gacchatv agre mahāmatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4806: 7.082.017c naigamān bālavṛddhāṃś ca dvijāṃś ca susamāhitān
GE09ram_07_u:4807: 7.082.018a karmāntikāṃś ca kuśalāñ śilpinaś ca supaṇḍitān
GE09ram_07_u:4808: 7.082.018c mātaraś caiva me sarvāḥ kumārāntaḥpurāṇi ca
GE09ram_07_u:4809: 7.082.019a kāñcanīṃ mama patnīṃ ca dīkṣārhāṃ yajñakarmaṇi
GE09ram_07_u:4810: 7.082.019c agrato bharataḥ kṛtvā gacchatv agre mahāmatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4813: 7.083.002a ṛtvigbhir lakṣmaṇaṃ sārdham aśve ca viniyujya saḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4816: 7.083.003c praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe śrīmān iti ca so 'bravīt
GE09ram_07_u:4817: 7.083.004a naimiṣe vasatas tasya sarva eva narādhipāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4825: 7.083.008a vibhīṣaṇaś ca rakṣobhiḥ sragvibhir bahubhir vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4830: 7.083.010c chandato dehi visrabdho yāvat tuṣyanti yācakāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4832: 7.083.011a na kaś cin malinas tatra dīno vāpy atha vā kṛśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4834: 7.083.012a ye ca tatra mahātmāno munayaś cirajīvinaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4838: 7.083.014a na śakrasya na somasya yamasya varuṇasya vā
GE09ram_07_u:4839: 7.083.014c īdṛśo dṛṣṭapūrvo na evam ūcus tapodhanāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4840: 7.083.015a sarvatra vānarās tasthuḥ sarvatraiva ca rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4841: 7.083.015c vāso dhanāni kāmibhyaḥ pūrṇahastā dadur bhṛśam
GE09ram_07_u:4843: 7.083.016c saṃvatsaram atho sāgraṃ vartate na ca hīyate
GE09ram_07_u:4848: 7.084.003a sa śiṣyāv abravīd dhṛṣṭo yuvāṃ gatvā samāhitau
GE09ram_07_u:4849: 7.084.003c kṛtsnaṃ rāmāyaṇaṃ kāvyaṃ gāyatāṃ parayā mudā
GE09ram_07_u:4852: 7.084.005a rāmasya bhavanadvāri yatra karma ca vartate
GE09ram_07_u:4853: 7.084.005c ṛtvijām agrataś caiva tatra geyaṃ viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4854: 7.084.006a imāni ca phalāny atra svādūni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_07_u:4856: 7.084.007a na yāsyathaḥ śramaṃ vatsau bhakṣayitvā phalāni vai
GE09ram_07_u:4860: 7.084.009a divase viṃśatiḥ sargā geyā vai parayā mudā
GE09ram_07_u:4861: 7.084.009c pramāṇair bahubhis tatra yathoddiṣṭaṃ mayā purā
GE09ram_07_u:4862: 7.084.010a lobhaś cāpi na kartavyaḥ svalpo 'pi dhanakāṅkṣayā
GE09ram_07_u:4864: 7.084.011a yadi pṛcchet sa kākutstho yuvāṃ kasyeti dārakau
GE09ram_07_u:4865: 7.084.011c vālmīker atha śiṣyau hi brūtām evaṃ narādhipam
GE09ram_07_u:4866: 7.084.012a imās tantrīḥ sumadhurāḥ sthānaṃ vā pūrvadarśitam
GE09ram_07_u:4868: 7.084.013a ādiprabhṛti geyaṃ syān na cāvajñāya pārthivam
GE09ram_07_u:4869: 7.084.013c pitā hi sarvabhūtānāṃ rājā bhavati dharmataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4870: 7.084.014a tad yuvāṃ hṛṣṭamanasau śvaḥ prabhāte samādhinā
GE09ram_07_u:4872: 7.084.015a iti saṃdiśya bahuśo muniḥ prācetasas tadā
GE09ram_07_u:4880: 7.085.002a tāṃ sa śuśrāva kākutsthaḥ pūrvacaryāṃ tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4881: 7.085.002c apūrvāṃ pāṭhya jātiṃ ca geyena samalaṃkṛtām
GE09ram_07_u:4885: 7.085.004c pārthivāṃś ca naravyāghraḥ paṇḍitān naigamāṃs tathā
GE09ram_07_u:4886: 7.085.005a paurāṇikāñ śabdavito ye ca vṛddhā dvijātayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4888: 7.085.006a hṛṣṭā ṛṣigaṇās tatra pārthivāś ca mahaujasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4889: 7.085.006c pibanta iva cakṣurbhyāṃ rājānaṃ gāyakau ca tau
GE09ram_07_u:4890: 7.085.007a parasparam athocus te sarva eva samaṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4891: 7.085.007c ubhau rāmasya sadṛśau bimbād bimbam ivoddhṛtau
GE09ram_07_u:4892: 7.085.008a jaṭilau yadi na syātāṃ na valkaladharau yadi
GE09ram_07_u:4895: 7.085.009c geyaṃ pracakratus tatra tāv ubhau munidārakau
GE09ram_07_u:4897: 7.085.010c na ca tṛptiṃ yayuḥ sarve śrotāro geya saṃpadā
GE09ram_07_u:4899: 7.085.011c tataḥ prabhṛti sargāṃś ca yāvadviṃśaty agāyatām
GE09ram_07_u:4903: 7.085.013c dadasva śīghraṃ kākutstha bālayor mā vṛthā śramaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4905: 7.085.014c ūcatuś ca mahātmānau kim aneneti vismitau
GE09ram_07_u:4909: 7.085.016c śrotāraś caiva rāmaś ca sarva eva suvismitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4910: 7.085.017a tasya caivāgamaṃ rāmaḥ kāvyasya śrotum utsukaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4911: 7.085.017c papraccha tau mahātejās tāv ubhau munidārakau
GE09ram_07_u:4912: 7.085.018a kiṃpramāṇam idaṃ kāvyaṃ kā pratiṣṭhā mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4913: 7.085.018c kartā kāvyasya mahataḥ ko vāsau munipuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4918: 7.085.020c pratiṣṭhā jīvitaṃ yāvat tāvad rājañ śubhāśubham
GE09ram_07_u:4919: 7.085.021a yadi buddhiḥ kṛtā rājañ śravaṇāya mahāratha
GE09ram_07_u:4920: 7.085.021c karmāntare kṣaṇī hūtas tac chṛṇuṣva sahānujaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4921: 7.085.022a bāḍham ity abravīd rāmas tau cānujñāpya rāghavam
GE09ram_07_u:4923: 7.085.023a rāmo 'pi munibhiḥ sārdhaṃ pārthivaiś ca mahātmabhiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4925: 7.086.001a rāmo bahūny ahāny eva tad gītaṃ paramādbhutam
GE09ram_07_u:4926: 7.086.001c śuśrāva munibhiḥ sārdhaṃ rājabhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4927: 7.086.002a tasmin gīte tu vijñāya sītāputrau kuśīlavau
GE09ram_07_u:4928: 7.086.002c tasyāḥ pariṣado madhye rāmo vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:4932: 7.086.005a chandaṃ munes tu vijñāya sītāyāś ca manogatam
GE09ram_07_u:4933: 7.086.005c pratyayaṃ dātukāmāyās tataḥ śaṃsata me laghu
GE09ram_07_u:4934: 7.086.006a śvaḥ prabhāte tu śapathaṃ maithilī janakātmajā
GE09ram_07_u:4936: 7.086.007a śrutvā tu rāghavasyaitad vacaḥ paramam adbhutam
GE09ram_07_u:4939: 7.086.008c ūcus te rāma vākyāni mṛdūni madhurāṇi ca
GE09ram_07_u:4940: 7.086.009a teṣāṃ tad bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā rāmasya ca manogatam
GE09ram_07_u:4942: 7.086.010a evaṃ bhavatu bhadraṃ vo yathā tuṣyati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4943: 7.086.010c tathā kariṣyate sītā daivataṃ hi patiḥ striyāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4946: 7.086.012a tataḥ prahṛṣṭaḥ kākutsthaḥ śrutvā vākyaṃ mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4947: 7.086.012c ṛṣīṃs tatra sametāṃś ca rājñaś caivābhyabhāṣata
GE09ram_07_u:4948: 7.086.013a bhagavantaḥ saśiṣyā vai sānugaś ca narādhipāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4952: 7.086.015a rājānaś ca mahātmānaḥ praśaṃsanti sma rāghavam
GE09ram_07_u:4953: 7.086.015c upapannaṃ naraśreṣṭha tvayy eva bhuvi nānyataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4954: 7.086.016a evaṃ viniścayaṃ kṛtvā śvobhūta iti rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4955: 7.086.016c visarjayām āsa tadā sarvāṃs tāñ śatrusūdanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4958: 7.087.002a vasiṣṭho vāmadevaś ca jābālir atha kāśyapaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4961: 7.087.003c mārkaṇḍeyaś ca dīrghāyur maudgalyaś ca mahātapāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4962: 7.087.004a bhārgavaś cyavanaś caiva śatānandaś ca dharmavit
GE09ram_07_u:4963: 7.087.004c bharadvājaś ca tejasvī agniputraś ca suprabhaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4964: 7.087.005a ete cānye ca munayo bahavaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4965: 7.087.005c rājānaś ca naravyāghrāḥ sarva eva samāgatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4966: 7.087.006a rākṣasāś ca mahāvīryā vānarāś ca mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4968: 7.087.007a kṣatriyāś caiva vaiśyāś ca śūdrāś caiva sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:4972: 7.087.009a tam ṛṣiṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ sītā sānvagacchad avāṅmukhī
GE09ram_07_u:4974: 7.087.010a tāṃ dṛṣṭvā śrīm ivāyāntīṃ brahmāṇam anugāminīm
GE09ram_07_u:4975: 7.087.010c vālmīkeḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ sītāṃ sādhukāro mahān abhūt
GE09ram_07_u:4976: 7.087.011a tato halahalā śabdaḥ sarveṣām evam ābabhau
GE09ram_07_u:4978: 7.087.012a sādhu sīteti ke cit tu sādhu rāmeti cāpare
GE09ram_07_u:4979: 7.087.012c ubhāv eva tu tatrānye sādhu sādhv iti cābruvan
GE09ram_07_u:4985: 7.087.015c pratyayaṃ dāsyate sītā tām anujñātum arhasi
GE09ram_07_u:4986: 7.087.016a imau ca jānakī putrāv ubhau ca yamajātakau
GE09ram_07_u:4987: 7.087.016c sutau tavaiva durdharṣo satyam etad bravīmi te
GE09ram_07_u:4989: 7.087.017c na smarāmy anṛtaṃ vākyaṃ tathemau tava putrakau
GE09ram_07_u:4991: 7.087.018c tasyāḥ phalam upāśnīyām apāpā maithilī yathā
GE09ram_07_u:4997: 7.088.001c prāñjalir jagato madhye dṛṣṭvā tāṃ devavarṇinīm
GE09ram_07_u:4998: 7.088.002a evam etan mahābhāga yathā vadasi dharmavit
GE09ram_07_u:4999: 7.088.002c pratyayo hi mama brahmaṃs tava vākyair akalmaṣaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5000: 7.088.003a pratyayo hi purā datto vaidehyā surasaṃnidhau
GE09ram_07_u:5002: 7.088.003e parityaktā mayā sītā tad bhavān kṣantum arhati
GE09ram_07_u:5003: 7.088.004a jānāmi cemau putrau me yamajātau kuśīlavau
GE09ram_07_u:5004: 7.088.004c śuddhāyāṃ jagato madhye maithilyāṃ prītir astu me
GE09ram_07_u:5007: 7.088.006a ādityā vasavo rudrā viśve deśā marudgaṇāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5009: 7.088.006e sādhyāś ca devāḥ sarve te sarve ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5010: 7.088.007a tato vāyuḥ śubhaḥ puṇyo divyagandho manoramaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5011: 7.088.007c taṃ janaughaṃ suraśreṣṭho hlādayām āsa sarvataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5016: 7.088.010a yathāhaṃ rāghavād anyaṃ manasāpi na cintaye
GE09ram_07_u:5017: 7.088.010c tathā me mādhavī devī vivaraṃ dātum arhati
GE09ram_07_u:5018: 7.088.011a tathā śapantyāṃ vaidehyāṃ prādurāsīt tad adbhutam
GE09ram_07_u:5022: 7.088.013a tasmiṃs tu dharaṇī devī bāhubhyāṃ gṛhya maithilīm
GE09ram_07_u:5027: 7.088.015c sādhu sādhv iti vai sīte yasyās te śīlam īdṛśam
GE09ram_07_u:5028: 7.088.016a evaṃ bahuvidhā vāco hy antarikṣagatāḥ surāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5030: 7.088.017a yajñavāṭagatāś cāpi munayaḥ sarva eva te
GE09ram_07_u:5032: 7.088.018a antarikṣe ca bhūmau ca sarve sthāvarajaṅgamāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5034: 7.088.019a ke cid vineduḥ saṃhṛṣṭāḥ ke cid dhyānaparāyaṇāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5035: 7.088.019c ke cid rāmaṃ nirīkṣante ke cit sītām acetanāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5037: 7.088.020c taṃ muhūrtam ivātyarthaṃ sarvaṃ saṃmohitaṃ jagat
GE09ram_07_u:5039: 7.089.001c apaśyamāno vaidehīṃ mene śūnyam idaṃ jagat
GE09ram_07_u:5043: 7.089.003a tato visṛjya tān sarvān rāmo rājīvalocanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5044: 7.089.003c hṛdi kṛtvā tadā sītām ayodhyāṃ praviveśa saḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5045: 7.089.004a na sītāyāḥ parāṃ bhāryāṃ vavre sa raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5046: 7.089.004c yajñe yajñe ca patnyarthaṃ jānakī kāñcanī bhavat
GE09ram_07_u:5050: 7.089.006c īje kratubhir anyaiś ca sa śrīmān āptadakṣiṇaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5051: 7.089.007a evaṃ sa kālaḥ sumahān rājyasthasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5055: 7.089.009a kāle varṣati parjanyaḥ subhikṣaṃ vimalā diśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5057: 7.089.010a nākāle mriyate kaś cin na vyādhiḥ prāṇināṃ tadā
GE09ram_07_u:5058: 7.089.010c nādharmaś cābhavat kaś cid rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati
GE09ram_07_u:5063: 7.089.013a sarvāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ svarge rājñā daśarathena ca
GE09ram_07_u:5064: 7.089.013c samāgatā mahābhāgāḥ saha dharmaṃ ca lebhire
GE09ram_07_u:5065: 7.089.014a tāsāṃ rāmo mahādānaṃ kāle kāle prayacchati
GE09ram_07_u:5068: 7.089.015c cakāra rāmo dharmātmā pitṝn devān vivardhayan
GE09ram_07_u:5069: 7.090.001a kasya cit tv atha kālasya yudhājit kekayo nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5074: 7.090.003c rāmāya pradadau rājā bahūny ābharaṇāni ca
GE09ram_07_u:5075: 7.090.004a śrutvā tu rāghavo gārgyaṃ maharṣiṃ samupāgatam
GE09ram_07_u:5078: 7.090.005c gārgyaṃ saṃpūjayām āsa dhanaṃ tat pratigṛhya ca
GE09ram_07_u:5079: 7.090.006a pṛṣṭvā ca prītidaṃ sarvaṃ kuśalaṃ mātulasya ca
GE09ram_07_u:5081: 7.090.007a kim āha matulo vākyaṃ yadarthaṃ bhagavān iha
GE09ram_07_u:5082: 7.090.007c prāpto vākyavidāṃ śreṣṭha sākṣād iva bṛhaspatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5085: 7.090.009a mātulas te mahābāho vākyam āha nararṣabha
GE09ram_07_u:5089: 7.090.011a taṃ ca rakṣanti gandharvāḥ sāyudhā yuddhakovidāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5090: 7.090.011c śailūṣasya sutā vīrās tisraḥ koṭyo mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5093: 7.090.013a anyasya na gatis tatra deśaś cāyaṃ suśobhanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5094: 7.090.013c rocatāṃ te mahābāho nāhaṃ tvām anṛtaṃ vade
GE09ram_07_u:5095: 7.090.014a tac chrutvā rāghavaḥ prīto mararṣir mātulasya ca
GE09ram_07_u:5096: 7.090.014c uvāca bāḍham ity evaṃ bharataṃ cānvavaikṣata
GE09ram_07_u:5098: 7.090.015c imau kumārau taṃ deśaṃ brahmarṣe vijayiṣyataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5099: 7.090.016a bharatasyātmajau vīrau takṣaḥ puṣkala eva ca
GE09ram_07_u:5100: 7.090.016c mātulena suguptau tau dharmeṇa ca samāhitau
GE09ram_07_u:5103: 7.090.018a niveśya te puravare ātmājau saṃniveśya ca
GE09ram_07_u:5105: 7.090.019a brahmarṣim evam uktvā tu bharataṃ sabalānugam
GE09ram_07_u:5108: 7.090.020c bharataḥ saha sainyena kumārābhyāṃ ca niryayau
GE09ram_07_u:5109: 7.090.021a sā senā śakrayukteva naragān niryayāv atha
GE09ram_07_u:5111: 7.090.022a māṃsāśīni ca sattvāni rakṣāṃsi sumahānti ca
GE09ram_07_u:5116: 7.090.024c bahūni vai sahasrāṇi senāyā yayur agrataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5123: 7.091.003a bharataś ca yudhājic ca sametau laghuvikramau
GE09ram_07_u:5125: 7.091.004a śrutvā tu bharataṃ prāptaṃ gandharvās te samāgatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5133: 7.091.008a taṃ ghātaṃ ghorasaṃkāśaṃ na smaranti divaukasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5136: 7.091.009c niveśayām āsa tadā samṛddhe dve purottame
GE09ram_07_u:5139: 7.091.010c varṣaiḥ pañcabhir ākīrṇo viṣayair nāgarais tathā
GE09ram_07_u:5150: 7.091.015c rāghavaṃ bharataḥ śrīmān brahmāṇam iva vāsavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5152: 7.091.016c niveśanaṃ ca deśasya śrutvā prīto 'sya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5153: 7.092.001a tac chrutvā harṣam āpede rāghavo bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
GE09ram_07_u:5158: 7.092.003c ramaṇīyo hy asaṃbādho rametāṃ yatra dhanvinau
GE09ram_07_u:5159: 7.092.004a na rājñāṃ yatra pīdā syān nāśramāṇāṃ vināśanam
GE09ram_07_u:5160: 7.092.004c sa deśo dṛśyatāṃ saumya nāparādhyāmahe yathā
GE09ram_07_u:5161: 7.092.005a tathoktavati rāme tu bharataḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:5166: 7.092.007c taṃ ca kṛtā vaśe deśam aṅgadasya nyaveśayat
GE09ram_07_u:5171: 7.092.010a tato rāmaḥ parāṃ prītiṃ bharato lakṣmaṇas tathā
GE09ram_07_u:5172: 7.092.010c yayur yudhi durādharṣā abhiṣekaṃ ca cakrire
GE09ram_07_u:5176: 7.092.012c candraketos tu bharataḥ pārṣṇigrāho babhūva ha
GE09ram_07_u:5178: 7.092.013c putre sthite durādharṣe ayodhyāṃ punar āgamat
GE09ram_07_u:5182: 7.092.015c kālaṃ gatam api snehān na jajñāte 'tidhārmikau
GE09ram_07_u:5189: 7.093.001a kasya cit tv atha kālasya rāme dharmapathe sthite
GE09ram_07_u:5194: 7.093.003c rāmaṃ didṛkṣur āyātaḥ kāryeṇa hi mahābala
GE09ram_07_u:5197: 7.093.005a jayasva rājan dharmeṇa ubhau lokau mahādyute
GE09ram_07_u:5198: 7.093.005c dūtas tvāṃ draṣṭum āyātas tapasvī bhāskaraprabhaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5199: 7.093.006a tad vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇenoktaṃ śrutvā rāma uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:5200: 7.093.006c praveśyatāṃ munis tāta mahaujās tasya vākyadhṛk
GE09ram_07_u:5201: 7.093.007a saumitris tu tathety uktvā prāveśayata taṃ munim
GE09ram_07_u:5204: 7.093.008c ṛṣir madhurayā vācā vardhasvety āha rāghavam
GE09ram_07_u:5205: 7.093.009a tasmai rāmo mahātejāḥ pūjām arghya purogamām
GE09ram_07_u:5207: 7.093.010a pṛṣṭhaś ca kuśalaṃ tena rāmeṇa vadatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5209: 7.093.011a tam uvāca tato rāmaḥ svāgataṃ te mahāmune
GE09ram_07_u:5210: 7.093.011c prāpayasva ca vākyāni yato dūtas tvam āgataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5212: 7.093.012c dvandvam etat pravaktavyaṃ na ca cakṣur hataṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5213: 7.093.013a yaḥ śṛṇoti nirīkṣed vā sa vadhyas tava rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:5214: 7.093.013c bhaved vai munimukhyasya vacanaṃ yady avekṣase
GE09ram_07_u:5215: 7.093.014a tatheti ca pratijñāya rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:5217: 7.093.015a sa me vadhyaḥ khalu bhavet kathāṃ dvandvasamīritām
GE09ram_07_u:5218: 7.093.015c ṛṣer mama ca saumitre paśyed vā śṛṇuyā ca yaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5220: 7.093.016c tam uvāca muniṃ vākyaṃ kathayasveti rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5221: 7.093.017a yat te manīṣitaṃ vākyaṃ yena vāsi samāhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5222: 7.093.017c kathayasva viśaṅkas tvaṃ mamāpi hṛdi vartate
GE09ram_07_u:5223: 7.094.001a śṛṇu rāma mahābāho yadartham aham āhataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5227: 7.094.003a pitāmahaś ca bhagavān āha lokapatiḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5229: 7.094.004a saṃkṣipya ca purā lokān māyayā svayam eva hi
GE09ram_07_u:5230: 7.094.004c mahārṇave śayāno 'psu māṃ tvaṃ pūrvam ajījanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5231: 7.094.005a bhogavantaṃ tato nāgam anantam udake śayam
GE09ram_07_u:5232: 7.094.005c māyayā janayitvā tvaṃ dvau ca sattvau mahābalau
GE09ram_07_u:5233: 7.094.006a madhuṃ ca kaiṭabhaṃ caiva yayor asthicayair vṛtā
GE09ram_07_u:5235: 7.094.007a padme divyārkasaṃkāśe nābhyām utpādya mām api
GE09ram_07_u:5236: 7.094.007c prājāpatyaṃ tvayā karma sarvaṃ mayi niveśitam
GE09ram_07_u:5237: 7.094.008a so 'haṃ saṃnyastabhāro hi tvām upāse jagatpatim
GE09ram_07_u:5238: 7.094.008c rakṣāṃ vidhatsva bhūteṣu mama tejaḥ karo bhavān
GE09ram_07_u:5239: 7.094.009a tatas tvam api durdharṣas tasmād bhāvāt sanātanāt
GE09ram_07_u:5243: 7.094.011a sa tvaṃ vitrāsyamānāsu prajāsu jagatāṃ vara
GE09ram_07_u:5246: 7.094.012c kṛtvā vāsasya niyatiṃ svayam evātmanaḥ purā
GE09ram_07_u:5247: 7.094.013a sa tvaṃ manomayaḥ putraḥ pūrṇāyur mānuṣeṣv iha
GE09ram_07_u:5249: 7.094.014a yadi bhūyo mahārāja prajā icchasy upāsitum
GE09ram_07_u:5250: 7.094.014c vasa vā vīra bhadraṃ te evam āha pitāmahaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5251: 7.094.015a atha vā vijigīṣā te suralokāya rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:5255: 7.094.017a śrutaṃ me devadevasya vākyaṃ paramam adbhutam
GE09ram_07_u:5257: 7.094.018a bhadraṃ te 'stu gamiṣyāmi yata evāham āgataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5258: 7.094.018c hṛd gato hy asi saṃprāpto na me 'sty atra vicāraṇā
GE09ram_07_u:5260: 7.094.019c sthātavyaṃ sarvasaṃhāre yathā hy āha pitāmahaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5261: 7.095.001a tathā tayoḥ kathayator durvāsā bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5264: 7.095.002c rāmaṃ darśaya me śīghraṃ purā me 'rtho 'tivartate
GE09ram_07_u:5265: 7.095.003a munes tu bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā
GE09ram_07_u:5266: 7.095.003c abhivādya mahātmānaṃ vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:5267: 7.095.004a kiṃ kāryaṃ brūhi bhagavan ko vārthaḥ kiṃ karomy aham
GE09ram_07_u:5268: 7.095.004c vyagro hi rāghavo brahman muhūrtaṃ vā pratīkṣatām
GE09ram_07_u:5270: 7.095.005c uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ vākyaṃ nirdahann iva cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_07_u:5271: 7.095.006a asmin kṣaṇe māṃ saumitre rāmāya prativedaya
GE09ram_07_u:5272: 7.095.006c viṣayaṃ tvāṃ puraṃ caiva śapiṣye rāghavaṃ tathā
GE09ram_07_u:5273: 7.095.007a bharataṃ caiva saumitre yuṣmākaṃ yā ca saṃtatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5274: 7.095.007c na hi śakṣyāmy ahaṃ bhūyo manyuṃ dhārayituṃ hṛdi
GE09ram_07_u:5275: 7.095.008a tac chrutvā ghorasaṃkāśaṃ vākyaṃ tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5276: 7.095.008c cintayām āsa manasā tasya vākyasya niścayam
GE09ram_07_u:5277: 7.095.009a ekasya maraṇaṃ me 'stu mā bhūt sarvavināśanam
GE09ram_07_u:5279: 7.095.010a lakṣmaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā rāmaḥ kālaṃ visṛjya ca
GE09ram_07_u:5280: 7.095.010c niṣpatya tvaritaṃ rājā atreḥ putraṃ dadarśa ha
GE09ram_07_u:5282: 7.095.011c kiṃ kāryam iti kākutsthaḥ kṛtāñjalir abhāṣata
GE09ram_07_u:5283: 7.095.012a tad vākyaṃ rāghaveṇṇoktaṃ śrutvā munivaraḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5287: 7.095.014a tac chrutvā vacanaṃ rāmo harṣeṇa mahatānvitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5289: 7.095.015a sa tu bhuktvā muniśreṣṭhas tad annam amṛtopamam
GE09ram_07_u:5290: 7.095.015c sādhu rāmeti saṃbhāṣya svam āśramam upāgamat
GE09ram_07_u:5293: 7.095.017a duḥkhena ca susaṃtaptaḥ smṛtvā tad ghoradarśanam
GE09ram_07_u:5294: 7.095.017c avānmukho dīnamanā vyāhartuṃ na śaśāka ha
GE09ram_07_u:5296: 7.095.018c naitad astīti coktvā sa tūṣṇīm āsīn mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5297: 7.096.001a avāṅmukham atho dīnaṃ dṛṣṭvā somam ivāplutam
GE09ram_07_u:5298: 7.096.001c rāghavaṃ lakṣmaṇo vākyaṃ hṛṣṭo madhuram abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:5299: 7.096.002a na saṃtāpaṃ mahābāho madarthaṃ kartum arhasi
GE09ram_07_u:5301: 7.096.003a jahi māṃ saumya visrabdaḥ pratijñāṃ paripālaya
GE09ram_07_u:5303: 7.096.004a yadi prītir mahārāja yady anugrāhyatā mayi
GE09ram_07_u:5304: 7.096.004c jahi māṃ nirviśaṅkas tvaṃ dharmaṃ vardhaya rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:5307: 7.096.006a abravīc ca yathāvṛttaṃ teṣāṃ madhye narādhipaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5309: 7.096.007a tac chrutvā mantriṇaḥ sarve sopādhyāyāḥ samāsata
GE09ram_07_u:5310: 7.096.007c vasiṣṭhas tu mahātejā vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:5311: 7.096.008a dṛṣṭam etan mahābāho kṣayaṃ te lomaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_07_u:5312: 7.096.008c lakṣmaṇena viyogaś ca tava rāma mahāyaśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5313: 7.096.009a tyajainaṃ balavān kālo mā pratijñāṃ vṛthā kṛthāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5314: 7.096.009c vinaṣṭāyāṃ pratijñāyāṃ dharmo hi vilayaṃ vrajet
GE09ram_07_u:5315: 7.096.010a tato dharme vinaṣṭe tu trailokye sacarācaram
GE09ram_07_u:5318: 7.096.011c lakṣmaṇasya vadhenādya jagat svasthaṃ kuruṣva ha
GE09ram_07_u:5320: 7.096.012c śrutvā pariṣado madhye rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:5321: 7.096.013a visarjaye tvāṃ saumitre mā bhūd dharmaviparyayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5322: 7.096.013c tyāgo vadho vā vihitaḥ sādhūnām ubhayaṃ samam
GE09ram_07_u:5324: 7.096.014c lakṣmaṇas tvaritaḥ prāyāt svagṛhaṃ na viveśa ha
GE09ram_07_u:5326: 7.096.015c nigṛhya sarvasrotāṃsi niḥśvāsaṃ na mumoca ha
GE09ram_07_u:5328: 7.096.016c devāḥ sarṣigaṇāḥ sarve puṣpair avakiraṃs tadā
GE09ram_07_u:5330: 7.096.017c pragṛhya lakṣmaṇaṃ śakro divaṃ saṃpraviveśa ha
GE09ram_07_u:5334: 7.097.001c purodhasaṃ mantriṇaś ca naigamāṃś cedam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:5336: 7.097.002c ayodhyāyāṃ patiṃ vīraṃ tato yāsyāmy ahaṃ vanam
GE09ram_07_u:5337: 7.097.003a praveśayata saṃbhārān mā bhūt kālātyayo yathā
GE09ram_07_u:5339: 7.097.004a tac chrutvā rāghaveṇoktaṃ sarvāḥ prakṛtayo bhṛśam
GE09ram_07_u:5341: 7.097.005a bharataś ca visaṃjño 'bhūc chrutvā rāmasya bhāṣitam
GE09ram_07_u:5342: 7.097.005c rājyaṃ vigarhayām āsa rāghavaṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:5343: 7.097.006a satyena hi śape rājan svargaloke na caiva hi
GE09ram_07_u:5344: 7.097.006c na kāmaye yathā rājyaṃ tvāṃ vinā raghunandana
GE09ram_07_u:5346: 7.097.007c kosaleṣu kuśaṃ vīram uttareṣu tathā lavam
GE09ram_07_u:5349: 7.097.009a tac chrutvā bharatenoktaṃ dṛṣṭvā cāpi hy adho mukhān
GE09ram_07_u:5350: 7.097.009c paurān duḥkhena saṃtaptān vasiṣṭho vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:5351: 7.097.010a vatsa rāma imāḥ paśya dharaṇīṃ prakṛtīr gatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5352: 7.097.010c jñātvaiṣām īpsitaṃ kāryaṃ mā caiṣāṃ vipriyaṃ kṛthāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5354: 7.097.011c kiṃ karomīti kākutsthaḥ sarvān vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:5355: 7.097.012a tataḥ sarvāḥ prakṛtayo rāmaṃ vacanam abruvan
GE09ram_07_u:5357: 7.097.013a eṣā naḥ paramā prītir eṣa dharmaḥ paro mataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5358: 7.097.013c hṛdgatā naḥ sadā tuṣṭis tavānugamane dṛḍhā
GE09ram_07_u:5359: 7.097.014a paureṣu yadi te prītir yadi sneho hy anuttamaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5361: 7.097.015a tapovanaṃ vā durgaṃ vā nadīm ambhonidhiṃ tathā
GE09ram_07_u:5362: 7.097.015c vayaṃ te yadi na tyājyāḥ sarvān no naya īśvara
GE09ram_07_u:5363: 7.097.016a sa teṣāṃ niścayaṃ jñātvā kṛtāntaṃ ca nirīkṣyaca
GE09ram_07_u:5364: 7.097.016c paurāṇāṃ dṛḍhabhaktiṃ ca bāḍham ity eva so 'bravīt
GE09ram_07_u:5365: 7.097.017a evaṃ viniścayaṃ kṛtvā tasminn ahani rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5366: 7.097.017c kosaleṣu kuśaṃ vīram uttareṣu tathā lavam
GE09ram_07_u:5368: 7.097.018c rathānāṃ tu sahasrāṇi trīṇi nāgāyutāni ca
GE09ram_07_u:5371: 7.097.020a abhiṣicya tu tau vīrau prasthāpya svapure tathā
GE09ram_07_u:5374: 7.098.001c prajagmur madhurāṃ śīghraṃ cakrur vāsaṃ na cādhvani
GE09ram_07_u:5375: 7.098.002a tatas tribhir aho rātraiḥ saṃprāpya madhurām atha
GE09ram_07_u:5376: 7.098.002c śatrughnāya yathāvṛttam ācakhyuḥ sarvam eva tat
GE09ram_07_u:5380: 7.098.004c kuśāvatīti nāmnā sā kṛtā rāmeṇa dhīmatā
GE09ram_07_u:5381: 7.098.005a śrāvitā ca purī ramyā śrāvatīti lavasya ca
GE09ram_07_u:5384: 7.098.006c viremus te tato dūtās tvara rājann iti bruvan
GE09ram_07_u:5386: 7.098.007c prakṛtīs tu samānīya kāñcanaṃ ca purohitam
GE09ram_07_u:5388: 7.098.008c ātmanaś ca viparyāsaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
GE09ram_07_u:5390: 7.098.009c subāhur madhurāṃ lebhe śatrughātī ca vaidiśam
GE09ram_07_u:5391: 7.098.010a dvidhākṛtvā tu tāṃ senāṃ mādhurīṃ putrayor dvayoḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5395: 7.098.012a sa dadarśa mahātmānaṃ jvalantam iva pāvakam
GE09ram_07_u:5401: 7.098.015a na cānyad atra vaktavyaṃ dustaraṃ tava śāsanam
GE09ram_07_u:5402: 7.098.015c tyaktuṃ nārhasi māṃ vīra bhaktimantaṃ viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5403: 7.098.016a tasya tāṃ buddhim aklībāṃ vijñāya raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5404: 7.098.016c bāḍham ity eva śatrughnaṃ rāmo vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:5408: 7.098.018c rāma kṣayaṃ viditvā te sarva eva samāgatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5409: 7.098.019a te rāmam abhivādyāhuḥ sarva eva samāgatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5411: 7.098.020a yadi rāma vināsmābhir gacches tvaṃ puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_07_u:5415: 7.098.022a yāvat prajā dhariṣyanti tāvat tvaṃ vai vibhīṣaṇa
GE09ram_07_u:5417: 7.098.023a prajāḥ saṃrakṣa dharmeṇa nottaraṃ vaktum arhasi
GE09ram_07_u:5418: 7.098.024a tam evam uktvā kākutstho hanūmantam athābravīt
GE09ram_07_u:5419: 7.098.024c jīvite kṛtabuddhis tvaṃ mā pratijñāṃ vilopaya
GE09ram_07_u:5421: 7.098.025c tāvat tvaṃ dhārayan prāṇān pratijñām anupālaya
GE09ram_07_u:5422: 7.098.026a tathaivam uktvā kākutsthaḥ sarvāṃs tān ṛkṣavānarān
GE09ram_07_u:5423: 7.098.026c mayā sārdhaṃ prayāteti tadā tān rāghavo 'bravīt
GE09ram_07_u:5431: 7.099.004c kuśān gṛhītvā pāṇibhyāṃ prasajya prayayāv atha
GE09ram_07_u:5432: 7.099.005a avyāharan kva cit kiṃ cin niśceṣṭo niḥsukhaḥ pathi
GE09ram_07_u:5434: 7.099.006a rāmasya pārśve savye tu padmā śrīḥ susamāhitā
GE09ram_07_u:5440: 7.099.009a ṛṣayaś ca mahātmānaḥ sarva eva mahīsurāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5442: 7.099.010a taṃ yāntam anuyānti sma antaḥpuracarāḥ striyaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5454: 7.099.016a na tatra kaś cid dīno 'bhūd vrīḍito vāpi duḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5457: 7.099.017c saṃprāptaḥ so 'pi dṛṣṭvaiva saha sarvair anuvrataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5462: 7.100.002a atha tasmin muhūrte tu brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5463: 7.100.002c sarvaiḥ parivṛto devair ṛṣibhiś ca mahātmabhiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5470: 7.100.006c āgaccha viṣṇo bhadraṃ te diṣṭyā prāpto 'si rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:5471: 7.100.007a bhrātṛbhiḥ saha devābhaiḥ praviśasva svakāṃ tanum
GE09ram_07_u:5472: 7.100.007c vaiṣṇavīṃ tāṃ mahātejas tad ākāśaṃ sanātanam
GE09ram_07_u:5473: 7.100.008a tvaṃ hi lokagatir deva na tvāṃ ke cit prajānate
GE09ram_07_u:5475: 7.100.009a tvam acintyaṃ mahad bhūtam akṣayaṃ sarvasaṃgraham
GE09ram_07_u:5476: 7.100.009c yām icchasi mahātejas tāṃ tanuṃ praviśa svayam
GE09ram_07_u:5479: 7.100.011a tato viṣṇugataṃ devaṃ pūjayanti sma devatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5481: 7.100.012a ye ca divyā ṛṣigaṇā gandharvāpsarasaś ca yāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5484: 7.100.013c sādhu sādhv iti tat sarvaṃ tridivaṃ gatakalmaṣam
GE09ram_07_u:5485: 7.100.014a atha viṣṇur mahātejāḥ pitāmaham uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:5486: 7.100.014c eṣāṃ lokāñ janaughānāṃ dātum arhasi suvrata
GE09ram_07_u:5487: 7.100.015a ime hi sarve snehān mām anuyātā manasvinaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5488: 7.100.015c bhaktā bhājayitavyāś ca tyaktātmānaś ca matkṛte
GE09ram_07_u:5489: 7.100.016a tac chrutvā viṣṇuvacanaṃ brahmā lokaguruḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5491: 7.100.017a yac ca tiryaggataṃ kiṃ cid rāmam evānucintayat
GE09ram_07_u:5492: 7.100.017c prāṇāṃs tyakṣyati bhaktyā vai saṃtāne tu nivatsyati
GE09ram_07_u:5493: 7.100.017e sarvair eva guṇair yukte brahmalokād anantare
GE09ram_07_u:5494: 7.100.018a vānarāś ca svakāṃ yonim ṛkṣāś caiva tathā yayuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5495: 7.100.018c yebhyo viniḥsṛtā ye ye surādibhyaḥ susaṃbhavāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5496: 7.100.019a ṛṣibhyo nāgayakṣebhyas tāṃs tān eva prapedire
GE09ram_07_u:5499: 7.100.020c avagāhya jalaṃ yo yaḥ prāṇī hy āsīt prahṛṣṭavat
GE09ram_07_u:5502: 7.100.022a divyā divyena vapuṣā devā dīptā ivābhavan
GE09ram_07_u:5503: 7.100.022c gatvā tu sarayūtoyaṃ sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca
GE09ram_07_u:5505: 7.100.023c devānāṃ yasya yā yonir vānarā ṛṣka rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5506: 7.100.024a tām eva viviśuḥ sarve devān nikṣipya cāmbhasi
GE09ram_07_u:5507: 7.100.024c tathā svargagataṃ sarvaṃ kṛtvā lokagurur divam
GE09ram_07_u:5508: 7.100.025a jagāma tridaśaiḥ sārdhaṃ hṛṣṭair hṛṣṭo mahāmatiḥ
